 19553                                  	;mov	al,5
 19554 00002EFB B005                    	MOV	AL,error_access_denied
 19555 00002EFD 7303                    	JNC	short clook
 19556                                  	; 14/11/2022
 19557 00002EFF E9AC00                  	JMP	CloseFinish		; pretend the close worked.
 19558                                  	;jc	short CloseFinish ; 24/07/2019
 19559                                  clook:
 19560                                  
 19561                                  ; ES:DI points to entry
 19562                                  ; DS:SI points to SFT
 19563                                  ; ES:BX points to buffer header
 19564                                  
 19565 00002F02 57                      	push	di
 19566 00002F03 56                      	push	si
 19567                                  	;lea	si,[si+20h]

 19571                                  ; DS:SI point to unpacked name
 19572

 19581 00002F11 5F                      	pop	di
 19582 00002F12 740C                    	JZ	short CLOSE_GO		; Name OK
 19583                                  Bye:	
 19584 00002F14 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 19585 00002F16 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 19586 00002F17 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:DI points to SFT
 19587 00002F18 16                      	PUSH	SS
 19588 00002F19 1F                      	POP	DS

 19590                                  	;mov	al,2
 19591 00002F1B B002                    	MOV	AL,error_file_not_found
 19592 00002F1D E98E00                  	JMP	CloseFinish ; 24/07/2019
 19593

 19595                                  CLOSE_GO:
 19596                                  	; 03/02/2024

 19599

 19754                                  ; See if the ref count indicates that we have busied the SFT. If so, mark the
 19755                                  ; SFT as being free. Note that we do NOT need to be in critSFT as we are ONLY
 19756                                  ; going to be moving from busy to free.
 19757                                  ;
 19758 00002FB3 59                      	POP	CX			; get old ref count
 19759 00002FB4 9C                      	PUSHF
 19760                                  	; 03/02/2024
 19761                                  	;DEC	CX			; if cx != 1
 19762                                  	;JNZ	short NoFree		; then do NOT free SFT
 19763 00002FB5 E203                    	loop	NoFree ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM
 19764                                  
 19765 00002FB7 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx ; 0
 19766                                  	;MOV	[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_Count],CX ; mov [es:di+0],cx
 19767                                  NoFree:
 19768 00002FBA E870E3                  	call	LCritDisk
 19769 00002FBD 9D                      	POPF
 19770 00002FBE C3                      	retn
 19771                                  
 19772                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19773                                  ;
 19774                                  ; Procedure Name : FREE_SFT
 19775                                  ;
 19776                                  ; ES:DI -> SFT. Decs sft_ref_count. If the count goes to 0, mark it as busy.
 19777                                  ; Flags preserved. Return old ref count in AX
 19778                                  ;
 19779                                  ; Note that busy is indicated by the SFT ref count being -1.
 19780                                  ;
 19781                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 19782                                  
 19783                                  FREE_SFT:
 19784 00002FBF 9C                      	PUSHF		; Save carry state
 19785 00002FC0 268B05                  	mov	ax,[es:di]
 19786                                  	;MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 19787 00002FC3 48                      	DEC	AX
 19788 00002FC4 7501                    	JNZ	short SetCount
 19789 00002FC6 48                      	DEC	AX
 19790                                  SetCount:
 19791 00002FC7 268705                  	xchg	ax,[es:di]
 19792                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 19793 00002FCA 9D                      	POPF
 19794 00002FCB C3                      	retn

 19912                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 19913                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 19914                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 19915                                  			; CF clear if successful
 19916                                  localcommit_retn: ; 18/12/2022	
 19917 00003023 C3                      	retn
 19918                                  ;ENDIF
 19919                                  
 19920                                  ; Perform local commit operation by doing a close but not releaseing the SFT.
 19921                                  ; There are three ways we can do this. One is to enter a critical section to
 19922                                  ; protect a potential free. The second is to increment the ref count to mask
 19923                                  ; the close decrementing.
 19924                                  ;
 19925                                  ; The proper way is to let the caller's of close decide if a decrement should
 19926                                  ; be done. We do this by providing another entry into close after the
 19927                                  ; decrement and after the share information release.
 19928                                  
 19929                                  ; DOSCODE:6FA0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 19930                                  ; DOSCODE:6F8Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 19931                                  
 19932                                  LOCAL_COMMIT:
 19933 00003024 E8EBE2                  	call	ECritDisk
 19934                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19935 00003027 E8E8E2                  	call	ECritDisk	;PTM.
 19936 0000302A E80E00                  	call	SetSFTTimes
 19937 0000302D B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1
 19938 00003030 E8BCFE                  	call	CloseEntry
 19939                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 19940 00003033 9C                      	PUSHF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 19941 00003034 E83A15                  	call	DEV_OPEN_SFT	;PTM.  increment device count	;AN000;
 19942 00003037 9D                      	POPF			;PTM.				;AN000;
 19943                                  	;call	LCritDisk	;PTM.				;AN000;
 19944                                  	; 18/12/2022
 19945 00003038 E9F2E2                  	jmp	LCritDisk
 19946                                  ;localcommit_retn:
 19947                                  ;	retn

 19949                                  ;Break	<SetSFTTimes - signal a change in the times for an SFT>

 19951                                  ;

 19953                                  ;
 19954                                  ;   SetSFTTimes - Examine the flags for a SFT and set the time appropriately.
 19955                                  ;   Reflect these times in other SFT's for the same file.
 19956                                  ;

 19958                                  ;		BX = sf_flags set apprpriately
 19959                                  ;   Outputs:	Set sft times to current time if File & dirty & !nodate
 19960                                  ;   Registers modified: All except ES:DI, BX, AX
 19961                                  ;

 19975                                  	;TEST	BX,devid_file_clean+devid_device

 19978

 19985                                  	;TEST	BX,sf_close_nodate
 19986                                  	;retnz				; nodate => no timestamp
 19987                                  	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 19988                                  %else
 19989                                  	; 04/02/2024
 19990                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMDOS.COM)
 19991                                  	;test	bx,40C0h
 19992 0000303B F7C3C040                	test	bx,sf_close_nodate+devid_file_clean+devid_device
 19993 0000303F 75E2                    	jnz	short localcommit_retn
 19994                                  %endif
 19995

 19997 00003042 53                      	push	bx

 20004                                  ;if installed
 20005                                  	;call	JShare + 14 * 4
 20006 00003050 FF1E[C800]              	call	far [JShare+(14*4)]	; 14 = ShSU
 20007                                  ;else
 20008                                  ;	call	ShSU
 20009                                  ;endif
 20010 00003054 5B                      	pop	bx
 20011 00003055 58                      	pop	ax

 20036                                  ;BREAK <DOS_MkDir - Make a directory entry>
 20037                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20038                                  ;
 20039                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_MkDir
 20040                                  ;
 20041                                  ; Inputs:
 20042                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20043                                  ;		terminated)
 20044                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20045                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20046                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20047                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20048                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20049                                  ; Function:
 20050                                  ;	Make a new directory
 20051                                  ; Returns:
 20052                                  ;	Carry Clear
 20053                                  ;		No error
 20054                                  ;	Carry Set
 20055                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20056                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20057                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20058                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20059                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20060                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20061                                  ;			Already exists, device name
 20062                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed

 20064

 20082                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory

 20084                                  			; CF clear if successful

 20242                                  ;BREAK <DOS_ChDir -- Verify a directory>
 20243                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20244                                  ;
 20245                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_ChDir
 20246                                  ;
 20247                                  ; Inputs:
 20248                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20249                                  ;		terminated)
 20250                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20251                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20252                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20253                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used May not be NUL
 20254                                  ; Function:
 20255                                  ;	Validate the path for potential new current directory
 20256                                  ; Returns:
 20257                                  ;	NOTE:
 20258                                  ;	    [SATTRIB] is modified by this call
 20259                                  ;	Carry Clear
 20260                                  ;	    CX is cluster number of the DIR, LOCAL CDS ONLY
 20261                                  ;		Caller must NOT set ID fields on a NET CDS.
 20262                                  ;	Carry Set
 20263                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20264                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20265                                  ;			Bad path
 20266                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20267                                  ;			device or file name
 20268                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 20269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20270                                  
 20271                                  ;hkn; called from path.asm and dir2.asm. DS already set up.
 20272                                  
 20273                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20274                                  ; DOSCODE:70DAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20275                                  
 20276                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20277                                  ; DOSCODE:70C6h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20278

 20281 0000314A 7306                    	JNC	short LOCAL_CHDIR

 20284                                  ;	transfer NET_CHDIR
 20285                                  ;ELSE
 20286                                  	;mov	ax,1105h
 20287 0000314C B80511                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|5
 20288 0000314F CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - CHDIR
 20289                                  			; SS = DOS CS
 20290                                  			; SDA first filename pointer -> fully-qualified directory name
 20291                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20292                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code
 20293                                  			; CF clear if successful

 20337                                  ;BREAK <DOS_RmDir -- Remove a directory>
 20338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20339                                  ;
 20340                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_RmDir
 20341                                  ;
 20342                                  ; Inputs:
 20343                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 20344                                  ;		terminated)
 20345                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 20346                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 20347                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 20348                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 20349                                  ;		(Low word = -1 if NUL CDS (Net direct request))
 20350                                  ; Function:
 20351                                  ;	Remove a directory
 20352                                  ;	NOTE: Attempt to remove current directory must be detected by caller
 20353                                  ; Returns:
 20354                                  ;	NOTE:
 20355                                  ;	    [SATTRIB] is modified by this call
 20356                                  ;	Carry Clear
 20357                                  ;		No error
 20358                                  ;	Carry Set
 20359                                  ;	    AX is error code
 20360                                  ;		error_path_not_found
 20361                                  ;			Bad path (not in curr dir part if present)
 20362                                  ;		error_bad_curr_dir
 20363                                  ;			Bad path in current directory part of path
 20364                                  ;		error_access_denied
 20365                                  ;			device or file name, root directory
 20366                                  ;			Bad directory ('.' '..' messed up)
 20367                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 20368                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20369                                  
 20370                                  ;hkn; called from path.asm. DS already set up.
 20371                                  
 20372                                  ; 18/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 20374                                  
 20375                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20376                                  ; DOSCODE:710Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 20388                                  			; SS = DOS CS

 20390                                  			; SDA CDS pointer -> current directory
 20391                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = DOS error code

 20532                                  
 20533                                  ;	TITLE	DISK - Disk utility routines
 20534                                  ;	NAME	Disk
 20535                                  
 20536                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs
 20537                                  ;
 20538                                  ;	SWAPCON
 20539                                  ;	SWAPBACK
 20540                                  ;	DOS_READ
 20541                                  ;	DOS_WRITE
 20542                                  ;	get_io_sft
 20543                                  ;	DirRead
 20544                                  ;	FIRSTCLUSTER
 20545                                  ;	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 20546                                  ;	FATSecRd
 20547                                  ;	DREAD
 20548                                  ;	CHECK_WRITE_LOCK
 20549                                  ;	CHECK_READ_LOCK
 20550                                  ;
 20551                                  ;	Revision history:
 20552                                  ;
 20553                                  ;		A000   version 4.00  Jan. 1988
 20554                                  ;
 20555                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20556                                  ;
 20557                                  ; M065 : B#5276. On raw read/write of a block of characters if a critical
 20558                                  ;		error happens, DOS retries the entire block assuming that
 20559                                  ;		zero characters were transferred. Modified the code to take
 20560                                  ;		into account the number of characters transfered before
 20561                                  ;		retrying the operation.
 20562                                  ;
 20563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20564                                  ;
 20565                                  
 20566                                  ;Installed = TRUE
 20567                                  
 20568                                  ;Break	<SwapCon, Swap Back - Old-style I/O to files>
 20569                                  
 20570                                  ; **** Drivers for file input from devices ****
 20571                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20572                                  ;   Indicate that there is no more I/O occurring through another SFT outside
 20573                                  ;   of handles 0 and 1
 20574                                  ;
 20575                                  ;   Inputs:	DS is DOSDATA
 20576                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set to false.
 20577                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 20578                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20579                                  
 20580                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 3CF8h
 20581                                  
 20582                                  ; DOSCODE:71E3h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20583                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20584                                  
 20585                                  ; DOSCODE:71CFh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20586                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20587                                  
 20588                                  SWAPBACK:
 20589 00003247 C606[5703]00            	MOV	BYTE [CONSWAP],0	; signal no conswaps
 20590 0000324C C3                      	retn
 20591                                  
 20592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20593                                  ;
 20594                                  ; Procedure Name : SWAPCON
 20595                                  ;
 20596                                  ;   Copy ThisSFT to CONSFT for use by the 1-12 primitives.
 20597                                  ;
 20598                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisSFT as the sft of the desired file
 20599                                  ;		DS is DOSDATA
 20600                                  ;   Outputs:	CONSWAP is set.  CONSFT = ThisSFT.
 20601                                  ;   Registers modified: none
 20602                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20603                                  
 20604                                  SWAPCON:
 20605                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 20606                                  	;push	es
 20607                                  	;push	di
 20608                                  	;mov	byte [CONSWAP],1
 20609                                  	;les	di,[THISSFT]
 20610                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT],di
 20611                                  	;mov	word [CONSFT+2],es
 20612                                  	;pop	di
 20613                                  	;pop	es
 20614                                  	;retn
 20615                                  
 20616                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20617 0000324D C606[5703]01            	mov	byte [CONSWAP],1	; ConSwap = TRUE
 20618 00003252 50                      	push	ax
 20619 00003253 A1[9E05]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT]
 20620 00003256 A3[E605]                	mov	[CONSFT],ax
 20621 00003259 A1[A005]                	mov	ax,[THISSFT+2]
 20622 0000325C A3[E805]                	mov	[CONSFT+2],ax
 20623 0000325F 58                      	pop	ax
 20624 00003260 C3                      	retn
 20625                                  
 20626                                  ; DOSCODE:71FDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 20627                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20628                                  
 20629                                  ;Break	<DOS_READ -- MAIN READ ROUTINE AND DEVICE IN ROUTINES>
 20630                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20631                                  ;
 20632                                  ; Inputs:
 20633                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 20634                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 20635                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to read
 20636                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 20637                                  ; Function:
 20638                                  ;	Perform read operation
 20639                                  ; Outputs:
 20640                                  ;    Carry clear
 20641                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 20642                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes read
 20643                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20644                                  ;    Carry set
 20645                                  ;	AX is error code
 20646                                  ;	CX = 0
 20647                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 20648                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 20649                                  ;
 20650                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 20651                                  
 20652                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is be set up.
 20653                                  
 20654                                  ; DOSCODE:71E9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 20655                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 20656                                  
 20657                                  DOS_READ:
 20658 00003261 C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 20659                                  
 20660                                  ; Verify that the sft has been opened in a mode that allows reading.
 20661                                  
 20662                                  	;mov	al,[es:di+2]
 20663 00003265 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 20664                                  	;and	al,0Fh
 20665 00003269 240F                    	AND	AL,access_mask
 20666                                  	;cmp	al,1
 20667 0000326B 3C01                    	CMP	AL,open_for_write
 20668 0000326D 7503                    	JNE	short READ_NO_MODE	; Is read or both
 20669 0000326F E90306                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 20670                                  
 20671                                  READ_NO_MODE:
 20672 00003272 E8E104                  	call	SETUP
 20673 00003275 E30B                    	JCXZ	NoIORet 		; no bytes to read - fast return
 20674 00003277 E8EFDF                  	call	IsSFTNet
 20675 0000327A 7408                    	JZ	short LOCAL_READ
 20676                                  
 20677                                  ;IF NOT Installed
 20678                                  ;	transfer NET_READ
 20679                                  ;ELSE
 20680                                  	;mov	ax,1108h
 20681 0000327C B80811                  	MOV	AX,(MultNET<<8)|8
 20682 0000327F CD2F                    	int	2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - READ FROM REMOTE FILE
 20683                                  			; ES:DI -> SFT
 20684                                  			; SFT DPB field -> DPB of drive containing file
 20685                                  			; CX = number of bytes, SS = DOS CS, SDA DTA field -> user buffer
 20686                                  			; Return: CF set on error, CX = bytes read
 20687 00003281 C3                      	retn
 20688                                  ;ENDIF
 20689                                  
 20690                                  ; The user ended up requesting 0 bytes of input. We do nothing for this case
 20691                                  ; except return immediately.
 20692                                  
 20693                                  NoIORet:
 20694 00003282 F8                      	CLC
 20695 00003283 C3                      	retn
 20696

 20713                                  
 20714                                  ; We are reading from a device. Examine the status of the device to see if we
 20715                                  ; can short-circuit the I/O. If the device in the EOF state or if it is the
 20716                                  ; null device, we can safely indicate no transfer.
 20717                                  
 20718                                  READDEV:
 20719                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],4
 20720 00003299 C606[2303]04            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_SerDev
 20721                                  	;mov	bl,[es:di+5]
 20722 0000329E 268A5D05                	MOV	BL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags]
 20723 000032A2 C43E[2C03]              	LES	DI,[DMAADD]
 20724                                  	;test	bl,40h
 20725 000032A6 F6C340                  	test	BL,devid_device_EOF	; End of file?
 20726 000032A9 7407                    	JZ	short ENDRDDEVJ3
 20727                                  	;test	bl,4
 20728 000032AB F6C304                  	test	BL,devid_device_null	; NUL device?
 20729 000032AE 7405                    	JZ	short TESTRAW 		; NO
 20730 000032B0 30C0                    	XOR	AL,AL			; Indicate EOF by setting zero
 20731                                  ENDRDDEVJ3:
 20732                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility!)
 20733                                  	;JMP	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 20734                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20735 000032B2 E96701                  	jmp	ENDRDDEV ; 04/05/2019
 20736                                  
 20737                                  ; We need to hit the device. Figure out if we do a raw read or we do the
 20738                                  ; bizarre std_con_string_input.
 20739                                  
 20740                                  TESTRAW:
 20741                                  	;test	bl,20h
 20742 000032B5 F6C320                  	test	BL,devid_device_raw	; Raw mode?
 20743 000032B8 7508                    	JNZ	short DVRDRAW 		; Yes, let the device do all local editing
 20744                                  	;test	bl,1
 20745 000032BA F6C301                  	test	BL,devid_device_con_in	; Is it console device?
 20746 000032BD 7461                    	JZ	short NOTRDCON
 20747 000032BF E98F01                  	JMP	READCON
 20748                                  
 20749                                  DVRDRAW:
 20750 000032C2 06                      	PUSH	ES
 20751 000032C3 1F                      	POP	DS			; Xaddr to DS:DI
 20752                                  
 20753                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 20754                                  
 20755                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20756                                  ;SR;
 20757                                  ;Check for win386 presence -- if present, do polled read of characters
 20758                                  
 20759 000032C4 36F606[3010]01          	test	byte [ss:IsWin386],1 ; 19/05/2019
 20760 000032CA 7408                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;not present
 20761 000032CC F6C301                  	test	bl,devid_device_con_in	;is it console device
 20762 000032CF 7403                    	jz	short ReadRawRetry	;no, do normal read
 20763 000032D1 E9BA00                  	jmp	do_polling		;yes, do win386 polling loop
 20764                                  
 20765                                  ReadRawRetry:
 20766 000032D4 89FB                    	MOV	BX,DI			; DS:BX transfer addr
 20767 000032D6 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX			; Media Byte, unit = 0
 20768 000032D8 89C2                    	MOV	DX,AX			; Start at 0
 20769 000032DA E88E13                  	call	SETREAD
 20770 000032DD 1E                      	PUSH	DS			; Save Seg part of Xaddr
 20771                                  
 20772                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20773 000032DE 36C536[9E05]            	LDS	SI,[SS:THISSFT]
 20774 000032E3 E80C13                  	call	DEVIOCALL
 20775 000032E6 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; DS:DX is preserved by INT 24
 20776 000032E8 B486                    	MOV	AH,86H			; Read error
 20777                                  
 20778                                  ;hkn; SS override
 20779 000032EA 368B3E[5D03]            	MOV	DI,[SS:DEVCALL_REQSTAT]
 20780                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 20781                                  	;test	di,8000h
 20782                                  	;jz	short CRDROK
 20783                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20784 000032EF 09FF                    	or	di,di
 20785 000032F1 7923                    	jns	short CRDROK		; no errors
 20786                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 20787 000032F3 E8611F                  	call	CHARHARD
 20788 000032F6 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX			; DS:DI is Xaddr
 20789                                  
 20790                                  	; 04/05/2019
 20791                                  
 20792                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20793 000032F8 36033E[6C03]            	add	di,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; update ptr and count to reflect the	M065
 20794 000032FD 362B0E[6C03]            	sub	cx,[ss:CALLSCNT]	; number of chars xferred		M065
 20795                                  
 20796                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)
 20797 00003302 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL

 20800 00003308 7403                    	JZ	short CRDFERR 		; fail.
 20801 0000330A 1F                      	POP	DS			; Recover saved seg part of Xaddr
 20802 0000330B EBC7                    	JMP	short ReadRawRetry	; Retry
 20803                                  
 20804                                  ; We have encountered a device-driver error. We have informed the user of it
 20805                                  ; and he has said for us to fail the system call.
 20806                                  
 20807                                  CRDFERR:
 20808 0000330D 5F                      	POP	DI			; Clean stack
 20809                                  DEVIOFERR:

 20817 00003317 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 20818

 20821                                  	;JMP	SHORT ENDRDDEVJ3
 20822                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20823 0000331E EB6B                    	jmp	short ENDRDDEVJ2
 20824                                  
 20825                                  ; We are going to do a cooked read on some character device. There is a
 20826                                  ; problem here, what does the data look like? Is it a terminal device, line
 20827                                  ; CR line CR line CR, or is it file data, line CR LF line CR LF? Does it have
 20828                                  ; a ^Z at the end which is data, or is the ^Z not data?  In any event we're
 20829                                  ; going to do this: Read in pieces up to CR (CRs included in data) or ^z (^z
 20830                                  ; included in data). this "simulates" the way con works in cooked mode
 20831                                  ; reading one line at a time. With file data, however, the lines will look
 20832                                  ; like, LF line CR. This is a little weird.
 20833                                  
 20834                                  NOTRDCON:

 20836 00003322 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX

 20849                                  DVRDLP:

 20854

 20888

 20906 0000338A 40                      	INC	AX			; Resets zero flag so NOT EOF, unless
 20907                                  					;  AX=FFFF which is not likely

 20909                                  	; 16/12/2022

 20913                                  
 20914                                  	; 04/05/2019
 20915                                  
 20916                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 20917                                  ;SR;
 20918                                  ;Polling code for raw read on CON when WIN386 is present
 20919                                  ;
 20920                                  ;At this point -- ds:di is transfer address
 20921                                  ;		  cx is count

 20923                                  do_polling:

 20925 00003390 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax

 20928                                  
 20929                                  do_io:
 20930                                  ;Change read to a NON-DESTRUCTIVE READ, NO WAIT
 20931                                  
 20932 00003397 26C6470205              	mov	byte [es:bx+2],DEVRDND ; 5 ;Change command code

 20935 000033A2 E84D12                  	call	DEVIOCALL		;call device driver
 20936 000033A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 20937                                  	
 20938                                  	;test	word [es:bx+3],8000h
 20939                                  	; 16/12/2022
 20940                                  	;test	byte [es:bx+4],80h
 20941 000033A6 26F6470480              	test	byte [es:bx+SRHEAD.REQSTAT+1],STERR>>8

 20944

 20954 000033BD 1F                      	pop	ds

 20956

 20958                                  	;test	word [es:bx+3],200h
 20959                                  	; 16/12/2022

 20964                                  ;Character is available. Read in 1 character at a time until all characters
 20965                                  ;are read in or no character is available

 20979                                  
 20980                                  	;invoke	charhard		;invoke int 24h handler

 20983 000033EE 08C0                    	or	al,al			;
 20984 000033F0 7424                    	jz	short pop_done_read	;ignore by user,assume read is done
 20985 000033F2 3C03                    	cmp	al,3

 20987 000033F6 1F                      	pop	ds

 20989                                  
 20990                                  next_char:
 20991 000033F9 1F                      	pop	ds
 20992 000033FA 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 20993 000033FC 49                      	dec	cx			;decrement count
 20994 000033FD E318                    	jcxz	done_read		;all characters read in
 20995 000033FF 26FF470E                	inc	word [es:bx+14]		;update transfer address
 20996 00003403 EB92                    	jmp	short do_io			;read next character in
 20997                                  
 20998                                  devrderr:
 20999 00003405 5F                      	pop	di			;discard segment address
 21000 00003406 36C43E[9E05]            	les	di,[ss:THISSFT]

 21006

 21010

 21012

 21015                                  
 21016                                  pop_done_read:
 21017 00003416 1F                      	pop	ds
 21018                                  done_read:

 21020                                  
 21021                                  	; 16/12/2022
 21022                                  
 21023                                  	;jmp	ENDRDDEVJ3	;jump back to normal DOS raw read exit
 21024                                  	;jmp	ENDRDDEV ; 04/05/2019
 21025                                  
 21026                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21027                                  ENDRDDEV:
 21028 0000341C 16                      	push	ss
 21029 0000341D 1F                      	pop	ds
 21030 0000341E EB1F                    	jmp	short endrddev1
 21031                                  
 21032                                  	; 17/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 21033                                  	;jmp	ENDRDDEVJ3	;jump back to normal DOS raw read exit
 21034                                  
 21035                                  TRANBUF:
 21036 00003420 AC                      	LODSB
 21037 00003421 AA                      	STOSB

 21039 00003424 7503                    	JNZ	short NORMCH

 21041                                  NORMCH:

 21046 00003431 E82FE2                  	call	OUTT		; Transmit linefeed

 21125                                  
 21126                                  ; 24/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 21127                                  
 21128                                  ;Break	<DOS_WRITE -- MAIN WRITE ROUTINE AND DEVICE OUT ROUTINES>
 21129                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21130                                  ;
 21131                                  ; Procedure Name : DOS_WRITE
 21132                                  ;
 21133                                  ; Inputs:
 21134                                  ;	ThisSFT set to the SFT for the file being used
 21135                                  ;	[DMAADD] contains transfer address
 21136                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes to write
 21137                                  ; Function:
 21138                                  ;	Perform write operation
 21139                                  ;	NOTE: If CX = 0 on input, file is truncated or grown
 21140                                  ;		to current sf_position
 21141                                  ; Outputs:
 21142                                  ;    Carry clear
 21143                                  ;	SFT Position and cluster pointers updated
 21144                                  ;	CX = No. of bytes written
 21145                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 21146                                  ;    Carry set
 21147                                  ;	AX is error code
 21148                                  ;	CX = 0
 21149                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT
 21150                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed
 21151                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21152                                  
 21153                                  ;hkn; called from fcbio2.asm, handle.asm and dev.asm. DS is set up at this 
 21154                                  ;hkn; point to DOSDATA.
 21155                                  
 21156                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21157                                  ; DOSCODE:742Ch (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 21158                                  
 21159                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 21160                                  ; DOSCODE:7418h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 21161                                  
 21162                                  DOS_WRITE:
 21163 0000348A C43E[9E05]              	LES	DI,[THISSFT]
 21164                                  	;mov	al,[ES:DI+2]
 21165 0000348E 268A4502                	MOV	AL,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_mode]
 21166                                  	;and	al,0Fh
 21167 00003492 240F                    	AND	AL,access_mask
 21168                                  	;cmp	al,0
 21169 00003494 3C00                    	CMP	AL,open_for_read
 21170 00003496 7503                    	JNE	short Check_FCB_RO		 ;Is write or both
 21171                                  BadMode:
 21172 00003498 E9DA03                  	jmp	SET_ACC_ERR
 21173                                  
 21174                                  ; NOTE: The following check for writting to a Read Only File is performed
 21175                                  ;	    ONLY on FCBs!!!!
 21176                                  ;	We ALLOW writes to Read Only files via handles to allow a CREATE
 21177                                  ;	    of a read only file which can then be written to.
 21178                                  ;	This is OK because we are NOT ALLOWED to OPEN a RO file via handles
 21179                                  ;	    for writting, or RE-CREATE an EXISTING RO file via handles. Thus,
 21180                                  ;	    CREATing a NEW RO file, or RE-CREATing an existing file which
 21181                                  ;	    is NOT RO to be RO, via handles are the only times we can write
 21182                                  ;	    to a read-only file.
 21183

 21447                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21448                                  ;
 21449                                  ; Procedure Name : get_io_sft
 21450                                  ;
 21451                                  ;   Convert JFN number in BX to sf_entry in DS:SI We get the normal SFT if
 21452                                  ;   CONSWAP is FALSE or if the handle desired is 2 or more. Otherwise, we
 21453                                  ;   retrieve the sft from ConSFT which is set by SwapCon.
 21454                                  ;
 21455                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21456                                  
 21457                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21458                                  ; DOSCODE:7583h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 21459                                  ; 17/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 21460                                  ; DOSCODE:756Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 21488                                  ;Break	<DIRREAD -- READ A DIRECTORY SECTOR>
 21489                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21490                                  ;
 21491                                  ; Procedure Name : DIRREAD
 21492                                  ;
 21493                                  ; Inputs:
 21494                                  ;	AX = Directory block number (relative to first block of directory)
 21495                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 21496                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = First sector of first cluster of directory
 21497                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster
 21498                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 21499                                  ; Function:
 21500                                  ;	Read the directory block into [CURBUF].
 21501                                  ; Outputs:
 21502                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM] = Next cluster (after the one skipped to)
 21503                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] Set
 21504                                  ;	ES:BP unchanged
 21505                                  ;	[CURBUF] Points to Buffer with dir sector
 21506                                  ;	Carry set if error (user said FAIL to I 24)
 21507                                  ; DS preserved, all other registers destroyed.
 21508                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21509                                  
 21510                                  ;hkn; called from dir.asm. DS already set up to DOSDATA.
 21511                                  
 21512                                  DIRREAD:
 21513                                  
 21514                                  ; Note that ClusFac is the sectors per cluster. This is NOT necessarily
 21515                                  ; the same as what is in the DPB! In the case of the root directory, we have
 21516                                  ; ClusFac = # sectors in the root directory. The root directory is detected
 21517                                  ; by DIRStart = 0.
 21518                                  
 21519 00003603 31D2                    	XOR	DX,DX
 21520                                  	;CMP	word [DIRSTART],0
 21521                                  	; 21/09/2023
 21522 00003605 3916[C205]              	cmp	[DIRSTART],dx ; 0
 21523 00003609 7503                    	jnz	short SubDir
 21524 0000360B 92                      	XCHG	AX,DX
 21525 0000360C EB0C                    	JMP	short DoRead
 21526                                  
 21527                                  ; Convert the sector number in AX into cluster and sector-within-cluster pair
 21528                                  
 21529                                  SubDir:
 21530 0000360E 88C2                    	MOV	DL,AL
 21531                                  	;and	dl,[es:bp+4]
 21532 00003610 26225604                	AND	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 21533                                  
 21534                                  ;	(DX) = sector-in-cluster
 21535                                  
 21536                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 21537 00003614 268A4E05                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 21538 00003618 D3E8                    	SHR	AX,CL
 21539                                  
 21540                                  ;	(DX) = position in cluster
 21541                                  ;	(AX) = number of clusters to skip
 21542                                  
 21543                                  DoRead:
 21544 0000361A 8816[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],DL
 21545 0000361E 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX
 21546 00003620 88D4                    	MOV	AH,DL
 21547                                  
 21548                                  ;	(CX) = number of clusters to skip.
 21549                                  ;	(AH) = remainder
 21550                                  
 21551                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21552                                  
 21553                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21554                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC+2]	     	  ;>32mb
 21555                                  	;MOV	[HIGH_SECTOR],DX	  ;>32mb
 21556                                  	;MOV	DX,[DIRSEC]
 21557                                  	;ADD	DL,AH
 21558                                  	;ADC	DH,0
 21559                                  	;ADC	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0	  ;>32mb
 21560                                  	; 21/09/2023
 21561 00003622 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 21562 00003624 8B16[BE05]              	mov	dx,[DIRSEC]
 21563 00003628 00E2                    	add	dl,ah
 21564 0000362A 10DE                    	adc	dh,bl ; 0
 21565 0000362C 131E[C005]              	adc	bx,[DIRSEC+2]
 21566 00003630 891E[0706]              	mov	[HIGH_SECTOR],bx
 21567                                  
 21568 00003634 8B1E[BC05]              	MOV	BX,[CLUSNUM]
 21569 00003638 891E[DC05]              	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 21570 0000363C E319                    	JCXZ	FIRSTCLUSTER
 21571                                  SKPCLLP:
 21572 0000363E E8811E                  	call	UNPACK
 21573 00003641 72BF                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 21574 00003643 87DF                    	XCHG	BX,DI
 21575 00003645 E8631E                  	call	IsEOF			; test for eof based on fat size
 21576 00003648 7302                    	JAE	short HAVESKIPPED
 21577 0000364A E2F2                    	LOOP	SKPCLLP
 21578                                  HAVESKIPPED:
 21579 0000364C 891E[DC05]              	MOV	[NXTCLUSNUM],BX
 21580 00003650 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI
 21581 00003652 88E3                    	MOV	BL,AH
 21582 00003654 E81417                  	call	FIGREC
 21583                                  
 21584                                  	;entry	FIRSTCLUSTER
 21585                                  
 21586                                  FIRSTCLUSTER:
 21587                                  	; 22/09/2023
 21588                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 21589                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 21590                                  	;XOR	AL,AL ; *	; Indicate pre-read
 21591                                  	;call	GETBUFFR
 21592 00003657 E87322                  	call	GETBUFFER ; *	; pre-read
 21593 0000365A 72A6                    	jc	short get_io_sft_retn
 21594                                  
 21595                                  	;entry	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 21596                                  
 21597                                  SET_BUF_AS_DIR:
 21598                                  
 21599                                  ;	Set the type of CURBUF to be a directory sector.
 21600                                  ;	Only flags are modified.
 21601                                  
 21602 0000365C 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 21603 0000365D 56                      	PUSH	SI
 21604 0000365E C536[E205]              	LDS	SI,[CURBUF]

 21609                                  dirread_retn:

 21612                                  ;Break	<FATSECRD -- READ A FAT SECTOR>
 21613                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21614                                  ;
 21615                                  ; Procedure Name : FATSECRD
 21616                                  ; Inputs:
 21617                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 21618                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 21619                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 21620                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number
 21621                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 21622                                  ; Function:
 21623                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform FAT read.
 21624                                  ; Outputs:
 21625                                  ;	Same as DREAD
 21626                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21627                                  
 21628                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21629                                  	; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)	
 21630                                  
 21631                                  FATSECRD:
 21632                                  ;hkn; SS override
 21633                                  	;mov	byte [ss:ALLOWED],18h
 21634 00003669 36C606[4B03]18          	MOV	byte [SS:ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 21635 0000366F 89CF                    	MOV	DI,CX
 21636                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+8]
 21637 00003671 268A4E08                	MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_COUNT]
 21638                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 21639                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0Fh]
 21640                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE] 				
 21641                                  	;XOR	AH,AH
 21642                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21643                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Fh]
 21644 00003675 268B460F                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FAT_SIZE] ;>32mb
 21645 00003679 30ED                    	XOR	CH,CH	
 21646 0000367B 52                      	PUSH	DX
 21647                                  NXTFAT:
 21648                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 21649                                  ;hkn; SS override
 21650 0000367C 36C706[0706]0000        	MOV	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0	;>32mb FAT sectors cannot exceed
 21651 00003683 51                      	PUSH	CX			;32mb
 21652 00003684 50                      	PUSH	AX
 21653 00003685 89F9                    	MOV	CX,DI
 21654 00003687 E85B00                  	call	DSKREAD
 21655 0000368A 58                      	POP	AX
 21656 0000368B 59                      	POP	CX
 21657 0000368C 7420                    	JZ	short RET41P		; Carry clear
 21658 0000368E 01C2                    	ADD	DX,AX

 21805                                  ;	NAME	Disk2
 21806                                  
 21807                                  ;**	Low level Read and write routines for local SFT I/O on files and devs

 21809                                  ;	DskRead
 21810                                  ;	DWRITE
 21811                                  ;	DSKWRITE

 21824                                  ;	Revision history:
 21825                                  ;
 21826                                  ;		AN000 version 4.00 Jan. 1988
 21827                                  ;		M039 DB 10/17/90 - Disk read/write optimization
 21828                                  
 21829                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 21830                                  ; DOSCODE:7699h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 21831                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 21833                                  
 21834                                  ;Break	<DSKREAD -- PHYSICAL DISK READ>
 21835                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21836                                  ;
 21837                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKREAD
 21838                                  ;
 21839                                  ; Inputs:
 21840                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 21841                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 21842                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 21843                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 21844                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 21845                                  ; Function:
 21846                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 21847                                  ; Outputs:
 21848                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 21849                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 21850                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 21851                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 21852                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 21853                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 21854                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21855                                  
 21856                                  DSKREAD:
 21857 000036E5 51                      	PUSH	CX
 21858                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 21859 000036E6 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 21860                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 21861 000036EA 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 21862 000036EE 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21863 000036EF 06                      	PUSH	ES
 21864 000036F0 E8780F                  	call	SETREAD
 21865 000036F3 EB27                    	JMP	short DODSKOP
 21866                                  
 21867                                  ;Break	<DWRITE -- SEE ABOUT WRITING>
 21868                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21869                                  ;
 21870                                  ; Procedure Name : DWRITE
 21871                                  ;
 21872                                  ; Inputs:
 21873                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer address
 21874                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 21875                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 21876                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 21877                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 21878                                  ;	[ALLOWED] must be set in case HARDERR called
 21879                                  ; Function:
 21880                                  ;	Calls BIOS to perform disk write. If BIOS reports
 21881                                  ;	errors, will call HARDERRRW for further action.
 21882                                  ; Output:
 21883                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently, user FAILed to I 24)
 21884                                  ; BP preserved. All other registers destroyed.
 21885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21886                                  
 21887                                  	;entry	DWRITE
 21888                                  DWRITE:
 21889 000036F5 E81600                  	CALL	DSKWRITE
 21890 000036F8 7413                    	jz	short dw_ret_label	; Carry clear (retz)
 21891                                  
 21892                                  ;hkn; SS override
 21893 000036FA 36C606[7505]01          	MOV	BYTE [SS:READOP],1
 21894 00003700 E83A00                  	call	HARDERRRW
 21895 00003703 3C01                    	CMP	AL,1		; Check for retry
 21896 00003705 74EE                    	JZ	short DWRITE
 21897 00003707 3C03                    	CMP	AL,3		; Check for FAIL
 21898 00003709 F8                      	CLC
 21899 0000370A 7501                    	JNZ	short NO_CAR2 	; Ignore
 21900 0000370C F9                      	STC
 21901                                  NO_CAR2:
 21902                                  dw_ret_label:
 21903 0000370D C3                      	retn
 21904                                  
 21905                                  ;Break	<DSKWRITE -- PHYSICAL DISK WRITE>
 21906                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21907                                  ;
 21908                                  ; Procedure Name : DSKWRITE
 21909                                  ;
 21910                                  ; Inputs:
 21911                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer addr
 21912                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors
 21913                                  ;	DX = Absolute record number	       (LOW)
 21914                                  ;	[HIGH_SECTOR] = Absolute record number (HIGH)
 21915                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 21916                                  ; Function:
 21917                                  ;	Call BIOS to perform disk read
 21918                                  ; Outputs:
 21919                                  ;	DI = CX on entry
 21920                                  ;	CX = Number of sectors unsuccessfully transfered
 21921                                  ;	AX = Status word as returned by BIOS (error code in AL if error)
 21922                                  ;	Zero set if OK (from BIOS) (carry clear)
 21923                                  ;	Zero clear if error (carry clear)
 21924                                  ; SI Destroyed, others preserved
 21925                                  ;
 21926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 21927                                  
 21928                                  	;entry	DSKWRITE
 21929                                  DSKWRITE:
 21930 0000370E 51                      	PUSH	CX
 21931                                  	;mov	ah,[es:bp+17h] ; 04/05/2019
 21932 0000370F 268A6617                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.MEDIA]
 21933                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+1]
 21934 00003713 268A4601                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.UNIT]
 21935 00003717 53                      	PUSH	BX
 21936 00003718 06                      	PUSH	ES
 21937 00003719 E8820F                  	call	SETWRITE
 21938                                  DODSKOP:
 21939 0000371C 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS		; Save DS
 21940 0000371E 1F                      	POP	DS		; DS:BP points to DPB
 21941 0000371F 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 21942                                  
 21943                                  	;lds	si,[ds:bp+13h] ; 04/05/2019
 21944 00003720 3EC57613                	LDS	SI,[ds:BP+DPB.DRIVER_ADDR] ; 07/09/2018
 21945 00003724 E8CE0E                  	call	DEVIOCALL2
 21946                                  
 21947 00003727 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX		; Restore DS
 21948 00003729 07                      	POP	ES		; Restore ES
 21949 0000372A 5B                      	POP	BX

 21963                                  	;test	AX,STERR
 21964 0000373C C3                      	retn

 21967                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 21969                                  ; Procedure Name : HardErrRW
 21970                                  ;
 21971                                  ; Inputs:

 21973                                  ;	Other registers set as per HARDERR
 21974                                  ; Function:

 21976                                  ;	errors and maps them if needed. Then invokes
 21977                                  ;	Harderr
 21978                                  ; Outputs:

 21980                                  ; AX may be modified prior to call to HARDERR.
 21981                                  ; No other registers altered.

 22018                                  
 22019                                  ;Break	<SETUP -- SETUP A DISK READ OR WRITE FROM USER>
 22020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22021                                  ;
 22022                                  ; Procedure Name : SETUP
 22023                                  ;
 22024                                  ; Inputs:
 22025                                  ;	ES:DI point to SFT (value also in THISSFT)
 22026                                  ;	DMAAdd contains transfer address
 22027                                  ;	CX = Byte count
 22028                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 22029                                  ;   WARNING Stack must be clean, two ret addrs on stack, 1st of caller,
 22030                                  ;		2nd of caller of caller.
 22031                                  ; Outputs:
 22032                                  ;	    CX = byte count
 22033                                  ;	    [THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters if file
 22034                                  ;		      = Pointer to device header if device or NET
 22035                                  ;	    ES:DI Points to SFT
 22036                                  ;	    [NEXTADD] = Displacement of disk transfer within segment
 22037                                  ;	    [TRANS] = 0 (No transfers yet)
 22038                                  ;	    BytPos = Byte position in file
 22039                                  ;
 22040                                  ;	The following fields are relevant to local files (not devices) only:
 22041                                  ;
 22042                                  ;	    SecPos = Position of first sector (local files only)
 22043                                  ;	    [BYTSECPOS] = Byte position in first sector (local files only)
 22044                                  ;	    [CLUSNUM] = First cluster (local files only)
 22045                                  ;	    [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector within first cluster (local files only)
 22046                                  ;	    [THISDRV] = Physical unit number (local files only)
 22047                                  ;
 22048                                  ;      RETURNS ONE LEVEL UP WITH:
 22049                                  ;	   CX = 0
 22050                                  ;	   CARRY = Clear
 22051                                  ;	IF AN ERROR IS DETECTED
 22052                                  ; All other registers destroyed
 22053                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22054                                  
 22055                                  ;hkn; called from disk.asm. DS has been set up to DOSDATA.
 22056                                  
 22057                                  ; DOSCODE:770Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22058                                  
 22059                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22060                                  ; DOSCODE:76F7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 22061                                  
 22062                                  SETUP:
 22063                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 411Bh
 22064                                  
 22065                                  	;lds 	si,[es:di+7]
 22066 00003756 26C57507                	LDS	SI,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_devptr]
 22067                                  
 22068                                  ;hkn; SS override
 22069 0000375A 368C1E[8C05]            	MOV	[SS:THISDPB+2],DS
 22070                                  
 22071                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 22072 0000375F 16                      	push	ss
 22073 00003760 1F                      	pop	ds
 22074                                  
 22075 00003761 8936[8A05]              	MOV	[THISDPB],SI
 22076                                  
 22077 00003765 8B1E[2C03]              	MOV	BX,[DMAADD]

 22079 0000376D C606[7405]00            	MOV	BYTE [TRANS],0		;No transferes
 22080                                  	;mov	ax,[es:di+15h]
 22081 00003772 268B4515                	MOV	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position]
 22082                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+17h]
 22083 00003776 268B5517                	MOV	DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_position+2]
 22084 0000377A 8916[D005]              	MOV	[BYTPOS+2],DX		;Set it
 22085 0000377E A3[CE05]                	MOV	[BYTPOS],AX
 22086                                  	;test	word [es:di+5],8080h
 22087 00003781 26F745058080            	TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet+devid_device
 22088 00003787 753C                    	JNZ	short NOSETSTUFF	;Following not done on devs or NET
 22089 00003789 06                      	PUSH	ES
 22090 0000378A C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		;Point at the DPB
 22091                                  
 22092                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 22093                                  	;;mov	bl,[es:bp+0]
 22094                                  	;MOV	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]
 22095                                  	; 05/12/2022
 22096 0000378E 268A5E00                	mov	bl,[es:bp]
 22097                                  	
 22098 00003792 881E[7605]              	MOV	[THISDRV],BL		;Set THISDRV
 22099                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 22100 00003796 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 22101                                  
 22102                                  	;; MSDOS 3.3
 22103                                  	;cmp	dx,bx
 22104                                  	;jnb	short EOFERR
 22105                                  	;div	bx
 22106                                  	;mov	[SECPOS],ax
 22107                                  	;mov	[BYTSECPOS],dx
 22108                                  	;mov	dx,ax
 22109                                  	;;and	al,[es:bp+4]
 22110                                  	;AND	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 22111                                  	;mov	[SECCLUSPOS],al
 22112                                  	;mov	ax,cx
 22113                                  	;;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 22114                                  	;MOV	CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 22115                                  	;shr	dx,cl
 22116                                  	;mov	[CLUSNUM],dx
 22117                                  	;pop	es
 22118                                  	;mov	cx,ax
 22119                                  
 22120                                  	; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22121                                  
 22122                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 22123                                  ;M039: Optimized this section.
 22124 0000379A 51                              PUSH    CX			;SHR32 and DIV32 use CX.
 22125 0000379B E83405                  	call	DIV32			;DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem)
 22126 0000379E 8916[CC05]              	MOV	[BYTSECPOS],DX
 22127 000037A2 A3[C405]                	MOV	[SECPOS],AX
 22128 000037A5 890E[C605]              	MOV	[SECPOS+2],CX
 22129 000037A9 89CA                    	MOV	DX,CX
 22130                                  
 22131 000037AB 89C3                    	MOV	BX,AX
 22132                                  	;and	bl,[es:bp+4]
 22133 000037AD 26225E04                	AND	BL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 22134 000037B1 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 22135                                  
 22136 000037B5 E84105                  	call	SHR32			;(DX:AX SHR dpb_cluster_shift)
 22137 000037B8 59                      	POP	CX			;CX = byte count.
 22138 000037B9 751F                    	JNZ	short EOFERR		;cluster number above 64k
 22139                                  	;cmp	ax,[es:bp+0Dh]
 22140 000037BB 263B460D                	CMP	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER] ;>32mb  if > disk size ;AN000;
 22141 000037BF 7719                    	JA	short EOFERR		   ;>32mb  then EOF       ;AN000;
 22142                                  
 22143 000037C1 A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 22144 000037C4 07                      	POP	ES			; ES:DI point to SFT
 22145                                  ;M039
 22146                                  
 22147                                  NOSETSTUFF:
 22148 000037C5 89C8                    	MOV	AX,CX		; AX = Byte count.
 22149 000037C7 0306[2C03]              	ADD	AX,[DMAADD]	; See if it will fit in one segment
 22150 000037CB 730C                    	JNC	short setup_OK	; Must be less than 64
 22151 000037CD A1[2C03]                	MOV	AX,[DMAADD]
 22152 000037D0 F7D8                    	NEG	AX		; Amount of room left in segment (know
 22153                                  				;    less than 64K since max value of CX
 22154                                  				;    is FFFF).
 22155 000037D2 7501                    	JNZ	short NoDec
 22156 000037D4 48                      	DEC	AX
 22157                                  NoDec:
 22158 000037D5 89C1                    	MOV	CX,AX		; Can do this much
 22159 000037D7 E304                    	JCXZ	NOROOM		; Silly user gave Xaddr of FFFF in segment
 22160                                  setup_OK:

 22175                                  ;Break	<BREAKDOWN -- CUT A USER READ OR WRITE INTO PIECES>
 22176                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22177                                  ;
 22178                                  ; Procedure Name : BREAKDOWN
 22179                                  ;
 22180                                  ; Inputs:
 22181                                  ;	CX = Length of disk transfer in bytes
 22182                                  ;	ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 22183                                  ;	[BYTSECPOS] = Byte position within first sector
 22184                                  ;	DS = DOSDATA
 22185                                  ; Outputs:
 22186                                  ;	[BYTCNT1] = Bytes to transfer in first sector
 22187                                  ;	[SECCNT] = No. of whole sectors to transfer
 22188                                  ;	[BYTCNT2] = Bytes to transfer in last sector
 22189                                  ; AX, BX, DX destroyed. No other registers affected.
 22190                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22191                                  
 22192                                  BREAKDOWN:

 22194 000037E3 89CB                    	MOV	BX,CX

 22197                                  	;sub	ax,[es:bp+2]

 22200 000037EF 29C3                    	SUB	BX,AX		; Subtract from total length

 22202 000037F3 01D8                    	ADD	AX,BX		; Don't use all of the rest of the sector
 22203 000037F5 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX		; And no bytes are left
 22204                                  SAVFIR:

 22210 00003802 A3[D605]                	MOV	[SECCNT],AX
 22211 00003805 8916[D405]              	MOV	[BYTCNT2],DX	; Bytes remaining for last sector
 22212                                  	; MSDOS 3.3

 22216                                  	;retnz

 22219                                  	;MOV	[SECCNT],DX	; DX = 0
 22220                                  _RET45:
