 22662                                  ; Inputs:
 22663                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors read. (These constitute a block of
 22664                                  ;            sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 22665                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 22666                                  ;       [TEMP_VAR2]:[TEMP_VAR] = Transfer address (destination data address).
 22667                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 22668                                  ;
 22669                                  ; Function:
 22670                                  ;	The Buffer Queue is scanned: the contents of any dirty buffers are
 22671                                  ;	"read" into the transfer memory block, so that the transfer memory
 22672                                  ;	reflects the most recent data.
 22673                                  ;
 22674                                  ; Outputs:
 22675                                  ;       Transfer memory updated as required.
 22676                                  ;
 22677                                  ; Uses:
 22678                                  ;       DS,AX,BX,CX,SI,DI destroyed.
 22679                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 22680                                  ;
 22681                                  ; Notes:
 22682                                  ;       FIRST_BUFF_ADDR is set-up to contain the LAST buffer to check, rather
 22683                                  ;	than the FIRST.
 22684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 22685                                  ;M039: Created
 22686                                  
 22687                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 22688                                  ; DOSCODE:78F0h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 22689                                  
 22690                                  ; 18/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 22691                                  ; DOSCODE:78DCh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 22692                                  
 22693                                  ;procedure DskRdBufScan,NEAR
 22694                                  ;
 22695                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 22696                                  
 22697                                  DskRdBufScan:
 22698 00003935 36833E[7100]00          	cmp	word [ss:DirtyBufferCount],0 ; Any dirty buffers?
 22699 0000393B 743C                    	je	short bufx		     ; -no, skip all work.
 22700                                  
 22701 0000393D 368B1E[0706]            	mov     bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]
 22702 00003942 89DE                    	mov     si,bx
 22703 00003944 01D1                    	add     cx,dx
 22704 00003946 83D600                  	adc     si,0
 22705                                  
 22706 00003949 E80F1F                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> 1st buf in queue.
 22707                                  	;mov	ax,[di+2]
 22708 0000394C 8B4502                  	mov     ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_prev]
 22709 0000394F 36A3[BB0E]              	mov     [ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR],ax
 22710                                  		
 22711                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 22712                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 22713                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 22714                                  	; 15/12/2022
 22715 00003953 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 22716                                  
 22717                                  ;       BX:DX = Extent start.
 22718                                  ;       SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 22719                                  ;          AL = Drive #.
 22720                                  ;       DS:DI-> 1st buffer in queue.
 22721                                  ;[FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] = Address offset of last buffer in queue.
 22722                                  
 22723                                  bufq:	
 22724                                  	;cmp	al,[di+4]
 22725 00003957 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 22726 0000395A 7514                    	jne	short bufq1        	;  -no, jump.
 22727                                  
 22728                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 22729                                  ;       ja	short bufq1		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 22730                                  
 22731                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 22732 0000395C 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 22733 0000395F 7503                    	jne	short bufq01
 22734                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 22735 00003961 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 22736                                  bufq01:
 22737 00003964 770A                    	ja	short bufq1
 22738                                  
 22739                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 22740                                  ;       ja	short bufq2		;Jump if Extent end >= buffer sector.
 22741                                  
 22742                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 22743 00003966 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 22744 00003969 7503                    	jne	short bufq02
 22745                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 22746 0000396B 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 22747                                  bufq02:
 22748 0000396E 770A                    	ja	short bufq2
 22749                                  bufq1:	
 22750 00003970 363B3E[BB0E]            	cmp     di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 22751 00003975 8B3D                    	mov	di,[di]
 22752                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next] ; Set-up for next buffer.
 22753 00003977 75DE                    	jne	short bufq		; -no, do next buffer
 22754                                  bufx:
 22755 00003979 C3                      	retn				;Exit.
 22756                                  
 22757                                  ;       Buffer's sector is in Extent: if it is dirty, copy its contents to
 22758                                  ;	transfer memory; otherwise, just re-position it in the buffer queue
 22759                                  ;       as MRU (Most Recently Used).
 22760                                  
 22761                                  bufq2:	
 22762 0000397A 50                      	push	ax
 22763                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 22764 0000397B F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 22765 0000397F 742D                    	jz	short bufq3                    ; -no, jump.
 22766                                  
 22767                                  ;       SaveReg <cx,dx,si,di,es>
 22768 00003981 51                      	push	cx
 22769 00003982 52                      	push	dx
 22770 00003983 56                      	push	si
 22771 00003984 57                      	push	di
 22772 00003985 06                      	push	es
 22773                                  
 22774 00003986 89D0                    	mov     ax,dx
 22775                                  	;sub	ax,[di+6]
 22776 00003988 2B4506                  	sub	ax,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 22777 0000398B F7D8                    	neg	ax
 22778                                  
 22779                                  ;       AX = offset (in sectors) of buffer sector within Transfer memory
 22780                                  ;            block. (Note: the upper word of the sector # may be ignored
 22781                                  ;	     since no more than 64k bytes will ever be read. This 64k limit
 22782                                  ;            is imposed by the input parameters of the disk read operation.)
 22783                                  
 22784                                  	;lea	si,[di+20]
 22785 0000398D 8D7514                  	lea	si,[di+BUFINSIZ]	;DS:SI -> buffer data.
 22786                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 22787 00003990 268B4E02                	mov     cx,[es:bp+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ;CX = sector size (in bytes).
 22788 00003994 F7E1                    	mul     cx			;AX = offset (in bytes) of buf. sector
 22789 00003996 368B3E[0C06]            	mov     di,[ss:TEMP_VAR]
 22790 0000399B 01C7                    	add	di,ax
 22791 0000399D 368E06[0E06]            	mov	es,[ss:TEMP_VAR2]
 22792 000039A2 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 22793                                  
 22794                                  ;	   CX = sector size (in WORDs) ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 22795                                  ;       DS:SI-> Buffer sector data.
 22796                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 22797                                  
 22798 000039A4 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy buffer sector to Transfer memory
 22799                                  	;; 04/05/2019
 22800                                  	;;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 22801                                  	;;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 22802                                  	;jnc	short bufq03	
 22803                                  	;movsb
 22804                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 22805                                  	;adc	cx,0
 22806                                  	;rep	movsb
 22807                                  	; 22/09/2023
 22808 000039A6 7301                    	jnc	short bufq03
 22809 000039A8 A4                      	movsb
 22810                                  bufq03:
 22811                                  	;RestoreReg <es,di,si,dx,cx>
 22812 000039A9 07                      	pop	es
 22813 000039AA 5F                      	pop	di
 22814 000039AB 5E                      	pop	si
 22815 000039AC 5A                      	pop	dx
 22816 000039AD 59                      	pop	cx
 22817                                  
 22818                                  ;       DS:DI -> current buffer.
 22819                                  bufq3:	
 22820 000039AE 89F8                    	mov     ax,di			;DS:AX -> Current buffer.
 22821                                          ;invoke SCANPLACE
 22822 000039B0 E8BA1E                  	call	SCANPLACE
 22823 000039B3 363B06[BB0E]            	cmp	ax,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR] ;Last buffer?
 22824 000039B8 58                      	pop	ax
 22825                                  	;jne	short bufq		; -no, jump.
 22826                                  	;;jmp	short bufx		; -yes, exit.
 22827                                  	;; 12/06/2019
 22828                                  	;retn
 22829                                  	; 18/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compability)
 22830 000039B9 759C                    	jne	short bufq
 22831 000039BB EBBC                    	jmp	short bufx
 22832                                  
 22833                                  ;EndProc DskRdBufScan
 22834

 23531                                  ;Break   <DskWrtBufPurge -- Disk Write Buffer Purge>
 23532                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23533                                  ;
 23534                                  ; Procedure Name : DskWrtBufPurge
 23535                                  ;
 23536                                  ; Inputs:
 23537                                  ;       CX = # of contiguous sectors to write. (These constitute a block of
 23538                                  ;	     sectors, also termed an "Extent".)
 23539                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX = physical sector # of first sector in extent.
 23540                                  ;       ES:BP -> Drive Parameter Block (DPB).
 23541                                  ;
 23542                                  ; Function:
 23543                                  ;       Purge the Buffer Queue and the Secondary Cache of any buffers which
 23544                                  ;	are in Extent; they are being over-written.
 23545                                  ;
 23546                                  ; Outputs:
 23547                                  ;       (Same as Input.)
 23548                                  ; Uses:
 23549                                  ;       All registers except DS,AX,SI,DI preserved.
 23550                                  ;       SS override for all global variables.
 23551                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23552                                  ;M039: Created
 23553                                  
 23554                                  ;procedure   DskWrtBufPurge,NEAR
 23555                                  ;
 23556                                  ;ASSUME  DS:NOTHING
 23557                                  
 23558                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23559                                  ; DOSCODE:7C0Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23560                                  
 23561                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23562                                  ; DOSCODE:7BD4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23563                                  
 23564                                  DskWrtBufPurge:
 23565                                  	;SaveReg <bx,cx>
 23566 00003C4C 53                      	push	bx
 23567 00003C4D 51                      	push	cx
 23568                                  
 23569 00003C4E 368B1E[0706]            	mov	bx,[ss:HIGH_SECTOR]	;BX:DX = Extent start (sector #).
 23570 00003C53 89DE                    	mov	si,bx
 23571 00003C55 01D1                    	add	cx,dx
 23572 00003C57 83D600                  	adc	si,0                    ;SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 23573                                  
 23574                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23575                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 23576                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+DPB.DRIVE]
 23577                                  	; 15/12/2022
 23578 00003C5A 268A4600                	mov	al,[es:bp]
 23579                                  
 23580                                  ;	BX:DX = Extent start.
 23581                                  ;	SI:CX = Extent end + 1.
 23582                                  ;	AL = Drive #
 23583                                  
 23584 00003C5E 36833E[7700]00          	cmp	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0 ;Secondary cache in-use?
 23585 00003C64 7431                    	je	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 23586                                  
 23587                                  ;	If any of the sectors to be written are in the secondary cache (SC),
 23588                                  ;	invalidate the entire SC. (This is an optimization; we really only
 23589                                  ;	need to invalidate those sectors which intersect, but that's slower.)
 23590                                  
 23591 00003C66 363A06[B00D]            	cmp	al,[ss:CurSC_DRIVE]	;Same drive?
 23592 00003C6B 752A                    	jne	short nosc		; -no, jump.
 23593                                  
 23594 00003C6D 50                      	push    ax
 23595 00003C6E 36A1[B10D]              	mov     ax,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR]
 23596 00003C72 368B3E[B30D]            	mov     di,[ss:CurSC_SECTOR+2]	;DI:AX = SC start.
 23597                                  
 23598                                  	;Cmp32	si,cx,di,ax		;Extent end < SC start?
 23599                                  	;jbe	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 23600                                  
 23601 00003C77 39FE                    	cmp	si,di
 23602 00003C79 7502                    	jne	short sc01
 23603 00003C7B 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 23604                                  sc01: 
 23605 00003C7D 7617                    	jbe	short sc5	
 23606                                  
 23607 00003C7F 360306[7700]            	add	ax,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]
 23608 00003C84 83D700                  	adc	di,0                    ;DI:AX = SC end + 1.
 23609                                  	
 23610                                  	;Cmp32	bx,dx,di,ax             ;Extent start > SC end?
 23611                                  	;jae	short sc5		; -yes, jump.
 23612                                  
 23613 00003C87 39FB                    	cmp	bx,di
 23614 00003C89 7502                    	jne	short sc02
 23615 00003C8B 39C2                    	cmp	dx,ax
 23616                                  sc02:
 23617 00003C8D 7307                    	jnb	short sc5
 23618                                  
 23619 00003C8F 36C706[B50D]0000        	mov	word [ss:SC_STATUS],0	;Extent intersects SC: invalidate SC.
 23620                                  sc5:	
 23621 00003C96 58                      	pop     ax
 23622                                  
 23623                                  ;	Free any buffered sectors which are in Extent; they are being over-
 23624                                  ;	written.
 23625                                  
 23626                                  nosc:	
 23627 00003C97 E8C11B                  	call	GETCURHEAD		;DS:DI -> first buffer in queue.
 23628                                  
 23629                                  _bufq:	
 23630                                  	;cmpo	al,[di+4]
 23631 00003C9A 3A4504                  	cmp     al,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID] ;Same drive?
 23632 00003C9D 7527                    	jne	short bufq5		; -no, jump.
 23633                                  
 23634                                  ;       Cmp32   bx,dx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 23635                                  ;       ja	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent start > buffer sector.
 23636                                  
 23637                                  	;cmp	bx,[di+8]
 23638 00003C9F 3B5D08                  	cmp	bx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 23639 00003CA2 7503                    	jne	short bufq04
 23640                                  	;cmp	dx,[di+6]
 23641 00003CA4 3B5506                  	cmp	dx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 23642                                  bufq04:
 23643 00003CA7 771D                    	ja	short bufq5
 23644                                  
 23645                                  ;       Cmp32   si,cx,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector+2]>,<WORD PTR [di.buf_sector]>
 23646                                  ;       jbe	short bufq5		;Jump if Extent end < buffer sector.
 23647                                  
 23648                                  	;cmp	si,[di+8]
 23649 00003CA9 3B7508                  	cmp	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]
 23650 00003CAC 7503                    	jne	short bufq05
 23651                                  	;cmp	cx,[di+6]
 23652 00003CAE 3B4D06                  	cmp	cx,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 23653                                  bufq05:
 23654 00003CB1 7613                    	jbe	short bufq5
 23655                                  
 23656                                  ;	Buffer's sector is in Extent, so free it; it is being over-written.
 23657                                  
 23658                                  	;test	byte [di+5],40h
 23659 00003CB3 F6450540                	test	byte [di+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ;Buffer dirty?
 23660 00003CB7 7403                    	jz	short bufq4		; -no, jump.
 23661 00003CB9 E8201E                  	call	DEC_DIRTY_COUNT		; -yes, decrement dirty count.
 23662                                  bufq4:
 23663                                  	;mov	word [di+4],20FFh
 23664 00003CBC C74504FF20              	mov     word [di+BUFFINFO.buf_ID],((buf_visit<<8)|0FFh)
 23665                                  
 23666 00003CC1 E8A91B                  	call	SCANPLACE
 23667 00003CC4 EB02                    	jmp     short bufq6
 23668                                  bufq5: 
 23669 00003CC6 8B3D                    	mov     di,[di]
 23670                                  	;mov	di,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_next]
 23671                                  bufq6: 
 23672 00003CC8 363B3E[BB0E]            	cmp	di,[ss:FIRST_BUFF_ADDR]	;Scanned entire buffer queue?
 23673 00003CCD 75CB                    	jne	short _bufq		; --no, go do next buffer.
 23674                                  	
 23675                                  	;RestoreReg <cx,bx>
 23676 00003CCF 59                      	pop	cx
 23677 00003CD0 5B                      	pop	bx
 23678 00003CD1 C3                      	retn
 23679                                  
 23680                                  ;EndProc DskWrtBufPurge
 23681                                  
 23682                                  ;Break   <DIV32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT DIVIDE>
 23683                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23684                                  ;
 23685                                  ; Procedure Name : DIV32
 23686                                  ;
 23687                                  ; Inputs:
 23688                                  ;       DX:AX = 32 bit dividend   BX= divisor
 23689                                  ; Function:
 23690                                  ;       Perform 32 bit division:  DX:AX/BX = CX:AX + DX (rem.)
 23691                                  ; Outputs:
 23692                                  ;       CX:AX = quotient , DX= remainder
 23693                                  ; Uses:
 23694                                  ;       All registers except AX,CX,DX preserved.
 23695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23696                                  ;M039: DIV32 optimized for divisor of 512 (common sector size).
 23697                                  
 23698                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23699                                  ; DOSCODE:7C94h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23700                                  
 23701                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23702                                  ; DOSCODE:7C5Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23703                                  
 23704                                  DIV32:
 23705 00003CD2 81FB0002                	cmp	bx,512
 23706 00003CD6 7515                    	jne	short div5
 23707                                  
 23708 00003CD8 89D1                    	mov	cx,dx
 23709 00003CDA 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax           ; CX:AX = Dividend
 23710 00003CDC 81E2FF01                	and	dx,(512-1)      ; DX = Remainder
 23711 00003CE0 88E0                    	mov	al,ah
 23712 00003CE2 88CC                    	mov	ah,cl
 23713 00003CE4 88E9                    	mov	cl,ch
 23714 00003CE6 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch
 23715 00003CE8 D1E9                    	shr	cx,1
 23716 00003CEA D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 23717 00003CEC C3                      	retn
 23718                                  div5:	
 23719 00003CED 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 23720 00003CEF 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx
 23721 00003CF1 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 23722 00003CF3 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; 0:AX/BX
 23723 00003CF5 91                      	xchg	cx,ax
 23724 00003CF6 F7F3                    	div	bx              ; DX:AX/BX
 23725 00003CF8 C3                      	retn
 23726                                  
 23727                                  ;Break   <SHR32 -- PERFORM 32 BIT SHIFT RIGHT>
 23728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23729                                  ;
 23730                                  ; Procedure Name : SHR32
 23731                                  ;
 23732                                  ; Inputs:
 23733                                  ;	DX:AX = 32 bit sector number
 23734                                  ; Function:
 23735                                  ;       Perform 32 bit shift right
 23736                                  ; Outputs:
 23737                                  ;	AX = cluster number
 23738                                  ;	ZF = 1 if no error
 23739                                  ;	   = 0 if error (cluster number > 64k)
 23740                                  ; Uses:
 23741                                  ;       DX,CX
 23742                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23743                                  ; M017	- SHR32 rewritten for better performance
 23744                                  ; M039	- Additional optimization
 23745                                  
 23746                                  ; 04/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23747                                  ; DOSCODE:7CBBh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23748                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23749                                  ; DOSCODE:7C81h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23750                                  
 23751                                  SHR32:
 23752                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+5]
 23753 00003CF9 268A4E05                	mov	cl,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_SHIFT]
 23754 00003CFD 30ED                    	xor	ch,ch	    ;ZF=1
 23755 00003CFF E306                    	jcxz	norota
 23756                                  
 23757                                  rotashft2:
 23758 00003D01 D1EA                    	shr	dx,1	    ;ZF reflects state of DX.
 23759 00003D03 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1	    ;ZF not affected.
 23760 00003D05 E2FA                    	loop	rotashft2
 23761                                  norota:
 23762 00003D07 C3                      	retn
 23763                                  
 23764                                  ;============================================================================
 23765                                  ; DIR.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991

 23770                                  ;	TITLE	DIR - Directory and path cracking
 23771                                  ;	NAME	Dir
 23772                                  
 23773                                  ;Break	<FINDENTRY -- LOOK FOR AN ENTRY>
 23774                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23775                                  ;
 23776                                  ; Procedure Name : FINDENTRY,SEARCH
 23777                                  ;
 23778                                  ; Inputs:
 23779                                  ;	[THISDPB] set
 23780                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 23781                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Starting directory sector number
 23782                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Next cluster of directory
 23783                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors/Cluster
 23784                                  ;	[NAME1] = Name to look for
 23785                                  ; Function:
 23786                                  ;	Find file name in disk directory.
 23787                                  ;	"?" matches any character.
 23788                                  ; Outputs:
 23789                                  ;	Carry set if name not found
 23790                                  ;	ELSE
 23791                                  ;	Zero set if attributes match (always except when creating)
 23792                                  ;	AH = Device ID (bit 7 set if not disk)
 23793                                  ;	[THISDPB] = Base of drive parameters
 23794                                  ;	DS = DOSGROUP
 23795                                  ;	ES = DOSGROUP
 23796                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer into directory buffer
 23797                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:SI = Pointer to First Cluster field in directory entry
 23798                                  ;	[CURBUF] has directory record with match
 23799                                  ;	[NAME1] has file name
 23800                                  ;	[LASTENT] is entry number of the entry
 23801                                  ; All other registers destroyed.
 23802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23803                                  
 23804                                  ;hkn; called from rename.asm and dir2.asm. DS must be already set up at
 23805                                  ;hkn; this point.
 23806                                  
 23807                                  SEARCH:
 23808                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23809                                  	; DOSCODE:7C90h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23810                                  
 23811                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 23812                                  	; DOSCODE:7CCA (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 23813                                  
 23814                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 23815                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 45B3h 
 23816                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 23817                                  
 23818                                  	; 24/01/2024
 23819                                  
 23820                                  	;entry	FindEntry
 23821                                  FINDENTRY:
 23822 00003D08 E82C04                  	call	STARTSRCH
 23823 00003D0B A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 23824                                  	;and	al,9Eh
 23825 00003D0E 24DE                    	AND	AL,~attr_ignore		; Ignore useless bits
 23826                                  	;cmp	al,8
 23827 00003D10 3C08                    	CMP	AL,attr_volume_id	; Looking for vol ID only ?
 23828 00003D12 7503                    	JNZ	short NOTVOLSRCH	; No
 23829 00003D14 E86A01                  	CALL	SETROOTSRCH		; Yes force search of root
 23830                                  NOTVOLSRCH:
 23831 00003D17 E8FA00                  	CALL	GETENTRY
 23832                                  	;JNC	short SRCH
 23833                                  	;JMP	SETESRET
 23834                                  	; 24/01/2024
 23835 00003D1A 723F                    	jc	short SETESRET
 23836                                  
 23837                                  	;entry	Srch
 23838                                  SRCH:
 23839 00003D1C 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 23840 00003D1D 8E1E[E405]              	MOV	DS,[CURBUF+2]
 23841                                  
 23842                                  ;	(DS:BX) = directory entry address
 23843                                  
 23844 00003D21 8A27                    	mov	ah,[BX]
 23845                                  	;MOV	AH,[BX+dir_entry.dir_name] ; mov ah,[bx+0]
 23846 00003D23 08E4                    	OR	AH,AH			; End of directory?
 23847 00003D25 7437                    	JZ	short FREE
 23848                                  
 23849                                  ;hkn; SS override
 23850 00003D27 363A26[7F05]            	CMP	AH,[SS:DELALL]		; Free entry?
 23851 00003D2C 7430                    	JZ	short FREE

 23853 00003D2E F6470B08                	TEST	byte [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_volume_id
 23854                                  					; Volume ID file?
 23855 00003D32 7405                    	JZ	short CHKFNAM 		; NO
 23856                                  
 23857                                  ;hkn; SS override
 23858 00003D34 36FE06[7B05]            	INC	BYTE [SS:VOLID]
 23859                                  CHKFNAM:
 23860                                  ;	Context ES
 23861 00003D39 8CD6                    	MOV	SI,SS
 23862 00003D3B 8EC6                    	MOV	ES,SI
 23863 00003D3D 89DE                    	MOV	SI,BX
 23864                                  
 23865                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 23866 00003D3F BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 23867                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 23868                                  
 23869                                  ;hkn; SS override for NAME1
 23870                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SS:NAME1],0E5H	; special char check

 23874 00003D42 26803DE5                	cmp	byte [es:di],0E5h
 23875 00003D46 7504                    	jnz	short NO_E5
 23876 00003D48 26C60505                	mov	byte [es:di],05h
 23877                                  NO_E5:
 23878                                  ;;;;; 7/29/86
 23879 00003D4C E86100                  	CALL	MetaCompare
 23880 00003D4F 7429                    	JZ	short FOUND
 23881 00003D51 1F                      	POP	DS
 23882                                  
 23883                                  	;entry	NEXTENT
 23884                                  NEXTENT:
 23885 00003D52 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 23886 00003D56 E86600                  	CALL	NEXTENTRY
 23887 00003D59 73C1                    	JNC	short SRCH
 23888                                  	;JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 23889                                  	; 24/01/2024
 23890                                  SETESRET:
 23891 00003D5B 16                      	PUSH	SS
 23892 00003D5C 07                      	POP	ES
 23893 00003D5D C3                      	retn
 23894                                  FREE:
 23895 00003D5E 1F                      	POP	DS
 23896 00003D5F 8B0E[4803]              	MOV	CX,[LASTENT]
 23897 00003D63 3B0E[D805]              	CMP	CX,[ENTFREE]
 23898 00003D67 7304                    	JAE	short TSTALL
 23899 00003D69 890E[D805]              	MOV	[ENTFREE],CX
 23900                                  TSTALL:
 23901 00003D6D 3A26[7F05]              	CMP	AH,[DELALL]		; At end of directory?
 23902                                  NEXTENTJ:
 23903 00003D71 74DF                    	je	short NEXTENT 		; No - continue search
 23904 00003D73 890E[DA05]              	MOV	[ENTLAST],CX
 23905 00003D77 F9                      	STC
 23906 00003D78 EBE1                    	JMP	SHORT SETESRET
 23907                                  
 23908                                  FOUND:
 23909                                  ; We have a file with a matching name. We must now consider the attributes:
 23910                                  ; ATTRIB	Action
 23911                                  ; ------	------
 23912                                  ; Volume_ID	Is Volume_ID in test?
 23913                                  ; Otherwise	If no create then Is ATTRIB+extra superset of test?
 23914                                  ;		If create then Is ATTRIB equal to test?
 23915                                  
 23916 00003D7A 8A2C                    	MOV	CH,[SI] 		; Attributes of file
 23917 00003D7C 1F                      	POP	DS
 23918 00003D7D 8A26[6B05]              	MOV	AH,[ATTRIB]		; Attributes of search
 23919                                  	;and	ah,9Eh
 23920 00003D81 80E4DE                  	AND	AH,~attr_ignore
 23921                                  	;lea	si,[si+15]
 23922 00003D84 8D740F                  	LEA	SI,[SI+dir_entry.dir_first-dir_entry.dir_attr]
 23923                                  					; point to first cluster field
 23924                                  	;test	ch,8
 23925 00003D87 F6C508                  	TEST	CH,attr_volume_id	; Volume ID file?
 23926 00003D8A 7409                    	JZ	short check_one_volume_id ; Nope check other attributes
 23927                                  	;test	ah,8
 23928 00003D8C F6C408                  	TEST	AH,attr_volume_id	; Can we find Volume ID?
 23929                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Nope, (not even $FCB_CREATE)
 23930                                  	; 16/12/2022
 23931 00003D8F 74C1                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 23932                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23933                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 23934 00003D91 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Set zero flag for $FCB_CREATE
 23935 00003D93 EB11                    	JMP	SHORT RETFF		; Found Volume ID
 23936                                  check_one_volume_id:
 23937                                  	;CMP	ah,8
 23938 00003D95 80FC08                  	CMP	AH,attr_volume_id	; Looking only for Volume ID?
 23939                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Yes, continue search
 23940                                  	; 16/12/2022
 23941 00003D98 74B8                    	je	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 23942                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ
 23943 00003D9A E8AE03                  	CALL	MatchAttributes
 23944 00003D9D 7407                    	JZ	SHORT RETFF
 23945 00003D9F F606[7E05]FF            	TEST	BYTE [CREATING],-1	; Pass back mismatch if creating
 23946                                  	; 16/12/2022
 23947                                  	;JZ	short NEXTENTJ		; Otherwise continue searching
 23948 00003DA4 74AC                    	jz	short NEXTENT ; 19/05/2019
 23949                                  RETFF:
 23950 00003DA6 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 23951                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 23952                                  	;MOV	AH,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]  ; mov ah,[es:bp+0]
 23953                                  	; 15/12/2022
 23954 00003DAA 268A6600                	MOV	AH,[ES:BP]
 23955                                  ;SETESRET:
 23956                                  	;PUSH	SS
 23957                                  	;POP	ES
 23958                                  	;retn
 23959                                  	; 24/01/2024
 23960 00003DAE EBAB                    	jmp	short SETESRET	
 23961                                  
 23962                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23963                                  ;
 23964                                  ; Procedure Name : MetaCompare
 23965                                  ;
 23966                                  ; Inputs:
 23967                                  ;	DS:SI -> 11 character FCB style name NO '?'
 23968                                  ;	    Typically this is a directory entry. It MUST be in upper case
 23969                                  ;	ES:DI -> 11 character FCB style name with possible '?'
 23970                                  ;	    Typically this is a FCB or SFT. It MUST be in upper case
 23971                                  ; Function:
 23972                                  ;	Compare FCB style names allowing for ? match to any char
 23973                                  ; Outputs:
 23974                                  ;	Zero if match else NZ
 23975                                  ; Destroys CX,SI,DI all others preserved
 23976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23977                                  
 23978                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 23979                                  	; DOSCODE:7D3Fh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 23980                                  
 23981                                  MetaCompare:
 23982 00003DB0 B90B00                  	MOV	CX,11
 23983                                  WILDCRD:
 23984 00003DB3 F3A6                    	REPE	CMPSB
 23985 00003DB5 7407                    	JZ	short MetaRet 		; most of the time we will fail.
 23986                                  CHECK_META:
 23987 00003DB7 26807DFF3F              	CMP	BYTE [ES:DI-1],"?"
 23988 00003DBC 74F5                    	JZ	short WILDCRD
 23989                                  MetaRet:
 23990 00003DBE C3                       	retn				; Zero set, Match
 23991                                  
 23992                                  ;Break	<NEXTENTRY -- STEP THROUGH DIRECTORY>
 23993                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 23994                                  ;
 23995                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTENTRY
 23996                                  ;
 23997                                  ; Inputs:
 23998                                  ;	Same as outputs of GETENTRY, above
 23999                                  ; Function:
 24000                                  ;	Update BX, and [LASTENT] for next directory entry.
 24001                                  ;	Carry set if no more.
 24002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24003                                  
 24004                                  NEXTENTRY:
 24005                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24006                                  	; DOSCODE:7D4Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS) 
 24007                                  
 24008                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24009                                  	; DOSCODE:7D88h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 24010                                  
 24011                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24012                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3) - Offset 4671h 
 24013                                  	; 15/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0
 24014                                  
 24015 00003DBF A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 24016 00003DC2 3B06[DA05]              	CMP	AX,[ENTLAST]
 24017 00003DC6 7422                    	JZ	short NONE
 24018 00003DC8 40                      	INC	AX
 24019                                  	;ADD	BX,32
 24020 00003DC9 8D5F20                  	LEA	BX,[BX+32]
 24021 00003DCC 39D3                    	CMP	BX,DX
 24022                                  	; 21/11/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS (DOSCODE:7D5Dh)
 24023                                  	;JB	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.0 src (dir.asm)
 24024                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24025 00003DCE 751C                    	jne	short HAVIT ; MSDOS 6.21 (DOSCODE:7D97h)
 24026 00003DD0 8A1E[7305]              	MOV	BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 24027 00003DD4 FEC3                    	INC	BL
 24028 00003DD6 3A1E[7705]              	CMP	BL,[CLUSFAC]
 24029 00003DDA 7215                    	JB	short SAMECLUS
 24030 00003DDC 8B1E[DC05]              	MOV	BX,[NXTCLUSNUM]
 24031 00003DE0 E8C816                  	call	IsEOF
 24032 00003DE3 7305                    	JAE	short NONE
 24033                                  	; 23/07/2019
 24034 00003DE5 83FB02                  	CMP	BX,2
 24035                                  	;JB	short NONE
 24036                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 24037                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24038 00003DE8 732D                    	jnb	short GETENT
 24039                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24040                                  	;JB	short NONE
 24041                                  	;JMP	short GETENT
 24042                                  NONE:
 24043 00003DEA F9                      	STC
 24044 00003DEB C3                      	retn
 24045                                  HAVIT:

 24047 00003DEF F8                      	CLC
 24048                                  nextentry_retn:
 24049 00003DF0 C3                      	retn
 24050                                  SAMECLUS:
 24051 00003DF1 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 24052 00003DF5 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24053 00003DF8 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24054 00003DF9 C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 24055                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24056                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24057                                  	;;mov	dx,[di+8]
 24058                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24059                                  	;MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	;AN000; >32mb
 24060                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24061                                  	;MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX 		;AN000; >32mb
 24062                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24063 00003DFD 8B7508                  	mov	si,[di+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]	
 24064                                  	
 24065                                  	;mov	dx,[di+6]
 24066 00003E00 8B5506                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000; >32mb
 24067                                  	;inc	dx ; MSDOS 3.3
 24068                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24069                                  	;ADD	DX,1				;AN000; >32mb
 24070                                  	;ADC	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR],0 	;AN000; >32mb
 24071                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24072 00003E03 42                      	inc	dx
 24073 00003E04 7501                    	jnz	short nextexntry_fc
 24074 00003E06 46                      	inc	si
 24075                                  	;inc	word [SS:HIGH_SECTOR]
 24076                                  nextexntry_fc:
 24077                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24078 00003E07 368936[0706]            	mov	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],si
 24079                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 24080 00003E0C 1F                      	POP	DS
 24081 00003E0D E847F8                  	call	FIRSTCLUSTER
 24082 00003E10 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX
 24083 00003E12 EB23                    	JMP	short SETENTRY
 24084                                  
 24085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24086                                  ;
 24087                                  ; Procedure Name : GETENTRY
 24088                                  ;
 24089                                  ; Inputs:
 24090                                  ;	[LASTENT] has directory entry
 24091                                  ;	ES:BP points to drive parameters
 24092                                  ;	[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[ENTLAST] set for DIR involved
 24093                                  ; Function:
 24094                                  ;	Locates directory entry in preparation for search
 24095                                  ;	GETENT provides entry for passing desired entry in AX
 24096                                  ; Outputs:
 24097                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:BX = Pointer to next directory entry in CURBUF
 24098                                  ;	[CURBUF+2]:DX = Pointer to first byte after end of CURBUF
 24099                                  ;	[LASTENT] = New directory entry number
 24100                                  ;	[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS] set via DIRREAD
 24101                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 24102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24103                                  
 24104                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24105                                  GETENTRY:
 24106                                  	; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24107 00003E14 A1[4803]                	MOV	AX,[LASTENT]
 24108                                  
 24109                                  	;entry	GETENT
 24110                                  GETENT:
 24111 00003E17 A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 24112                                  ;
 24113                                  ; Convert the entry number in AX into a byte offset from the beginning of the
 24114                                  ; directory.
 24115                                  ;
 24116 00003E1A B105                    	mov	cl,5			; shift left by 5 = mult by 32
 24117 00003E1C D3C0                    	rol	ax,cl			; keep hight order bits
 24118 00003E1E 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax
 24119                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24120                                  	;and	ax,0FFE0h
 24121                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24122                                  	;and	ax,~(32-1)		; mask off high order bits
 24123                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24124 00003E20 24E0                    	and	al,0E0h ; ~31
 24125 00003E22 83E21F                  	and	dx,1Fh
 24126                                  	;and	dx,32-1			; mask off low order bits
 24127                                  ;
 24128                                  ; DX:AX contain the byte offset of the required directory entry from the
 24129                                  ; beginning of the directory. Convert this to a sector number. Round the
 24130                                  ; sector size down to a multiple of 32.
 24131                                  ;
 24132                                  	;mov	bx,[es:bp+2]
 24133 00003E25 268B5E02                	MOV	BX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 24134 00003E29 80E3E0                  	and	bl,0E0h
 24135                                  	;AND	BL,255-31		; Must be multiple of 32
 24136 00003E2C F7F3                    	DIV	BX
 24137 00003E2E 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX			; Position within sector
 24138 00003E30 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24139 00003E31 E8CFF7                  	call	DIRREAD
 24140 00003E34 5B                      	POP	BX
 24141                                  	;retc
 24142 00003E35 72B9                    	jc	short nextentry_retn	
 24143                                  SETENTRY:
 24144 00003E37 8B16[E205]              	MOV	DX,[CURBUF]
 24145                                  	;add	dx,16 ; MSDOS 3.3
 24146                                  	;add	dx,20 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 24147 00003E3B 83C214                  	ADD	DX,BUFINSIZ
 24148 00003E3E 01D3                    	ADD	BX,DX
 24149                                  	;add	dx,[es:bp+2]
 24150 00003E40 26035602                	ADD	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]  ; Always clears carry
 24151                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24152                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS contains a 'CLC' here, at DOSCODE:7E15h
 24153 00003E44 F8                      	clc
 24154 00003E45 C3                      	retn
 24155                                  
 24156                                  ;Break	<SETDIRSRCH SETROOTSRCH -- Set Search environments>
 24157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24158                                  ;
 24159                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDIRSRCH,SETROOTSRCH
 24160                                  ;
 24161                                  ; Inputs:
 24162                                  ;	BX cluster number of start of directory
 24163                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24164                                  ;	DI next cluster number from fastopen extended info. DOS 3.3 only
 24165                                  ; Function:
 24166                                  ;	Set up a directory search
 24167                                  ; Outputs:
 24168                                  ;	[DIRSTART] = BX
 24169                                  ;	[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC] set
 24170                                  ;	Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 24171                                  ; destroys AX,DX,BX
 24172                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24173                                  
 24174                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24175                                  SETDIRSRCH:
 24176 00003E46 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 24177 00003E48 7437                    	JZ	short SETROOTSRCH
 24178 00003E4A 891E[C205]              	MOV	[DIRSTART],BX
 24179                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 24180 00003E4E 268A4604                	MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 24181 00003E52 FEC0                    	INC	AL
 24182 00003E54 A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 24183                                  
 24184                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 24185                                  	;SAVE	<SI>
 24186 00003E57 56                      	push	si
 24187                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 24188 00003E58 F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 24189 00003E5D 7507                    	JNZ	short UNP_OK
 24190                                  
 24191                                  ; DOS 3.3 for FastOPen	F.C. 6/12/86
 24192                                  	;invoke	UNPACK
 24193 00003E5F E86016                  	call	UNPACK
 24194 00003E62 7302                    	JNC	short UNP_OK
 24195                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 24196 00003E64 5E                      	pop	si
 24197                                  	;return
 24198 00003E65 C3                      	retn
 24199                                  
 24200                                  UNP_OK:
 24201 00003E66 893E[BC05]              	MOV	[CLUSNUM],DI
 24202 00003E6A 89DA                    	MOV	DX,BX
 24203 00003E6C 30DB                    	XOR	BL,BL
 24204 00003E6E 881E[7305]              	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],BL
 24205                                  	;invoke	FIGREC
 24206 00003E72 E8F60E                  	call	FIGREC
 24207                                  	;RESTORE <SI>
 24208 00003E75 5E                      	pop	si
 24209                                  	
 24210                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24211                                  
 24212                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24213                                  	;PUSH	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 24214                                  	;MOV	DX,[HIGH_SECTOR]	   ;AN000; >32mb
 24215                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC+2],DX		   ;AN000; >32mb
 24216                                  	;POP	DX			   ;AN000; >32mb
 24217                                  
 24218                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24219                                  	;push	dx
 24220                                  	;mov	dx,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 24221                                  	;mov	[DIRSEC+2],dx
 24222                                  	;pop	dx
 24223                                  	;MOV	[DIRSEC],dx
 24224                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24225 00003E76 A1[0706]                	mov	ax,[HIGH_SECTOR]
 24226 00003E79 A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],AX
 24227 00003E7C 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX
 24228                                  
 24229                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24230                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 24231                                  	;CLC
 24232 00003E80 C3                      	retn
 24233                                  
 24234                                  	;entry	SETROOTSRCH
 24235                                  SETROOTSRCH:
 24236 00003E81 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 24237 00003E83 A3[C205]                	MOV	[DIRSTART],AX
 24238                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24239 00003E86 A3[C005]                	mov	[DIRSEC+2],ax ; 0
 24240 00003E89 A2[7305]                	MOV	[SECCLUSPOS],AL
 24241 00003E8C 48                      	DEC	AX
 24242 00003E8D A3[BC05]                	MOV	[CLUSNUM],AX
 24243                                  	;mov	ax,[es:bp+0Bh]
 24244 00003E90 268B460B                	MOV	AX,[ES:BP+DPB.FIRST_SECTOR]
 24245                                  	; 19/05/2019
 24246                                  	;;mov	dx,[es:bp+10h] ; MSDOS 3.3
 24247                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+11h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 24248 00003E94 268B5611                	MOV	DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 24249 00003E98 29D0                    	SUB	AX,DX
 24250 00003E9A A2[7705]                	MOV	[CLUSFAC],AL
 24251 00003E9D 8916[BE05]              	MOV	[DIRSEC],DX		      ;F.C. >32mb
 24252                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24253                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24254                                  	;MOV	WORD [DIRSEC+2],0	      ;F.C. >32mb
 24255 00003EA1 F8                      	CLC
 24256 00003EA2 C3                      	retn

 24258                                  ;============================================================================
 24259                                  ; DIR2.ASM, MSDOS 6.0, 1991
 24260                                  ;============================================================================
 24261                                  ; 27/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 24262                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 24263                                  
 24264                                  ;	TITLE	DIR2 - Directory and path cracking
 24265                                  ;	NAME	Dir2
 24266                                  
 24267                                  ;Break	<GETPATH -- PARSE A WFP>
 24268                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24269                                  ;
 24270                                  ; Procedure Name : GETPATH
 24271                                  ;
 24272                                  ; Inputs:
 24273                                  ;	[WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:\" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 24274                                  ;		terminated; d:/ (note forward slash) indicates a real device).
 24275                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 24276                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 24277                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 24278                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 24279                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Is attribute of search, determines what files can be found
 24280                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 24281                                  ;	[THISDPB] set to DPB if disk otherwise garbage.
 24282                                  ; Function:
 24283                                  ;	Crack the path
 24284                                  ; Outputs:
 24285                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk if disk file
 24286                                  ;	Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Unk if char device
 24287                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 24288                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 24289                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24290                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 24291                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 24292                                  ;	   Zero set
 24293                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 24294                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 24295                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 24296                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 24297                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 24298                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 24299                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 24300                                  ;	   Zero reset
 24301                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path or attribute mismatch
 24302                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 24303                                  ;	ELSE
 24304                                  ;	   [CurBuf] = -1 if root directory
 24305                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 24306                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 24307                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points into [CURBUF] to dir_first field for entry
 24308                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 24309                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 24310                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 24311                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 24312                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 24313                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 24314                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 24315                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it.
 24316                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 24317                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 24318                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 24319                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 24320                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 24321                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 24322                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 24323                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 24324                                  ; DS preserved, Others destroyed
 24325                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24326                                  
 24327                                  ;hkn; called from delete.asm, finfo.asm, mknode.asm and rename.asm.
 24328                                  ;hkn; DS already set up at this point.
 24329                                  
 24330                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24331                                  GETPATH:
 24332                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E500h
 24333 00003EA3 C706[7E05]00E5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256+0 ; Not Creating, not DEL *.*
 24334                                  
 24335                                  ; Same as GetPath only CREATING and DELALL already set
 24336                                  
 24337                                  	;entry	GetPathNoSet
 24338                                  GetPathNoSet:
 24339                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],2	
 24340 00003EA9 C606[2303]02            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Disk
 24341 00003EAE C706[E205]FFFF          	MOV	word [CURBUF],-1	; initial setting
 24342                                  
 24343                                  ; See if the input indicates a device that has already been detected. If so,
 24344                                  ; go build the guy quickly. Otherwise, let findpath find the device.
 24345                                  
 24346 00003EB4 8B3E[B205]              	MOV	DI,[WFP_START]		; point to the beginning of the name
 24347                                  	;cmp	word [DI+1],5C3Ah
 24348                                  	;CMP	WORD [DI+1],'\' << 8 + ':'
 24349 00003EB8 817D013A5C              	cmp	word [DI+1],':\'
 24350 00003EBD 7438                    	JZ	short CrackIt
 24351                                  
 24352                                  ; Let ChkDev find it in the device list
 24353                                  
 24354 00003EBF 83C703                  	ADD	DI,3
 24355                                  	; 18/08/2018
 24356                                  	;MOV	SI,DI			; let CHKDEV see the original name
 24357                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24358                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24359                                  	;mov	si,di ; not required ! (it is written in CHKDEV proc already!)
 24360 00003EC2 E8AB00                  	CALL	CHKDEV
 24361 00003EC5 722E                    	JC	short InternalError
 24362                                  
 24363                                  Build_devJ:
 24364 00003EC7 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24365 00003ECA A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 24366                                  	;mov	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],1
 24367 00003ECD C606[2303]01            	MOV	byte [EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; In the particular case of
 24368                                  					; "finding" a char device
 24369                                  					; set LOCUS to Unknown. This makes
 24370                                  					; certain idiotic problems reported
 24371                                  					; by a certain 3 letter OEM go away.
 24372                                  
 24373                                  ; Take name in name1 and pack it back into where wfp_start points. This
 24374                                  ; guarantees wfp_start pointing to a canonical representation of a device.
 24375                                  ; We are allowed to do this as GetPath is *ALWAYS* called before entering a
 24376                                  ; wfp into the share set.
 24377                                  ;
 24378                                  ; We copy chars from name1 to wfp_start remembering the position of the last
 24379                                  ; non-space seen +1.  This position is kept in DX.
 24380                                  
 24381                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24382 00003ED2 16                      	push	ss
 24383 00003ED3 07                      	pop	es
 24384                                  
 24385                                  ;hkn; NAME1 is in DOSDATA
 24386 00003ED4 BE[4B05]                	mov	si,NAME1
 24387 00003ED7 8B3E[B205]              	mov	di,[WFP_START]
 24388 00003EDB 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24389 00003EDD B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; 8 chars in device name
 24390                                  MoveLoop:
 24391 00003EE0 AC                      	lodsb
 24392 00003EE1 AA                      	stosb
 24393 00003EE2 3C20                    	cmp	al," "
 24394 00003EE4 7402                    	jz	short NoSave
 24395                                  
 24396 00003EE6 89FA                    	mov	dx,di
 24397                                  NoSave:
 24398 00003EE8 E2F6                    	loop	MoveLoop
 24399                                  
 24400                                  ; DX is the position of the last seen non-space + 1. We terminate the name
 24401                                  ; at this point.
 24402                                  
 24403 00003EEA 89D7                    	mov	di,dx
 24404 00003EEC C60500                  	mov	byte [di],0		; end of string
 24405 00003EEF E8C502                  	call	Build_device_ent	; Clears carry sets zero
 24406 00003EF2 FEC0                    	INC	AL			; reset zero
 24407 00003EF4 C3                      	retn
 24408                                  
 24409                                  InternalError:
 24410                                  InternalError_loop:
 24411 00003EF5 EBFE                    	JMP	short InternalError_loop	; freeze
 24412                                  
 24413                                  ; Start off at the correct spot. Optimize if the current dir part is valid.
 24414                                  
 24415                                  CrackIt:
 24416 00003EF7 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]	; get current directory pointer
 24417 00003EFB 83FEFF                  	CMP	SI,-1			; valid?
 24418 00003EFE 7503                    	JNZ	short LOOK_SING		; Yes, use it.
 24419 00003F00 8D7503                  	LEA	SI,[DI+3]		; skip D:\.
 24420                                  LOOK_SING:
 24421                                  	;mov	byte [ATTRIB],16h
 24422 00003F03 C606[6B05]16            	MOV	byte [ATTRIB],attr_directory+attr_system+attr_hidden
 24423                                  					; Attributes to search through Dirs
 24424 00003F08 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 24425 00003F0C B8FFFF                  	MOV	AX,-1
 24426                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+73]
 24427 00003F0F 268B5D49                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+curdir.ID]
 24428 00003F13 8B36[B605]              	MOV	SI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 24429                                  
 24430                                  ; AX = -1
 24431                                  ; BX = cluster number of current directory. THis number is -1 if the media
 24432                                  ;      has been uncertainly changed.
 24433                                  ; SI = offset in DOSGroup into path to end of current directory text. This
 24434                                  ;      may be -1 if no current directory part has been used.
 24435                                  
 24436 00003F17 39C6                    	CMP	SI,AX			; if Current directory is not part
 24437 00003F19 743B                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; then we must crack from root
 24438 00003F1B 39C3                    	CMP	BX,AX			; is the current directory cluster valid
 24439                                  
 24440                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 24441 00003F1D 7437                    	JZ	short NO_CURR_D		; no, crack form the root
 24442                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],1
 24443 00003F1F F606[3A0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ; for fastopen ?
 24444 00003F24 743D                    	JZ	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER	; no
 24445 00003F26 06                      	PUSH	ES			; save registers
 24446 00003F27 57                      	PUSH	DI
 24447 00003F28 51                      	PUSH	CX
 24448 00003F29 FF74FF                  	PUSH	word [SI-1]		; save \ and 1st char of next element
 24449 00003F2C 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24450 00003F2D 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24451                                  
 24452 00003F2E C644FF00                	MOV	BYTE [SI-1],0		; call fastopen to look up cur dir info
 24453 00003F32 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 24454                                  
 24455                                  ;hkn; FastOpenTable, Dir_Info_Buff & FastOpen_Ext_Info are in DOSDATA
 24456 00003F36 BB[300D]                	MOV	BX,FastOpenTable
 24457 00003F39 BF[460D]                	MOV	DI,Dir_Info_Buff
 24458 00003F3C B9[3B0D]                	MOV	CX,FastOpen_Ext_Info
 24459                                  	;mov	al,1
 24460 00003F3F B001                    	MOV	AL,FONC_Look_up
 24461 00003F41 1E                      	PUSH	DS
 24462 00003F42 07                      	POP	ES
 24463                                  	;call	far [BX+2]
 24464 00003F43 FF5F02                  	CALL	far [BX+fastopen_entry.name_caching]
 24465 00003F46 7203                    	JC	short GO_Chk_end1 	;fastopen not installed, or wrong drive.
 24466                                  					; Go to Got_Srch_cluster
 24467                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24468                                  	;CMP	BYTE [SI],0		;fastopen has current dir info?
 24469                                  	;JE	short GO_Chk_end	;yes. Go to got_search_cluster
 24470                                  	;stc
 24471                                  	;jmp	short GO_Chk_end	;Go to No_Curr_D
 24472                                  
 24473 00003F48 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1
 24474                                  GO_Chk_end1:	; 29/12/2022
 24475 00003F4B F5                      	cmc 
 24476                                  	; [si] = 0 -> cf = 0
 24477                                  	; [si] > 0 -> cf = 1
 24478                                  
 24479                                  ;GO_Chk_end1:
 24480                                  	; 29/12/2022
 24481                                  	;clc
 24482                                  
 24483                                  GO_Chk_end:				; restore registers
 24484 00003F4C 5B                      	POP	BX
 24485 00003F4D 5E                      	POP	SI
 24486 00003F4E 8F44FF                  	POP	word [SI-1]
 24487 00003F51 59                      	POP	CX
 24488 00003F52 5F                      	POP	DI
 24489 00003F53 07                      	POP	ES
 24490 00003F54 730D                    	JNC	short GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER ; crack based on cur dir
 24491                                  
 24492                                  ; DOS 3.3  6/25/86
 24493                                  ;
 24494                                  ; We must cract the path beginning at the root. Advance pointer to beginning
 24495                                  ; of path and go crack from root.
 24496                                  
 24497                                  NO_CURR_D:
 24498 00003F56 8B36[B205]              	MOV	SI,[WFP_START]
 24499 00003F5A 8D7403                  	LEA	SI,[SI+3]		; Skip "d:/"
 24500 00003F5D C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 24501 00003F61 EB3B                    	JMP	short ROOTPATH
 24502                                  
 24503                                  ; We are able to crack from the current directory part. Go set up for search
 24504                                  ; of specified cluster.
 24505                                  
 24506                                  GOT_SEARCH_CLUSTER:
 24507 00003F63 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]		; Get ES:BP
 24508 00003F67 E8DCFE                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 24509                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 24510                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 24511                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24512 00003F6A 7343                    	jnc	short FINDPATH ; 17/08/2018
 24513                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24514                                  	;JC	short SETFERR
 24515                                  	;JMP	short FINDPATH
 24516                                  SETFERR:
 24517 00003F6C 30C9                    	XOR	CL,CL			; set zero
 24518 00003F6E F9                      	STC
 24519 00003F6F C3                      	retn
 24520                                  
 24521                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24522                                  ;
 24523                                  ; Procedure Name : ChkDev
 24524                                  ;
 24525                                  ; Check to see if the name at DS:DI is a device. Returns carry set if not a
 24526                                  ;   device.
 24527                                  ; Blasts CX,SI,DI,AX,BX
 24528                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24529                                  
 24530                                  CHKDEV:
 24531 00003F70 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 24532 00003F72 8CD7                    	MOV	DI,SS
 24533 00003F74 8EC7                    	MOV	ES,DI
 24534                                  
 24535 00003F76 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24536 00003F79 B90900                  	MOV	CX,9
 24537                                  TESTLOOP:
 24538 00003F7C E84A10                  	call	GETLET
 24539                                  
 24540 00003F7F 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'
 24541 00003F81 740E                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 24542 00003F83 E89910                  	call	PATHCHRCMP

 24544 00003F88 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24545 00003F8A 7405                    	JZ	short TESTDEVICE
 24546

 24548 00003F8D E2ED                    	LOOP	TESTLOOP
 24549                                  NOTDEV:

 24551 00003F90 C3                      	retn
 24552

 24556 00003F91 41                      	inc	cx
 24557 00003F92 41                      	inc	cx
 24558 00003F93 B020                    	MOV	AL,' '
 24559 00003F95 F3AA                    	REP	STOSB
 24560 00003F97 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 24561 00003F99 8ED8                    	MOV	DS,AX
 24562                                  	;call	DEVNAME
