 24565 00003F9B E9BA01                  	jmp	DEVNAME
 24566                                  
 24567                                  ;Break	<ROOTPATH, FINDPATH -- PARSE A PATH>
 24568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24569                                  ;
 24570                                  ; Procedure Name : ROOTPATH,FINDPATH
 24571                                  ;
 24572                                  ; Inputs:
 24573                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but,
 24574                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path which is assumed to start at
 24575                                  ;		the root (no leading '/').
 24576                                  ; Function:
 24577                                  ;	Search from root for path
 24578                                  ; Outputs:
 24579                                  ;	Same as FINDPATH but:
 24580                                  ;	If root directory specified, [CURBUF] and [NAME1] are NOT set, and
 24581                                  ;	[NoSetDir] is ignored.
 24582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24583                                  
 24584                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24585                                  	; DOSCODE:7F47h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24586                                  
 24587                                  ROOTPATH:
 24588 00003F9E E8E0FE                  	call	SETROOTSRCH
 24589 00003FA1 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0
 24590 00003FA4 7509                    	JNZ	short FINDPATH
 24591                                  
 24592                                  ; Root dir specified
 24593 00003FA6 A0[6D05]                	MOV	AL,[SATTRIB]
 24594 00003FA9 A2[6B05]                	MOV	[ATTRIB],AL
 24595 00003FAC 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; Sets "device ID" byte, sets zero
 24596                                  					; (dir), clears carry.
 24597 00003FAE C3                      	retn
 24598                                  
 24599                                  ; Inputs:
 24600                                  ;	[ATTRIB] Set to get through directories
 24601                                  ;	[SATTRIB] Set to find last element
 24602                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24603                                  ;	SI Points to asciz string of path (no leading '/').
 24604                                  ;	[SECCLUSPOS] = 0
 24605                                  ;	[DIRSEC] = Phys sec # of first sector of directory
 24606                                  ;	[CLUSNUM] = Cluster # of next cluster
 24607                                  ;	[CLUSFAC] = Sectors per cluster
 24608                                  ;	[NoSetDir] set
 24609                                  ;	[CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 24610                                  ;		( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 24611                                  ;		 Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 24612                                  ;	[THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 24613                                  ;	[CREATING] and [DELALL] set
 24614                                  ; Function:
 24615                                  ;	Parse path name
 24616                                  ; Outputs:
 24617                                  ;	ID1 field of [THISCDS] updated appropriately
 24618                                  ;	[ATTRIB] = [SATTRIB]
 24619                                  ;	ES:BP Points to DPB
 24620                                  ;	[THISDPB] = ES:BP
 24621                                  ;	Carry set if bad path
 24622                                  ;	   SI Points to path element causing failure
 24623                                  ;	   Zero set
 24624                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC] are set up to
 24625                                  ;	      start a search on the last directory
 24626                                  ;	      CL is zero if there is a bad name in the path
 24627                                  ;	      CL is non-zero if the name was simply not found
 24628                                  ;		 [ENTFREE] may have free spot in directory
 24629                                  ;		 [NAME1] is the name.
 24630                                  ;		 CL = 81H if '*'s or '?' in NAME1, 80H otherwise
 24631                                  ;	   Zero reset
 24632                                  ;	      File in middle of path or bad name in path
 24633                                  ;		or path too long or malformed path
 24634                                  ;	ELSE
 24635                                  ;	   [CURBUF] contains directory record with match
 24636                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:BX Points into [CURBUF] to start of entry
 24637                                  ;	   [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to fcb_FIRCLUS field for entry
 24638                                  ;	   [NAME1] Has name looked for
 24639                                  ;	   AH = device ID
 24640                                  ;	      bit 7 of AH set if device SI and BX
 24641                                  ;	      will point DOSGROUP relative The firclus
 24642                                  ;	      field of the device entry contains the device pointer
 24643                                  ;	   If last element is a directory zero is set and:
 24644                                  ;	      [DIRSTART],[SECCLUSPOS],[DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM], and [CLUSFAC]
 24645                                  ;	      are set up to start a search on it,
 24646                                  ;	      unless [NoSetDir] is non zero in which case the return is
 24647                                  ;	      like that for a file (except for zero flag)
 24648                                  ;	   If last element is a file zero is reset
 24649                                  ;	      [DIRSEC],[CLUSNUM],[CLUSFAC],[NXTCLUSNUM],[SECCLUSPOS],
 24650                                  ;	      [LASTENT], [ENTLAST] are set to continue search of last
 24651                                  ;	      directory for furthur matches on NAME1 via the NEXTENT
 24652                                  ;	      entry point in FindEntry (or GETENT entry in GETENTRY in
 24653                                  ;	      which case [NXTCLUSNUM] and [SECCLUSPOS] need not be valid)
 24654                                  ; Destroys all other registers
 24655                                  
 24656                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 24657                                  	; DOSCODE:7F58h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 24658                                  
 24659                                      	;entry	FINDPATH
 24660                                  FINDPATH:
 24661 00003FAF 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24662 00003FB0 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24663 00003FB1 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 24664 00003FB3 8B0E[C205]              	MOV	CX,[DIRSTART]		; Get start clus of dir being searched
 24665 00003FB7 833E[B605]FF            	CMP	word [CURR_DIR_END],-1
 24666 00003FBC 740E                    	JZ	short NOIDS		; No current dir part
 24667 00003FBE 3B3E[B605]              	CMP	DI,[CURR_DIR_END]
 24668 00003FC2 7508                    	JNZ	short NOIDS		; Not to current dir end yet
 24669 00003FC4 C43E[A205]              	LES	DI,[THISCDS]
 24670                                  	;mov	[es:di+73],cx
 24671 00003FC8 26894D49                	MOV	[ES:DI+curdir.ID],CX	; Set current directory currency
 24672                                  NOIDS:
 24673                                  
 24674                                  ; Parse the name off of DS:SI into NAME1. AL = 1 if there was a meta
 24675                                  ; character in the string. CX,DI may be destroyed.
 24676                                  ;
 24677                                  ;	invoke	NAMETRANS
 24678                                  ;	MOV	CL,AL
 24679                                  ;
 24680                                  ; The above is the slow method. The name has *already* been munged by
 24681                                  ; TransPath so no special casing needs to be done. All we do is try to copy
 24682                                  ; the name until ., \ or 0 is hit.
 24683                                  
 24684 00003FCC 8CD0                    	MOV	AX,SS
 24685 00003FCE 8EC0                    	MOV	ES,AX
 24686                                  
 24687                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 24688 00003FD0 BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24689 00003FD3 B82020                  	MOV	AX,'  ' ; 2020h
 24690 00003FD6 AA                      	STOSB
 24691 00003FD7 AB                      	STOSW
 24692 00003FD8 AB                      	STOSW
 24693 00003FD9 AB                      	STOSW
 24694 00003FDA AB                      	STOSW
 24695 00003FDB AB                      	STOSW
 24696                                  
 24697                                  ;hkn; Name1 is in DOSDATA
 24698 00003FDC BF[4B05]                	MOV	DI,NAME1
 24699 00003FDF 30E4                    	XOR	AH,AH			; bits for CL
 24700                                  GetNam:
 24701                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24702                                  	;INC	CL ; ?*! ; MSDOS 6.0	;AN000; KK increment volid count
 24703                                  
 24704                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24705                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24706                                  	;inc	cl ; not required !	
 24707                                  	
 24708 00003FE1 AC                      	LODSB
 24709 00003FE2 3C2E                    	CMP	AL,'.'	; 2Eh
 24710 00003FE4 7412                    	JZ	short _SetExt
 24711 00003FE6 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24712 00003FE8 7424                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24713 00003FEA 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'	; 5Ch
 24714 00003FEC 7420                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24715 00003FEE 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'	; 3Fh
 24716 00003FF0 7503                    	JNZ	short StoNam
 24717 00003FF2 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 24718                                  StoNam: 
 24719 00003FF5 AA                      	STOSB
 24720 00003FF6 EBE9                    	JMP	short GetNam
 24721                                  _SetExt:
 24722 00003FF8 BF[5305]                	MOV	DI,NAME1+8
 24723                                  GetExt:
 24724 00003FFB AC                      	LODSB
 24725 00003FFC 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL
 24726 00003FFE 740E                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24727 00004000 3C5C                    	CMP	AL,'\'
 24728 00004002 740A                    	JZ	short _GetDone
 24729 00004004 3C3F                    	CMP	AL,'?'
 24730 00004006 7503                    	JNZ	short StoExt
 24731 00004008 80CC01                  	OR	AH,1
 24732                                  StoExt: 
 24733 0000400B AA                      	STOSB
 24734 0000400C EBED                    	JMP	short GetExt
 24735                                  _GetDone:
 24736 0000400E 4E                      	DEC	SI
 24737 0000400F 88E1                    	MOV	CL,AH  ; 0 or 1 ; 29/12/2022
 24738 00004011 80C980                  	OR	CL,80H
 24739 00004014 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of this element
 24740 00004015 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 24741 00004016 39FE                    	CMP	SI,DI
 24742 00004018 7503                    	JNZ	short check_device
 24743 0000401A E9E200                  	JMP	_BADPATH		; NUL parse (two delims most likely)
 24744                                  check_device:
 24745 0000401D 56                      	PUSH	SI			; Start of next element
 24746                                  	;MOV	AL,[SI]
 24747                                  	;OR	AL,AL
 24748                                  	; 23/09/2023
 24749 0000401E 803C00                  	cmp	byte [si],0
 24750 00004021 7508                    	JNZ	short NOT_LAST
 24751                                  
 24752                                  ; for last element of the path switch to the correct search attributes
 24753                                  
 24754 00004023 8A3E[6D05]              	MOV	BH,[SATTRIB]
 24755 00004027 883E[6B05]              	MOV	[ATTRIB],BH
 24756                                  
 24757                                  NOT_LAST:
 24758                                  
 24759                                  ; check name1 to see if we have a device...
 24760                                  
 24761 0000402B 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24762                                  
 24763                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24764                                  	;context ES
 24765 0000402C 16                      	push	ss
 24766 0000402D 07                      	pop	es
 24767 0000402E E82701                  	call	DEVNAME 		; blast BX
 24768 00004031 07                      	POP	ES			; Restore ES:BP
 24769 00004032 720B                    	JC	short FindFile		; Not a device
 24770 00004034 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; Test next char again
 24771 00004036 7403                    	JZ	short GO_BDEV
 24772 00004038 E9C800                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Device name in middle of path
 24773                                  
 24774                                  GO_BDEV:
 24775 0000403B 5E                      	POP	SI			; Points to NUL at end of path
 24776 0000403C E988FE                  	JMP	Build_devJ
 24777                                  
 24778                                  FindFile:
 24779                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 24780 0000403F 803E[4B05]E5            	CMP	BYTE [NAME1],0E5H	; if 1st char = E5
 24781 00004044 7505                    	JNZ	short NOE5		; no
 24782 00004046 C606[4B05]05            	MOV	BYTE [NAME1],05H	; change it to 05
 24783                                  NOE5:
 24784                                  ;;;; 7/28/86
 24785 0000404B 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Start of this element
 24786 0000404C 06                      	PUSH	ES			; Save ES:BP
 24787 0000404D 51                      	PUSH	CX			; CL return from NameTrans
 24788                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24789                                  
 24790 0000404E E89502                  	CALL	LookupPath		; call fastopen to get dir entry
 24791 00004051 7303                    	JNC	short DIR_FOUND		; found dir entry
 24792                                  
 24793                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24794 00004053 E8B2FC                  	call	FINDENTRY
 24795                                  DIR_FOUND:
 24796 00004056 59                      	POP	CX
 24797 00004057 07                      	POP	ES
 24798 00004058 5F                      	POP	DI
 24799 00004059 7303                    	JNC	short LOAD_BUF
 24800 0000405B E9CA00                  	JMP	BADPATHPOP
 24801                                  
 24802                                  LOAD_BUF:
 24803 0000405E C53E[E205]              	LDS	DI,[CURBUF]
 24804                                  	;test	byte [bx+0Bh],10h
 24805 00004062 F6470B10                	TEST	BYTE [BX+dir_entry.dir_attr],attr_directory
 24806 00004066 7503                    	JNZ	short GO_NEXT 		; DOS 3.3
 24807 00004068 E99800                  	JMP	FILEINPATH		; Error or end of path
 24808                                  
 24809                                  ; if we are not setting the directory, then check for end of string
 24810                                  
 24811                                  GO_NEXT:
 24812                                  ;hkn; SS override
 24813 0000406B 36803E[4C03]00          	CMP	BYTE [SS:NoSetDir],0
 24814 00004071 7423                    	JZ	short SetDir
 24815 00004073 89FA                    	MOV	DX,DI			; Save pointer to entry
 24816 00004075 8CD9                    	MOV	CX,DS
 24817                                  
 24818                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 24819                                  	;context DS
 24820 00004077 16                      	push	ss
 24821 00004078 1F                      	pop	ds
 24822 00004079 5F                      	POP	DI			; Start of next element
 24823                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 24824                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 24825 0000407A F606[3A0D]01            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],FastOpen_Set ;only DOSOPEN can take advantage of
 24826 0000407F 740B                    	JZ	short _nofast			; the FastOpen
 24827 00004081 F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success ; Lookup just happened
 24828 00004086 7404                    	JZ	short _nofast			; no
 24829 00004088 8B3E[660D]              	MOV	DI,[Next_Element_Start]	; no need to insert it again
 24830                                  _nofast:
 24831 0000408C 803D00                  	CMP	BYTE [DI],0
 24832                                  	;;JNZ	short NEXT_ONE		; DOS 3.3
 24833                                  	;;JMP	_SETRET  ; retn		; Got it
 24834                                  	;retn	; 05/09/2018
 24835                                  	; 21/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 24836                                  	;jmp	_SETRET
 24837                                  	; 16/12/2022
 24838 0000408F 7421                    	jz	short _SETRET
 24839                                  
 24840                                  NEXT_ONE:
 24841 00004091 57                      	PUSH	DI			; Put start of next element back on stack
 24842 00004092 89D7                    	MOV	DI,DX
 24843 00004094 8ED9                    	MOV	DS,CX			; Get back pointer to entry
 24844                                  SetDir:
 24845 00004096 8B14                    	MOV	DX,[SI] 		; Dir_first
 24846                                  
 24847                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24848 00004098 1E                      	PUSH	DS		      ; save [curbuf+2]
 24849                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA

 24851 0000409A 1F                      	pop	ds		      ; set DS Dosgroup
 24852                                  	;test	byte [FastOpenFlg],2
 24853 0000409B F606[3A0D]02            	TEST	byte [FastOpenFlg],Lookup_Success
 24854 000040A0 7411                    	JZ	short DO_NORMAL	      ; fastopen not in memory or path not
 24855 000040A2 89D3                    	MOV	BX,DX		      ; not found
 24856 000040A4 8B3E[BC05]              	MOV	DI,[CLUSNUM]	      ; clusnum was set in LookupPath

 24866

 24869                                  ;DOS 3.3 FastOPen 6/12/86 F.C.
 24870                                  
 24871 000040B4 29FB                    	SUB	BX,DI			; Offset into sector of start of entry
 24872 000040B6 29FE                    	SUB	SI,DI			; Offset into sector of dir_first
 24873 000040B8 53                      	PUSH	BX
 24874 000040B9 50                      	PUSH	AX
 24875 000040BA 56                      	PUSH	SI
 24876 000040BB 51                      	PUSH	CX
 24877                                  	;push	word [di+6]
 24878 000040BC FF7506                  	PUSH	WORD [DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]	;AN000;>32mb

 24886                                  	;context DS

 24890 000040C6 E87DFD                  	call	SETDIRSRCH		; the entry sector buffer
 24891                                  	; 19/05/2019

 24893 000040C9 8F06[0706]              	POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 24894 000040CD 5A                      	POP	DX
 24895 000040CE 7203                    	JC	short SKIP_GETB
 24896                                  	; 22/09/2023
 24897                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 24898                                  	;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *

 24903                                  SKIP_GETB:

 24919                                  FAST_OPEN_SKIP:

 24921 000040EA E89D02                  	CALL	InsertPath		; insert dir entry info
 24922                                  ; DOS 3.3 FastOpen 6/12/86  F.C.

 24973                                  
 24974                                  BADPATHPOP:
 24975 00004128 5E                      	POP	SI			; Start of next element
 24976 00004129 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 24977 0000412B 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI			; Start of bad element
 24978 0000412D 08C0                    	OR	AL,AL			; zero if bad element is last, non-zero if path too long
 24979                                  BADPRET:

 24982 00004135 F9                      	STC
 24983 00004136 C3                      	retn

 24985                                  ;Break	<STARTSRCH -- INITIATE DIRECTORY SEARCH>
 24986                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24987                                  ;
 24988                                  ; Procedure Name : STARTSRCH
 24989                                  ;
 24990                                  ; Inputs:
 24991                                  ;	[THISDPB] Set
 24992                                  ; Function:
 24993                                  ;	Set up a search for GETENTRY and NEXTENTRY
 24994                                  ; Outputs:
 24995                                  ;	ES:BP = Drive parameters
 24996                                  ;	Sets up LASTENT, ENTFREE=ENTLAST=-1, VOLID=0
 24997                                  ; Destroys ES,BP,AX
 24998                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 24999                                  
 25000                                  STARTSRCH:
 25001 00004137 C42E[8A05]              	LES	BP,[THISDPB]
 25002 0000413B 31C0                    	XOR	AX,AX
 25003 0000413D A3[4803]                	MOV	[LASTENT],AX
 25004 00004140 A2[7B05]                	MOV	[VOLID],AL		; No volume ID found
 25005 00004143 48                      	DEC	AX
 25006 00004144 A3[D805]                	MOV	[ENTFREE],AX
 25007 00004147 A3[DA05]                	MOV	[ENTLAST],AX
 25008 0000414A C3                      	retn

 25010                                  ;BREAK <MatchAttributes - the final check for attribute matching>
 25011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25012                                  ; Procedure Name : MatchAttributes
 25013                                  ;
 25014                                  ; Input:    [Attrib] = attribute to search for
 25015                                  ;	    CH = found attribute
 25016                                  ; Output:   JZ <match>
 25017                                  ;	    JNZ <nomatch>
 25018                                  ; Registers modified: noneski
 25019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 25021                                  MatchAttributes:
 25022 0000414B 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25023                                  
 25024                                  ;hkn; SS override
 25025 0000414C 36A0[6B05]              	MOV	AL,[ss:ATTRIB]		; AL <- SearchSet
 25026 00004150 F6D0                    	NOT	AL			; AL <- SearchSet'
 25027 00004152 20E8                    	AND	AL,CH			; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet
 25028                                  	;and	al,16h
 25029 00004154 2416                    	AND	AL,attr_all	; AL <- SearchSet' and FoundSet and Important
 25030                                  ;
 25031                                  ; the result is non-zero if an attribute is not in the search set
 25032                                  ; and in the found set and in the important set. This means that we do not
 25033                                  ; have a match. Do a JNZ <nomatch> or JZ <match>
 25034                                  ;
 25035 00004156 58                      	POP	AX
 25036 00004157 C3                      	retn

 25044                                  ;Break <DevName - Look for name of device>
 25045                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25046                                  ;
 25047                                  ; Procedure Name : DevName
 25048                                  ;
 25049                                  ; Inputs:
 25050                                  ;	DS,ES:DOSDATA
 25051                                  ;	Filename in NAME1
 25052                                  ;	ATTRIB set so that we can error out if looking for Volume IDs
 25053                                  ; Function:
 25054                                  ;	Determine if file is in list of I/O drivers
 25055                                  ; Outputs:
 25056                                  ;	Carry set if not a device
 25057                                  ;	ELSE
 25058                                  ;	Zero flag set
 25059                                  ;	BH = Bit 7,6 = 1, bit 5 = 0 (cooked mode)
 25060                                  ;	     bits 0-4 set from low byte of attribute word
 25061                                  ;	DEVPT = DWORD pointer to Device header of device
 25062                                  ; BX destroyed, others preserved
 25063                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25064                                  
 25065                                  DEVNAME:
 25066                                  	; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0

 25072 0000415B 50                      	PUSH	AX
 25073                                  
 25074                                  ; E5 special code

 25093                                  	;;test	word [si+4],8000h
 25094                                  	;TEST	word [SI+SYSDEV.ATT],DEVTYP
 25095 0000417A 7411                    	JZ	short SKIPDEV 		; Skip block devices (NET and LOCAL)
 25096 0000417C 89F0                    	MOV	AX,SI
 25097                                  	;add	si,10

 25099

 25134                                  ;BREAK <Build_device_ent - Make a Directory entry>
 25135                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25136                                  ; Procedure Name : Build_device_ent
 25137                                  ;
 25138                                  ; Inputs:
 25139                                  ;	[NAME1] has name
 25140                                  ;	BH is attribute field (supplied by DEVNAME)
 25141                                  ;	[DEVPT] points to device header (supplied by DEVNAME)
 25142                                  ; Function:
 25143                                  ;	Build a directory entry for a device at DEVFCB
 25144                                  ; Outputs:
 25145                                  ;	BX points to DEVFCB
 25146                                  ;	SI points to dir_first field
 25147                                  ;	AH = input BH
 25148                                  ;	AL = 0

 25152                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25153

 25172

 25177

 25181

 25183

 25186

 25188

 25194

 25196 000041D9 A1[9C05]                	MOV	AX,[DEVPT+2]

 25208                                  ;Break	<ValidateCDS - given a CDS, validate the media and the current directory>
 25209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25210                                  ;
 25211                                  ;   ValidateCDS - Get current CDS. Splice it. Call FatReadCDS to check
 25212                                  ;   media. If media has been changed, do DOS_Chdir to validate path.
 25213                                  ;   If invalid, reset original CDS to root.
 25214                                  ;
 25215                                  ;   Inputs:	ThisCDS points to CDS of interest
 25216                                  ;		SS:DI points to temp buffer

 25218                                  ;		    drive
 25219                                  ;		ThisDPB changed
 25220                                  ;		ES:DI point to CDS
 25221                                  ;		Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 25222                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 25223                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25224                                  
 25225                                  	; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25226                                  	; DOSCODE:819Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25227                                  
 25228                                  ValidateCDS:
 25229                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25230                                  	; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25231                                  
 25232                                     %define  Temp	[bp-2]	; word

 25267                                  	;Invoke	FStrcpy

 25269 00004211 8B76FE                  	MOV	SI,Temp
 25270                                  
 25271                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25272                                  	;Context DS
 25273 00004214 16                      	push	ss
 25274 00004215 1F                      	pop	ds	
 25275                                  	;Invoke	Splice
 25276 00004216 E85D2B                  	call	Splice
 25277

 25279                                  	;Context DS			;   FatReadCDS (ThisCDS);

 25289 00004227 5D                      	pop	bp

 25291                                  
 25292 0000422A C536[A205]              	LDS	SI,[THISCDS]		;   if (ThisCDS->ID == -1) {

 25372                                  ; 28/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 25373                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - offset 43BDh
 25374                                  
 25375                                  ;Break	<CheckThisDevice - Check for being a device>
 25376                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25377                                  ;
 25378                                  ;   CheckThisDevice - Examine the area at DS:SI to see if there is a valid
 25379                                  ;   device specified. We will return carry if there is a device present. 
 25380                                  ;   The forms of devices we will recognize are:
 25381                                  ;
 25382                                  ;	[path]device
 25383                                  ;
 25384                                  ;   Note that the drive letter has *already* been removed. All other forms
 25385                                  ;   are not considered to be devices. If such a device is found we change
 25386                                  ;   the source pointer to point to the device component.
 25387                                  ;
 25388                                  ;   Inputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 25389                                  ;		DS:SI contains name
 25390                                  ;   Outputs:	ES is DOSDATA
 25391                                  ;		DS:SI point to name or device
 25392                                  ;		Carry flag set if device was found
 25393                                  ;		Carry flag reset otherwise
 25394                                  ;   Registers Modified: all except ES:DI, DS
 25395                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25396                                  
 25397                                  CheckThisDevice:
 25398 000042A1 57                      	push	di
 25399 000042A2 56                      	push	si
 25400 000042A3 89F7                    	MOV	DI,SI
 25401                                  
 25402                                  ; Check for presence of \dev\ (Dam multiplan!)
 25403                                  
 25404 000042A5 8A04                    	MOV	AL,[SI]
 25405 000042A7 E8750D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; is it a path char?
 25406 000042AA 7517                    	JNZ	short ParseDev		; no, go attempt to parse device
 25407 000042AC 46                      	INC	SI			; simulate LODSB
 25408                                  
 25409                                  ; We have the leading path separator. Look for DEV part.
 25410                                  
 25411 000042AD AD                      	LODSW
 25412 000042AE 0D2020                  	OR	AX,2020h
 25413 000042B1 3D6465                  	cmp	ax,"de"
 25414                                  	;CMP	AX,"e"<< 8 + "d"
 25415 000042B4 752D                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; not "de", assume not device
 25416 000042B6 AC                      	LODSB
 25417 000042B7 0C20                    	OR	AL,20h
 25418 000042B9 3C76                    	CMP	AL,"v"                  ; Not "v", assume not device
 25419 000042BB 7526                    	JNZ	short NotDevice
 25420 000042BD AC                      	LODSB
 25421 000042BE E85E0D                  	call	PATHCHRCMP		; do we have the last path separator?
 25422 000042C1 7520                    	JNZ	short NotDevice		; no. go for it.
 25423                                  
 25424                                  ; DS:SI now points to a potential drive. Preserve them as NameTrans advances
 25425                                  ; SI and DevName may destroy DS.
 25426                                  
 25427                                  ParseDev:
 25428 000042C3 1E                      	push	ds
 25429 000042C4 56                      	push	si			; preserve the source pointer
 25430 000042C5 E8950C                  	call	NameTrans		; advance DS:SI
 25431 000042C8 803C00                  	CMP	BYTE [SI],0		; parse entire string?
 25432 000042CB F9                      	STC				; simulate a Carry return from DevName
 25433 000042CC 750B                    	JNZ	short SkipSearch	; no parse. simulate a file return.
 25434                                  
 25435                                  ;hkn; SS is DOSDATA
 25436 000042CE 16                      	push	ss
 25437 000042CF 1F                      	pop	ds
 25438                                  
 25439                                  ; M026 - start - fix ported from ROMDOS2 for bug # 2849
 25440                                  ;
 25441                                  ; SR;
 25442                                  ; We have to set Attrib before invoking DevName. Otherwise, the value from
 25443                                  ; a previous DOS call is used and DevName thinks it is not a device if the
 25444                                  ; old call set the volume attribute bit.
 25445                                  
 25446 000042D0 A0[6D05]                	mov	al,[SATTRIB]
 25447 000042D3 A2[6B05]                	mov	[ATTRIB],al		;set Attrib for DevName
 25448                                  
 25449                                  ; M026 - end
 25450                                  
 25451 000042D6 E87FFE                  	call	DEVNAME
 25452                                  
 25453                                  SkipSearch:
 25454 000042D9 5E                      	pop	si
 25455 000042DA 1F                      	pop	ds
 25456                                  
 25457                                  ; SI points to the beginning of the potential device. If we have a device
 25458                                  ; then we do not change SI. If we have a file, then we reset SI back to the
 25459                                  ; original value. At this point Carry set indicates FILE.
 25460                                  
 25461                                  CheckReturn:
 25462 000042DB 5F                      	pop	di			; get original SI
 25463 000042DC 7302                    	JNC	short Check_Done	; if device then do not reset pointer
 25464 000042DE 89FE                    	MOV	SI,DI
 25465                                  Check_Done:
 25466 000042E0 5F                      	pop	di
 25467 000042E1 F5                      	CMC				; invert carry. Carry => device
 25468 000042E2 C3                      	retn
 25469                                  NotDevice:
 25470 000042E3 F9                      	STC

 25473                                  ;BREAK <LookupPath - call fastopen to get dir entry info>

 25477                                  ;
 25478                                  ; Output  DS:SI -> path name,
 25479                                  ;	  ES:DI -> dir entry info buffer
 25480                                  ;	  ES:CX -> extended dir info buffer

 25483                                  ;			     FastOpen, DS:SI points to char just one after

 25726                                  ;		length of packets

 25732                                  CmdTab:
 25733 00004414 8604                    	DB	86h, DEVRD	; 0 input

 25750                                  ;DEV001E:
 25751                                  
 25752                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25753                                  ; DOSCODE:8413h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25754                                  
 25755                                  ;Break	<IOFUNC -- DO FUNCTION 1-12 I/O>
 25756                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25757                                  ;
 25758                                  ; Procedure Name : IOFUNC
 25759                                  ;
 25760                                  ; Inputs:
 25761                                  ;	DS:SI Points to SFT
 25762                                  ;	AH is function code
 25763                                  ;		= 0 Input
 25764                                  ;		= 1 Input Status
 25765                                  ;		= 2 Output
 25766                                  ;		= 3 Output Status
 25767                                  ;		= 4 Flush
 25768                                  ;		= 5 Input Status - System WAIT invoked for K09 if no char
 25769                                  ;				   present.
 25770                                  ;	AL = character if output
 25771                                  ; Function:
 25772                                  ;	Perform indicated I/O to device or file
 25773                                  ; Outputs:
 25774                                  ;	AL is character if input
 25775                                  ;	If a status call
 25776                                  ;		zero set if not ready
 25777                                  ;		zero reset if ready (character in AL for input status)
 25778                                  ; For regular files:
 25779                                  ;	Input Status
 25780                                  ;		Gets character but restores position
 25781                                  ;		Zero set on EOF
 25782                                  ;	Input
 25783                                  ;		Gets character advances position
 25784                                  ;		Returns ^Z on EOF
 25785                                  ;	Output Status
 25786                                  ;		Always ready
 25787                                  ; AX altered, all other registers preserved
 25788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25789                                  
 25790                                  ; 21/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25791                                  ; DOSCODE:83D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25792

 25821                                  	; 16/12/2022

 25893                                  NO_RETRY:
 25894                                  	; Know user must have wanted Ignore OR Fail. Make sure device shows ready
 25895                                  	; ready so that DOS doesn't get caught in a status loop when user 
 25896                                  	; simply wants to ignore the error.
 25897                                  	;
 25898                                  	; SR; If fail wanted by user set ax to special value (ax = -1). This 
 25899                                  	; should be checked by the caller on return
 25900                                  
 25901                                  					; SS override
 25902 000044D4 368026[8003]FD          	and	byte [SS:IOCALL_REQSTAT+1],0FDh
 25903                                  	;AND	BYTE [SS:IOCALL_REQSTAT+1],~(STBUI>>8)
 25904                                  
 25905                                  	; SR;
 25906                                  	; Check if user failed

 26048                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 26049                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 26050                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 26051                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.

 26353                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26354                                  ;

 26360                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read

 26596                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 26597                                  ;

 26616 00004802 368506[B50D]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.

 26656                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 26657                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 26658                                  
 26659                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 26660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26661                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 26662                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 26663                                  ;
 26664                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 26665                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 26666                                  ;	MakeNode
 26667                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 26668                                  ;	FREEENT
 26669                                  ;	NEWDIR
 26670                                  ;	DOOPEN
 26671                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 26672                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 26673                                  ;
 26674                                  ;	Revision history:
 26675                                  ;
 26676                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 26677                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 26678                                  
 26679                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 26680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26681                                  ;
 26682                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 26683                                  ;
 26684                                  ; Inputs:
 26685                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 26686                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 26687                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 26688                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26689                                  ;               entries
 26690                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26691                                  ; Function:
 26692                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 26693                                  ; Outputs:
 26694                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 26695                                  ;       ELSE
 26696                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 26697                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 26698                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 26699                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 26700                                  ;
 26701                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26702                                  
 26703                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26704                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26705                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26706                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26707                                  
 26708                                  BUILDDIR:
 26709                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 26710                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 26711                                  
 26712 0000483B A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 26713 0000483E 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1 ; 0FFFFh
 26714                                  	;JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 26715                                          ;CLC
 26716                                          ;retn
 26717                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26718 00004841 7507                    	jne	short builddir_cmc_retn  ; cf=1 (will be 0)
 26719                                  
 26720                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 26721 00004843 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 26722 00004848 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 26723                                          ;STC
 26724                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26725                                  	; [DIRSTART]=0, cf=0, zf=1 (cf will be 1 after cmc instruction)
 26726                                  builddir_cmc_retn:
 26727                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26728 0000484A F5                      	cmc	; cf=1 <-> cf=0
 26729                                  builddir_retn:
 26730 0000484B C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 26731                                  
 26732                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 26733                                  NEWDIR: 
 26734 0000484C 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 26735 00004850 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 26736 00004852 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 26737 00004854 E82806                  	call	GETEOF
 26738 00004857 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 26739                                  NULLDIR:
 26740 00004859 B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 26741 0000485C E83905                  	call	ALLOCATE
 26742 0000485F 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26743 00004861 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 26744 00004865 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 26745 00004867 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 26746 00004869 E8DAF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 26747 0000486C 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26748 0000486E C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 26749 00004874 EB29                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 26750                                  ADDINGDIR:
 26751 00004876 53                              PUSH    BX
 26752 00004877 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 26753 0000487B E82D0C                          call	IsEOF
 26754 0000487E 5B                              POP     BX
 26755 0000487F 7217                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 26756                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26757 00004881 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 26758                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26759                                  	;PUSH	CX ; (not necessary)
 26760 00004885 50                      	PUSH	AX
 26761 00004886 55                      	PUSH	BP
 26762 00004887 B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 26763                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26764 00004889 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 26765                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26766                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 26767                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 26768 0000488D 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 26769 00004891 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 26770 00004893 E809DE                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 26771 00004896 5D                              POP     BP
 26772 00004897 58                              POP     AX
 26773                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26774                                          ;POP	CX
 26775                                  
 26776                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26777                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 26778 00004898 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 26779 0000489A 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 26780 0000489C E8CC04                  	call	FIGREC
 26781                                  GOTDIRREC:
 26782                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 26783 0000489F 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 26784 000048A3 FEC1                            INC     CL
 26785 000048A5 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 26786                                  ZERODIR:
 26787 000048A7 51                              PUSH    CX
 26788                                  	; 22/09/2023
 26789                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 26790                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY ; *
 26791 000048A8 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 26792                                          ;call	GETBUFFR
 26793 000048AA E82210                          call	GETBUFFRD ; *
 26794 000048AD 7302                    	JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 26795 000048AF 59                              POP     CX
 26796 000048B0 C3                              retn
 26797                                  
 26798                                  GET_SSIZE:
 26799                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26800 000048B1 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 26801 000048B5 06                              PUSH    ES
 26802 000048B6 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26803                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 26804 000048BA 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 26805 000048BF 57                              PUSH    DI
 26806                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 26807                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 26808 000048C0 83C714                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 26809 000048C3 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26810 000048C5 D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 26811 000048C7 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26812 000048C9 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 26813 000048CB AA                              STOSB
 26814                                  EVENZ:

 26816                                  
 26817                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26818 000048CD 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26819                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26820 000048D2 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26821 000048D4 E8FF11                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 26822                                          
 26823                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26824 000048D7 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26825                                  yesdirty7:
 26826 000048DC 07                              POP	ES
 26827 000048DD 59                              POP	CX
 26828                                  
 26829                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26830                                  
 26831                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26832                                  	;INC	DX
 26833                                  
 26834                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26835                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26836                                  	;add	dx,1
 26837                                  	;;adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 26838                                  	;; 24/09/2023
 26839                                  	;; ax=0
 26840                                  	;adc	[HIGH_SECTOR],ax ; 0
 26841                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26842 000048DE 42                      	inc	dx
 26843 000048DF 7504                    	jnz	short loop_zerodir
 26844 000048E1 FF06[0706]              	inc	word [HIGH_SECTOR]
 26845                                  loop_zerodir:
