 26847                                  
 26848 000048E7 A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 26849 000048EA 40                              INC     AX
 26850                                  	; 24/09/2023
 26851                                  	; cf=0
 26852                                  	;CLC
 26853 000048EB C3                              retn
 26854                                  
 26855                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26856                                  ;
 26857                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 26858                                  ;
 26859                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 26860                                  ;
 26861                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 26862                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 26863                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 26864                                  ;
 26865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26866                                  
 26867                                  SETDOTENT:
 26868                                  ;	Fill in name field
 26869 000048EC AB                              STOSW
 26870 000048ED B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 26871 000048F0 B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 26872 000048F3 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26873 000048F5 AA                              STOSB
 26874                                  
 26875                                  ;	Set up attribute
 26876                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 26877 000048F6 B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 26878 000048F8 AA                              STOSB
 26879                                  
 26880                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 26881 000048F9 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 26882 000048FC 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 26883                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 26884 00004900 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 26885 00004903 AB                              STOSW
 26886                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 26887 00004904 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 26888 00004907 AB                      	STOSW
 26889                                  
 26890                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 26891 00004908 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 26892 0000490A AB                              STOSW
 26893                                  
 26894                                  ;	0 file size
 26895 0000490B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26896 0000490D AB                              STOSW
 26897 0000490E AB                              STOSW
 26898 0000490F C3                              retn
 26899                                  
 26900                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 26901                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26902                                  ;
 26903                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 26904                                  ;
 26905                                  ; Inputs:
 26906                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 26907                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 26908                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 26909                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 26910                                  ;
 26911                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 26912                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 26913                                  ;
 26914                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 26915                                  ;               terminated)
 26916                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 26917                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 26918                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 26919                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 26920                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 26921                                  ; Function:
 26922                                  ;       Make a new node
 26923                                  ; Outputs:
 26924                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 26925                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 26926                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 26927                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 26928                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 26929                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 26930                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 26931                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 26932                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 26933                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 26934                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 26935                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 26936                                  ;       ELSE
 26937                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 26938                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 26939                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 26940                                  ;               containing new node.
 26941                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 26942                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 26943                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 26944                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 26945                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 26946                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 26947                                  ;
 26948                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26949                                  
 26950                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26951                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26952                                  
 26953                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26954                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26955                                  
 26956                                  MakeNode:
 26957                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 26958 00004910 C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 26959 00004916 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 26960 00004917 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 26961 0000491C A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 26962 0000491F E887F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 26963 00004922 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 26964 00004924 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 26965 00004926 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 26966 00004927 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 26967 00004929 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 26968 0000492B 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 26969 0000492E 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 26970                                  make_err_4:
 26971 00004930 B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 26972                                  make_err_ret:
 26973 00004932 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26974 00004934 F9                              STC
 26975                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 26976 00004935 C3                              retn
 26977                                  
 26978                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 26979                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 26980                                  make_type:
 26981                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 26982                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26983                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 26984 00004936 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 26985 0000493B 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26986 0000493D 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 26987                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 26988                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 26989 00004942 F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 26990 00004947 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26991 00004949 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 26992 0000494A B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 26993                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26994                                  make_retn:
 26995                                  	;return
 26996 0000494D C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 26997                                  
 26998                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 26999                                  
 27000                                  make_type2:
 27001 0000494E C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27002 00004952 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 27003 00004954 F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 27004 00004955 EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 27005                                  
 27006                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 27007                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 27008                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 27009                                  ;   else => file
 27010                                  
 27011                                  make_exists:
 27012 00004957 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 27013 00004959 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 27014                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 27015 0000495B F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 27016 00004960 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 27017                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 27018                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 27019 00004962 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 27020 00004964 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 27021 00004966 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 27022 00004968 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 27023 0000496A 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 27024 0000496B 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 27025                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 27026 0000496F 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 27027                                  	;test	ch,1
 27028 00004973 F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 27029 00004976 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 27030 00004978 E8D0F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 27031 0000497B 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 27032 0000497C 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 27033 0000497E 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 27034                                  make_share:
 27035 00004980 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 27036 00004982 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 27037 00004983 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 27038 00004984 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 27039 00004986 E84501                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 27040 00004989 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27041 0000498D 56                      	push	si
 27042 0000498E 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 27043 0000498F E86729                  	call	ShareEnter
 27044 00004992 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 27045                                  
 27046                                  ; User failed request.
 27047 00004994 5B                      	pop	bx
 27048 00004995 5E                      	pop	si
 27049 00004996 59                      	pop	cx
 27050 00004997 58                      	pop	ax
 27051                                  
 27052                                  Make_Share_ret:
 27053 00004998 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 27054 0000499A EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 27055                                  
 27056                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 27057 0000499C 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 27058                                  make_err_ret_5:
 27059 0000499D B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 27060                                          ; 22/11/2022
 27061 0000499F EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 27062                                  
 27063                                  make_exists_dir:
 27064 000049A1 B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 27065                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27066 000049A3 EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 27067                                  
 27068                                  make_save:
 27069 000049A5 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 27070 000049A6 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 27071 000049A8 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 27072 000049AB 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 27073 000049AC 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 27074 000049AE B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 27075                                  make_save_retn:
 27076 000049B0 C3                              retn
 27077                                  
 27078                                  make_new:
 27079 000049B1 E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 27080 000049B4 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 27081                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 27082 000049B6 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 27083 000049BB 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 27084                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 27085 000049BD 50                      	push	ax
 27086 000049BE 53                      	push	bx
 27087 000049BF 56                      	push	si		
 27088 000049C0 E83629                          call	ShareEnter
 27089 000049C3 5E                      	pop	si
 27090 000049C4 5B                      	pop	bx
 27091 000049C5 58                      	pop	ax
 27092 000049C6 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 27093                                  
 27094                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 27095                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 27096                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 27097                                  
 27098 000049C8 50                              PUSH    AX
 27099 000049C9 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 27100                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 27101 000049CD 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 27102                                  	
 27103                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27104                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 27105 000049D1 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 27106                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 27107 000049D6 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 27108                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27109 000049D8 E8FB10                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 27110                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 27111 000049DB 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 27112                                  yesdirty8:
 27113 000049E0 C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 27114                                  	; 15/12/2022
 27115 000049E4 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 27116                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27117                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 27118                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 27119 000049E8 E8E60F                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 27120 000049EB 58                              POP     AX
 27121 000049EC EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 27122                                  
 27123                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 27124                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 27125                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 27126                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 27127                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 27128                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 27129                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 27130                                  ;
 27131                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 27132                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 27133                                  
 27134                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27135                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27136                                  
 27137                                  MakeEndShare:
 27138 000049EE C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 27139 000049F2 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 27140 000049F4 E81BC9                  	call	ECritSFT
 27141 000049F7 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 27142                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 27143 000049FA 50                      	push	ax
 27144 000049FB 57                      	push	di
 27145 000049FC 06                      	push	es
 27146 000049FD 9C                              PUSHF
 27147 000049FE E8F328                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 27148 00004A01 9D                              POPF
 27149 00004A02 07                      	pop	es
 27150 00004A03 5F                      	pop	di
 27151 00004A04 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 27152                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 27153 00004A07 E823C9                  	call	LCritSFT
 27154                                  	; 22/11/2022
 27155                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27156 00004A0A 5B                      	pop	bx
 27157 00004A0B 5E                      	pop	si
 27158 00004A0C 59                      	pop	cx
 27159 00004A0D 58                      	pop	ax
 27160 00004A0E E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 27161                                  
 27162                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 27163                                  
 27164 00004A11 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 27165 00004A13 50                      	push	ax
 27166 00004A14 53                      	push	bx
 27167 00004A15 56                      	push	si
 27168 00004A16 9C                              PUSHF
 27169 00004A17 E8DF28                          call	ShareEnter
 27170 00004A1A 9D                              POPF
 27171 00004A1B 5E                      	pop	si
 27172 00004A1C 5B                      	pop	bx
 27173 00004A1D 58                      	pop	ax
 27174                                  
 27175                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 27176                                  
 27177                                  makeendshare_retn:
 27178 00004A1E C3                              retn
 27179                                  
 27180                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27181                                  ;
 27182                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 27183                                  ;
 27184                                  ; Inputs:
 27185                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 27186                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 27187                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 27188                                  ;               entries
 27189                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 27190                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 27191                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 27192                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 27193                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 27194                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 27195                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 27196                                  ;       If FILE
 27197                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 27198                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 27199                                  ;       If device
 27200                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 27201                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 27202                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 27203                                  ; Function:
 27204                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 27205                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 27206                                  ; Outputs:
 27207                                  ;       Carry set if error
 27208                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 27209                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 27210                                  ;       else
 27211                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 27212                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 27213                                  ;
 27214                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27215                                  
 27216                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27217                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27218                                  
 27219                                  NEWENTRY:
 27220 00004A1F C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 27221 00004A23 7315                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 27222 00004A25 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 27223                                  	;STC
 27224                                          ;jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 27225                                          ; 24/09/2023
 27226 00004A2A 750C                    	jnz	short ERRRET3
 27227 00004A2C E80CFE                  	CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 27228 00004A2F 72ED                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed

 27347                                  
 27348                                  ; DOOPEN
 27349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27350                                  ;
 27351                                  ; Inputs:
 27352                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 27353                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 27354                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 27355                                  ;       If FILE
 27356                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 27357                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 27358                                  ;       If device
 27359                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 27360                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 27361                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 27362                                  ; Function:
 27363                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 27364                                  ; Outputs:
 27365                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 27366                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 27367                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 27368                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 27369                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 27370                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 27371                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 27372                                  ;       If device
 27373                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 27374                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 27375                                  ;       If file
 27376                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 27377                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 27378                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 27379                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 27380                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 27381                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 27382                                  ;
 27383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27384                                  
 27385                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 27386                                  DOOPEN:

 27580                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27581                                  ;
 27582                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 27583                                  ;
 27584                                  ; Inputs:
 27585                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 27586                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 27587                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 27588                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 27589                                  ; Function:
 27590                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 27591                                  ; Outputs:
 27592                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27593                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 27594                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 27595                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27596                                  
 27597                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27598                                  FREEENT:
 27599 00004B6D 1E                              PUSH    DS
 27600 00004B6E C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 27601 00004B72 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 27602                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27603                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27604 00004B74 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27605                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27606 00004B77 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27607 00004B7C 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 27608 00004B7F 1F                              POP     DS
 27609 00004B80 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 27610 00004B83 722E                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 27611                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 27612 00004B85 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 27613 00004B89 7728                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 27614 00004B8B 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 27615 00004B8D 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 27616 00004B8E FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27617 00004B92 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 27618 00004B93 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 27619 00004B95 E8AC02                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 27620 00004B98 5A                              POP     DX
 27621 00004B99 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27622 00004B9D 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 27623 00004B9F 5B                              POP     BX
 27624                                  freeent_retn:
 27625 00004BA0 C3                              retn			; Screw up
 27626                                  
 27627                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 27628                                  	; 22/09/2023
 27629                                  	;;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 27630                                          ;MOV	byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL ; *
 27631                                          ;XOR	AL,AL ; *
 27632                                  	;call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 27633 00004BA1 E8290D                  	call	GETBUFFER ; * ; pre read  
 27634                                  
 27635 00004BA4 5B                              POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 27636 00004BA5 72F9                            jc	short freeent_retn
 27637 00004BA7 E8B2EA                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 27638 00004BAA 031E[E205]                      ADD     BX,[CURBUF]	; Correct it for new buffer
 27639 00004BAE 89DE                            MOV     SI,BX
 27640                                  	;add	si,1Ah
 27641 00004BB0 83C61A                          ADD     SI,dir_entry.dir_first	; Get corrected SI
 27642                                  RET1:
 27643 00004BB3 F8                              CLC
 27644 00004BB4 C3                              retn
 27645                                  
 27646                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27647                                  ;
 27648                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 27649                                  ;
 27650                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 27651                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 27652                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 27653                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 27654                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 27655                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 27656                                  ;
 27657                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27658                                  
 27659                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 27660 00004BB5 50                      	PUSH    AX
 27661 00004BB6 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 27662 00004BB7 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 27663 00004BBC 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 27664 00004BBE C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 27665 00004BC3 06                      	push	es
 27666 00004BC4 57                      	push	di
 27667 00004BC5 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27668 00004BC9 E8ADF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 27669 00004BCC 5F                      	pop	di
 27670 00004BCD 07                      	pop	es
 27671                                  
 27672                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 27673 00004BCE 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 27674 00004BCF 58                              POP     AX
 27675 00004BD0 C3                              retn
 27676

 27686                                  ;**	Misc Low level routines for doing simple FCB computations, Cache
 27687                                  ;       reads and writes, I/O optimization, and FAT allocation/deallocation
 27688                                  ;
 27689                                  ;	SKPCLP
 27690                                  ;	FNDCLUS
 27691                                  ;	BUFSEC
 27692                                  ;	BUFRD
 27693                                  ;	BUFWRT
 27694                                  ;	NEXTSEC
 27695                                  ;	OPTIMIZE
 27696                                  ;	FIGREC
 27697                                  ;	ALLOCATE
 27698                                  ;	RESTFATBYT
 27699                                  ;	RELEASE
 27700                                  ;	RELBLKS
 27701                                  ;	GETEOF
 27702                                  ;
 27703                                  ;	Modification history:
 27704                                  ;
 27705                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 27706                                  ;               M039: DB 10/25/90 - Disk read/write optimization.
 27707                                  
 27708                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 27709                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27710                                  ;
 27711                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 27712                                  ;
 27713                                  ; Inputs:
 27714                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 27715                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27716                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 27717                                  ; Outputs:
 27718                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 27719                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 27720                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 27721                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27722                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 27723                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27724                                  
 27725                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27726                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27727                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27728                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27729                                  
 27730                                  FNDCLUS:
 27731 00004BD1 06                      	PUSH	ES
 27732 00004BD2 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; setup addressability to SFT
 27733                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 27734                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 27735 00004BD6 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 27736                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]
 27737 00004BDA 268B5519                        MOV     DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos]
 27738 00004BDE 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 27739 00004BE0 7424                    	JZ	short NOCLUS
 27740                                  
 27741 00004BE2 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX
 27742 00004BE4 7308                            JNB	short FINDIT
 27743                                  
 27744 00004BE6 01D1                            ADD     CX,DX
 27745 00004BE8 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 27746                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+0Bh]
 27747 00004BEA 268B5D0B                        MOV     BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus]
 27748                                  FINDIT:
 27749 00004BEE 07                              POP	ES
 27750 00004BEF E313                    	JCXZ	RET9
 27751                                  
 27752                                  	;entry	SKPCLP
 27753                                  SKPCLP:
 27754 00004BF1 E8CE08                  	call	UNPACK
 27755 00004BF4 7214                            jc	short fndclus_retn	; retc
 27756                                  
 27757                                  	; 09/09/2018
 27758                                  
 27759                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27760                                  	;push	bx
 27761                                  	;mov	bx,di
 27762                                  	;call	IsEOF
 27763                                  	;pop	bx	
 27764                                  	;jae	short RET9
 27765                                  
 27766                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27767                                  
 27768                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27769 00004BF6 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 27770 00004BF8 E8B008                  	call	IsEOF
 27771 00004BFB 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 27772 00004BFD 7305                    	jae	short RET9
 27773                                  
 27774 00004BFF 87DF                            XCHG    BX,DI
 27775 00004C01 42                              INC     DX
 27776                                  
 27777 00004C02 E2ED                    	LOOP	SKPCLP			; RMFS
 27778                                  RET9:	
 27779 00004C04 F8                      	CLC
 27780 00004C05 C3                              retn
 27781                                  NOCLUS:
 27782 00004C06 07                              POP	ES
 27783 00004C07 41                              INC	CX
 27784 00004C08 4A                              DEC	DX
 27785 00004C09 F8                              CLC
 27786                                  
 27787                                  fndclus_retn:
 27788 00004C0A C3                              retn
 27789                                  
 27790                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 27791                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27792                                  ;
 27793                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 27794                                  ;
 27795                                  ; Inputs:
 27796                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 27797                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 27798                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27799                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 27800                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 27801                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 27802                                  ; Function:
 27803                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 27804                                  ;       read if necessary.
 27805                                  ; Outputs:
 27806                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 27807                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 27808                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 27809                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 27810                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 27811                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 27812                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27813                                  
 27814                                  BUFSEC:
 27815 00004C0B 8B16[BC05]                      MOV     DX,[CLUSNUM]
 27816 00004C0F 8A1E[7305]                      MOV     BL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 27817                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],38h
 27818 00004C13 C606[4B03]38                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_IGNORE
 27819 00004C18 E85001                          CALL    FIGREC
 27820 00004C1B E8B60C                  	call	GETBUFFR
 27821 00004C1E 72EA                            jc	short fndclus_retn
 27822                                  
 27823 00004C20 C606[7405]01                    MOV     BYTE [TRANS],1	; A transfer is taking place
 27824 00004C25 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 27825 00004C29 89F7                            MOV     DI,SI
 27826 00004C2B 8B0E[D205]                      MOV     CX,[BYTCNT1]
 27827 00004C2F 01CF                            ADD     DI,CX
 27828 00004C31 893E[B805]                      MOV     [NEXTADD],DI
 27829 00004C35 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 27830                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],8
 27831 00004C39 26804D0508                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDATA
 27832                                  	;;lea	di,[di+16] ; MSDOS 3.3 
 27833                                  	;lea	di,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 27834 00004C3E 8D7D14                          LEA     DI,[DI+BUFINSIZ]        ; Point to buffer
 27835 00004C41 033E[CC05]                      ADD     DI,[BYTSECPOS]
 27836 00004C45 F8                              CLC
 27837 00004C46 C3                              retn
 27838                                  
 27839                                  ;Break   <BUFRD, BUFWRT -- PERFORM BUFFERED READ AND WRITE>
 27840                                  
 27841                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27842                                  ;
 27843                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFRD
 27844                                  ;
 27845                                  ; Do a partial sector read via one of the system buffers
 27846                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 27847                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27848                                  ;
 27849                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 27850                                  ;
 27851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27852                                  
 27853                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27854                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27855                                  BUFRD:
 27856 00004C47 06                              PUSH	ES
 27857 00004C48 31C0                            xor	ax, ax			; pre-read sector
 27858 00004C4A E8BEFF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 27859 00004C4D 7303                            JNC	short BUF_OK
 27860                                  
 27861                                  BUF_IO_FAIL:				; this label used by BUFWRT also
 27862 00004C4F 07                              POP	ES
 27863 00004C50 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT RBUFPLACED
 27864                                  
 27865                                  BUF_OK:
 27866 00004C52 8CC3                            MOV     BX,ES
 27867 00004C54 8E06[2E03]                      MOV     ES,[DMAADD+2]
 27868 00004C58 8EDB                            MOV     DS,BX
 27869 00004C5A 87FE                    	XCHG    DI,SI
 27870 00004C5C D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 27871                                  ;M039
 27872                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27873                                  	;JNC	short EVENRD
 27874                                  	;MOVSB
 27875                                  ;EVENRD:
 27876                                  	;REP     MOVSW
 27877                                  
 27878                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs ; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 27879                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Buffer.
 27880                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Transfer memory block.
 27881                                  
 27882                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27883 00004C5E F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Buffer to Transfer memory.
 27884                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 27885                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 27886                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27887 00004C60 7301                    	jnc	short EVENRD ; **** 20/05/2019
 27888 00004C62 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 27889                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27890                                  	;adc	cx,0
 27891                                  	;rep	movsb
 27892                                  ;M039
 27893                                  EVENRD: ; ****
 27894 00004C63 07                              POP	ES
 27895                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27896 00004C64 36C53E[E205]                    LDS     DI,[SS:CURBUF]
 27897                                  	;;lea	bx,[di+16]
 27898                                  	;lea	bx,[di+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 27899 00004C69 8D5D14                  	LEA     BX,[DI+BUFINSIZ]
 27900 00004C6C 29DE                            SUB     SI,BX                   ; Position in buffer
 27901 00004C6E E8030C                          call	PLACEBUF
 27902                                  	;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 27903 00004C71 263B7602                	CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Read Last byte?
 27904 00004C75 7205                            JB	short RBUFPLACEDC	; No, leave buf where it is
 27905                                  ;M039
 27906                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27907                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 27908                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 27909                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 27910 00004C77 36893E[6D00]            	MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],DI	; Make it prime candidate for
 27911                                  ;M039					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 27912                                  
 27913                                  RBUFPLACEDC:
 27914 00004C7C F8                              CLC
 27915                                  RBUFPLACED:
 27916 00004C7D 16                      	push	ss
 27917 00004C7E 1F                      	pop	ds
 27918 00004C7F C3                              retn
 27919                                  
 27920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27921                                  ;
 27922                                  ; Procedure : BUFWRT
 27923                                  ;
 27924                                  ; Do a partial sector write via one of the system buffers
 27925                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 27926                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27927                                  ;
 27928                                  ; DS - set to DOSDATA
 27929                                  ;
 27930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27931                                  
 27932                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27933                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27934                                  BUFWRT:
 27935                                          ;MOV     AX,[SECPOS]
 27936                                          ; MSDOS 6.0
 27937                                  	;ADD	AX,1            	; Set for next sector
 27938                                          ;MOV	[SECPOS],AX 		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27939                                          ;ADC	word [SECPOS+2],0	;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27940                                          ; 24/09/2023
 27941 00004C80 FF06[C405]              	inc	word [SECPOS]
 27942 00004C84 7504                    	jnz	short bufw_secpos
 27943 00004C86 FF06[C605]              	inc	word [SECPOS+2]
 27944                                  bufw_secpos:
 27945 00004C8A A1[C605]                	MOV	AX,[SECPOS+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27946 00004C8D 3B06[CA05]                      CMP	AX,[VALSEC+2]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27947 00004C91 B001                            MOV	AL,1			;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27948 00004C93 770F                            JA	short NOREAD		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27949 00004C95 720B                            JB	short _doread		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27950 00004C97 A1[C405]                        MOV	AX,[SECPOS]		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27951                                  
 27952                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27953                                  	;INC	AX
 27954                                  	;MOV	[SECPOS],AX ; 09/09/2018
 27955                                  
 27956                                  	; 20/05/2019
 27957                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 27958 00004C9A 3B06[C805]                      CMP     AX,[VALSEC]		; Has sector been written before?
 27959 00004C9E B001                            MOV     AL,1
 27960 00004CA0 7702                            JA	short NOREAD		; Skip preread if SECPOS>VALSEC
 27961                                  _doread:
 27962 00004CA2 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL
 27963                                  NOREAD:
 27964 00004CA4 06                              PUSH	ES
 27965 00004CA5 E863FF                          CALL    BUFSEC
 27966 00004CA8 72A5                    	JC	short BUF_IO_FAIL
 27967 00004CAA 8E1E[2E03]                      MOV     DS,[DMAADD+2]
 27968 00004CAE D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 27969                                  ;M039
 27970                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27971                                  	;JNC	short EVENWRT ; 09/09/2018
 27972                                  	;MOVSB
 27973                                  ;EVENWRT:
 27974                                  	;REP	MOVSW
 27975                                  
 27976                                  ;	CX = # of whole WORDs; CF=1 if odd # of bytes.
 27977                                  ;       DS:SI-> Source within Transfer memory block.
 27978                                  ;       ES:DI-> Destination within Buffer.
 27979                                  
 27980                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27981 00004CB0 F3A5                    	rep	movsw			;Copy Transfer memory to Buffer.
 27982                                  	;adc	cx,0                    ;CX=1 if odd # of bytes, else CX=0.
 27983                                  	;rep	movsb                   ;Copy last byte.
 27984                                  	; 16/12/2022
 27985 00004CB2 7301                    	jnc	short EVENWRT ; **** 20/05/2019
 27986 00004CB4 A4                      	movsb ; ****
 27987                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 27988                                  	;adc	cx,0
 27989                                  	;rep	movsb
 27990                                  ;M039
 27991                                  EVENWRT: ; ****
 27992 00004CB5 07                              POP	ES
 27993                                  
 27994                                  ;hkn; SS override
 27995 00004CB6 36C51E[E205]                    LDS     BX,[SS:CURBUF]
 27996                                  
 27997                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27998 00004CBB F6470540                        TEST	byte [BX+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 27999                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 28000 00004CBF 7507                            JNZ	short yesdirty10	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 28001 00004CC1 E8120E                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 28002                                  	
 28003                                  	;or	byte [bx+5],40h
 28004 00004CC4 804F0540                        OR	byte [BX+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 28005                                  yesdirty10:
 28006                                  	;;lea	si,[bx+16]
 28007                                  	;lea	si,[bx+20] ; MSDOS 6.0
 28008 00004CC8 8D7714                          LEA     SI,[BX+BUFINSIZ]
 28009 00004CCB 29F7                            SUB     DI,SI                   ; Position in buffer
 28010                                  ;M039
 28011                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 28012                                  	;MOV	SI,DI
 28013                                  	;MOV	DI,BX
 28014                                  	;call	PLACEBUF
 28015                                  	;;cmp	si,[es:bp+2]
 28016                                  	;CMP	SI,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Written last byte?
 28017                                  	;JB	short WBUFPLACED	; No, leave buf where it is
 28018                                  	;call	PLACEHEAD               ; Make it prime candidate for chucking
 28019                                                                          ;  even though it is MRU.
 28020                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 28021                                  	;cmp	di,[es:bp+2]
 28022 00004CCD 263B7E02                	CMP	di,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] ; Written last byte?
 28023 00004CD1 7205                            JB	short WBUFPLACED	; No, leave buf where it is
 28024 00004CD3 36891E[6D00]                    MOV	[ss:BufferQueue],BX	; Make it prime candidate for
 28025                                  					; chucking even though it is MRU.
 28026                                  ;M039
 28027                                  
 28028                                  WBUFPLACED:
 28029 00004CD8 F8                              CLC
 28030 00004CD9 16                      	push	ss
 28031 00004CDA 1F                      	pop	ds
 28032 00004CDB C3                              retn
 28033                                  
 28034                                  ;Break   <NEXTSEC -- Compute next sector to read or write>
 28035                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28036                                  ;
 28037                                  ; Procedure Name : NEXTSEC
 28038                                  ;
 28039                                  ; Compute the next sector to read or write
 28040                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28041                                  ;
 28042                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28043                                  
 28044                                  NEXTSEC:
 28045 00004CDC F606[7405]FF            	test	byte [TRANS],0FFh ; -1 
 28046 00004CE1 7426                            JZ	short CLRET
 28047                                  
 28048 00004CE3 A0[7305]                        MOV     AL,[SECCLUSPOS]
 28049 00004CE6 FEC0                            INC     AL
 28050                                  	;cmp	al,[es:bp+4]
 28051 00004CE8 263A4604                        CMP     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28052 00004CEC 7618                            JBE	short SAVPOS
 28053                                  
 28054 00004CEE 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 28055 00004CF2 E8B607                          call	IsEOF
 28056 00004CF5 7314                            JAE	short NONEXT
 28057                                  
 28058 00004CF7 E8C807                          call	UNPACK
 28059 00004CFA 720F                            JC	short NONEXT
 28060                                  clusgot:
 28061 00004CFC 893E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],DI
 28062 00004D00 FF06[BA05]                      INC     word [LASTPOS]
 28063 00004D04 B000                            MOV     AL,0
 28064                                  SAVPOS:
 28065 00004D06 A2[7305]                        MOV     [SECCLUSPOS],AL
 28066                                  CLRET:
 28067 00004D09 F8                              CLC
 28068 00004D0A C3                              retn
 28069                                  NONEXT:
 28070 00004D0B F9                              STC
 28071 00004D0C C3                              retn
 28072                                  
 28073                                  ;Break	<OPTIMIZE -- DO A USER DISK REQUEST WELL>
 28074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28075                                  ;
 28076                                  ; Procedure Name : OPTIMIZE
 28077                                  ;
 28078                                  ; Inputs:
 28079                                  ;       BX = Physical cluster
 28080                                  ;       CX = No. of records
 28081                                  ;       DL = sector within cluster
 28082                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28083                                  ;       [NEXTADD] = transfer address
 28084                                  ; Outputs:
 28085                                  ;       AX = No. of records remaining
 28086                                  ;       BX = Transfer address
 28087                                  ;       CX = No. or records to be transferred
 28088                                  ;       DX = Physical sector address            (LOW)
 28089                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] = Physical sector address (HIGH)
 28090                                  ;       DI = Next cluster
 28091                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Last cluster accessed
 28092                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 28093                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 28094                                  ; ES:BP unchanged. Note that segment of transfer not set.
 28095                                  ;
 28096                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28097                                  
 28098                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 28099                                  OPTIMIZE:
 28100 00004D0D 52                      	PUSH    DX
 28101 00004D0E 53                              PUSH    BX
 28102                                  	;mov	al,[es:bp+4]
 28103 00004D0F 268A4604                        MOV     AL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 28104 00004D13 FEC0                            INC     AL              ; Number of sectors per cluster
 28105 00004D15 88C4                            MOV     AH,AL
 28106 00004D17 28D0                            SUB     AL,DL           ; AL = Number of sectors left in first cluster
 28107 00004D19 89CA                            MOV     DX,CX
 28108                                  	;MOV	CX,0
 28109                                  	; 25/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 28110                                  	; 16/12/2022
 28111 00004D1B 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx	; sub cx,cx
 28112                                  OPTCLUS:
 28113                                  ; AL has number of sectors available in current cluster
 28114                                  ; AH has number of sectors available in next cluster
 28115                                  ; BX has current physical cluster
 28116                                  ; CX has number of sequential sectors found so far
 28117                                  ; DX has number of sectors left to transfer
 28118                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 28119                                  ; ES:SI has FAT pointer
 28120                                  
 28121                                  do_norm3:
 28122 00004D1D E8A207                          call	UNPACK
 28123 00004D20 7236                            JC	short OP_ERR
 28124                                  clusgot2:
 28125 00004D22 00C1                    	ADD	CL,AL
 28126 00004D24 80D500                          ADC     CH,0
 28127 00004D27 39D1                            CMP     CX,DX
 28128 00004D29 7332                            JAE	short BLKDON
 28129 00004D2B 88E0                            MOV     AL,AH
 28130 00004D2D 43                              INC     BX
 28131 00004D2E 39DF                            CMP     DI,BX
 28132 00004D30 74EB                            JZ	short OPTCLUS
 28133 00004D32 4B                              DEC     BX
 28134                                  FINCLUS:
 28135 00004D33 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX    ; Last cluster accessed
 28136 00004D37 29CA                            SUB     DX,CX           ; Number of sectors still needed
 28137 00004D39 52                              PUSH    DX
 28138 00004D3A 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX
 28139                                  	;mul	word[ES:BP+2]
 28140 00004D3C 26F76602                        MUL	word [ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE] 
 28141                                  				; Number of sectors times sector size
 28142 00004D40 8B36[B805]                      MOV     SI,[NEXTADD]
 28143 00004D44 01F0                            ADD     AX,SI           ; Adjust by size of transfer
 28144 00004D46 A3[B805]                        MOV     [NEXTADD],AX
 28145 00004D49 58                              POP     AX              ; Number of sectors still needed
 28146 00004D4A 5A                              POP     DX              ; Starting cluster
 28147 00004D4B 29D3                            SUB     BX,DX           ; Number of new clusters accessed
 28148 00004D4D 011E[BA05]                      ADD     [LASTPOS],BX
 28149 00004D51 5B                              POP     BX              ; BL = sector position within cluster
 28150 00004D52 E81600                  	call	FIGREC
 28151 00004D55 89F3                            MOV     BX,SI
 28152                                  	; 24/09/2023
 28153                                  	; cf=0 (at the return of FIGREC)
 28154                                  	;CLC
 28155 00004D57 C3                              retn
 28156                                  OP_ERR:
 28157 00004D58 83C404                          ADD     SP,4
 28158 00004D5B F9                      	STC
 28159 00004D5C C3                              retn
 28160                                  BLKDON:
 28161 00004D5D 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX           ; Number of sectors in cluster we don't want
 28162 00004D5F 28CC                            SUB     AH,CL           ; Number of sectors in cluster we accepted
 28163 00004D61 FECC                            DEC     AH              ; Adjust to mean position within cluster
 28164 00004D63 8826[7305]                      MOV     [SECCLUSPOS],AH
 28165 00004D67 89D1                            MOV     CX,DX           ; Anyway, make the total equal to the request
 28166 00004D69 EBC8                            JMP     SHORT FINCLUS
 28167                                  
 28168                                  ;Break	<FIGREC -- Figure sector in allocation unit>
 28169                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28170                                  ;
 28171                                  ; Procedure Name : FIGREC
 28172                                  ;
 28173                                  ; Inputs:
 28174                                  ;       DX = Physical cluster number
 28175                                  ;       BL = Sector position within cluster
 28176                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 28177                                  ; Outputs:
 28178                                  ;       DX = physical sector number           (LOW)
 28179                                  ;       [HIGH_SECTOR] Physical sector address (HIGH)
 28180                                  ; No other registers affected.
 28181                                  ;
 28182                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 28183                                  
 28184                                  	; 10/06/2019
 28185                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 28186                                  	; DOSCODE:8D96h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 28187                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 28189                                  FIGREC:

 28202                                  	; 24/09/2023

 28207                                  rotleft:					;F.C. >32mb
 28208 00004D81 F8                      	CLC					;F.C. >32mb
 28209 00004D82 D1D2                    	RCL	DX,1				;F.C. >32mb
 28210                                  	; 10/06/2019
