 32947                                  	; ==================================================================
 32948                                  	; validate function
 32949                                  	; ==================================================================
 32950                                  		      	
 32951                                  	; M068 - Start
 32952                                  	;
 32953                                  	; Reset the A20OFF_COUNT to 0. This is done as there is a 
 32954                                  	; possibility that the count may not be decremented all the way to
 32955                                  	; 0. A typical case is if the program for which we intended to keep 
 32956                                  	; the A20  off for a sufficiently long time (A20OFF_COUNT int 21 
 32957                                  	; calls), exits pre-maturely due to error conditions.
 32958                                  
 32959                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32960 00005AF4 36C606[8500]00          	mov	byte [SS:A20OFF_COUNT], 0
 32961                                  
 32962                                  	; If al=5 (ExecReady) we'll change the return address on the stack	
 32963                                  	; to be LeaveDos in msdisp.asm. This ensures that the EXECA20OFF
 32964                                  	; bit set in DOS_FLAG by ExceReady is not cleared in msdisp.asm
 32965                                  
 32966 00005AFA 3C05                    	cmp	al,5			; Q: is this ExecReady call
 32967                                  	;jne	short @f
 32968 00005AFC 7505                    	jne	short Exec_@f		; N: continue
 32969                                  					; Y: change ret addr. to LeaveDos.
 32970 00005AFE 59                      	pop	cx			; Note CX is not input to ExecReady
 32971 00005AFF B9[0804]                	mov	cx,LeaveDOS
 32972 00005B02 51                      	push	cx
 32973                                  ;@@:
 32974                                  Exec_@f:
 32975                                  	; M068 - End
 32976                                  	
 32977                                  	;Enter
 32978                                  
 32979 00005B03 55                      	push	bp
 32980 00005B04 89E5                    	mov	bp,sp
 32981                                  	;;sub	sp,26	; MSDOS 3.3
 32982                                  	; 30/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS compatibility)	
 32983                                  	;sub	sp,29	; MSDOS 6.0 (& MSDOS 6.21)
 32984                                  	; 17/12/2022
 32985                                  	; 20/05/2019
 32986 00005B06 83EC1E                  	sub	sp,30	; Retro DOS v4.0	
 32987                                  
 32988                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 32989 00005B09 3C05                    	cmp	AL,5			; only 0, 1, 3 or 5 are allowed ;M028
 32990                                  					; M030
 32991 00005B0B 7614                    	jna	short Exec_Check_2
 32992                                  
 32993                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 32994                                  	;cmp	AL,3
 32995                                  	;jna	short Exec_Check_2
 32996

 32998 00005B0D 36C606[2303]01          	mov	byte [ss:EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; 1

 34454                                  
 34455                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34456                                  ;SUBTTL Terminate and stay resident handler
 34457                                  ;
 34458                                  ; Input:    DX is  an  offset  from  CurrentPDB  at which to
 34459                                  ;	    truncate the current block.
 34460                                  ;
 34461                                  ; output:   The current block is truncated (expanded) to be [DX+15]/16
 34462                                  ;	    paragraphs long.  An exit is simulated via resetting CurrentPDB
 34463                                  ;	    and restoring the vectors.
 34464                                  ;
 34465                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34466                                  
 34467                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34468                                  	; DOSCODE:A19Bh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34469                                  
 34470                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34471                                  	; DOSCODE:A13Bh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34472                                  
 34473                                  _$KEEP_PROCESS:
 34474 0000611A 50                      	push	AX			; keep exit code around
 34475                                  	;mov	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],3
 34476 0000611B 36C606[7C05]03          	mov	BYTE [SS:EXIT_TYPE],EXIT_KEEP_PROCESS
 34477 00006121 368E06[3003]            	mov	ES,[SS:CurrentPDB]
 34478 00006126 83FA06                  	cmp	DX,6h			; keep enough space around for system
 34479 00006129 7303                    	jae	short Keep_Shrink	; info
 34480                                  
 34481 0000612B BA0600                  	mov	DX,6h
 34482                                  
 34483                                  Keep_Shrink:
 34484 0000612E 89D3                    	mov	BX,DX
 34485 00006130 53                      	push	BX
 34486 00006131 06                      	push	ES
 34487 00006132 E82E02                  	call	_$SETBLOCK		; ignore return codes.
 34488 00006135 1F                      	pop	DS
 34489 00006136 5B                      	pop	BX
 34490 00006137 7207                    	jc	short Keep_Done		; failed on modification
 34491                                  
 34492 00006139 8CD8                    	mov	AX,DS
 34493 0000613B 01D8                    	add	AX,BX
 34494                                  	;mov	[2],ax
 34495 0000613D A30200                  	mov	[PDB.BLOCK_LEN],AX	;PBUGBUG
 34496                                  
 34497                                  Keep_Done:
 34498 00006140 58                      	pop	AX
 34499 00006141 EB26                    	jmp	SHORT exit_inner	; and let abort take care of the rest
 34500

 34531                                  _$EXIT:
 34532                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34533                                  	; IBMDOSDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 6375h
 34534 00006152 30E4                    	xor	AH,AH

 34536 00006159 08E4                    	or	AH,AH
 34537                                  	;mov	BYTE [SS:EXIT_TYPE],0
 34538 0000615B 36C606[7C05]00          	mov	BYTE [SS:EXIT_TYPE],EXIT_TERMINATE
 34539 00006161 7406                    	jz	short exit_inner

 34549 00006171 8F4414                  	pop	word [SI+user_env.user_CS] ;PBUGBUG
 34550 00006174 EB08                    	jmp	short abort_inner
 34551                                  
 34552                                  ;BREAK <$ABORT -- Terminate a process>
 34553                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34554                                  ; Inputs:
 34555                                  ;	user_CS:00 must point to valid program header block
 34556                                  ; Function:
 34557                                  ;	Restore terminate and Cntrl-C addresses, flush buffers and transfer
 34558                                  ;	to the terminate address
 34559                                  ; Returns:
 34560                                  ;	TO THE TERMINATE ADDRESS
 34561                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34562                                  
 34563                                  _$ABORT:
 34564 00006176 30C0                    	xor	AL,AL
 34565                                  	;mov	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],0
 34566                                  	;mov	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],AL ; = 0
 34567 00006178 36C606[7C05]00          	mov	byte [SS:EXIT_TYPE],EXIT_ABORT
 34568                                  
 34569                                  	; abort_inner must have AL set as the exit code! The exit type
 34570                                  	; is retrieved from exit_type. Also, the PDB at user_CS needs
 34571                                  	; to be correct as the one that is terminating.
 34572                                  
 34573                                  abort_inner:
 34574 0000617E 368A26[7C05]            	mov	AH,[SS:EXIT_TYPE]
 34575 00006183 36A3[3403]              	mov	[SS:exit_code],AX
 34576 00006187 E8FBA2                  	call	Get_User_Stack
 34577                                  
 34578                                  	;mov	ds,[si+14h]
 34579 0000618A 8E5C14                  	mov	DS,[SI+user_env.user_CS] ; set up old interrupts ;PBUGBUG
 34580 0000618D 31C0                    	xor	AX,AX
 34581 0000618F 8EC0                    	mov	ES,AX
 34582                                  	;mov	si,10
 34583 00006191 BE0A00                  	mov	SI,SAVEXIT
 34584                                  	;mov	di,88h
 34585 00006194 BF8800                  	mov	DI,addr_int_terminate
 34586 00006197 A5                      	movsw
 34587 00006198 A5                      	movsw
 34588 00006199 A5                      	movsw
 34589 0000619A A5                      	movsw
 34590 0000619B A5                      	movsw
 34591 0000619C A5                      	movsw
 34592 0000619D E944F2                  	jmp	reset_environment

 34690                                  ;NAME Alloc

 34692                                  ;SUBTTL memory allocation utility routines
 34693                                  ;PAGE
 34694                                  ;
 34695                                  ; arena data
 34696                                  ;
 34697                                  ;       i_need  arena_head,WORD         ; seg address of start of arena
 34698                                  ;       i_need  CurrentPDB,WORD         ; current process data block addr
 34699                                  ;       i_need  FirstArena,WORD         ; first free block found
 34700                                  ;       i_need  BestArena,WORD          ; best free block found
 34701                                  ;       i_need  LastArena,WORD          ; last free block found
 34702                                  ;       i_need  AllocMethod,BYTE        ; how to alloc first(best)last
 34703                                  
 34704                                  ;**	Arena_Free_Process
 34705                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34706                                  ;	Free all arena blocks allocated to a prOcess
 34707                                  ;
 34708                                  ;	ENTRY	(bx) = PID of process
 34709                                  ;	EXIT	none
 34710                                  ;	USES	????? BUGBUG
 34711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34712                                  
 34713                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34714                                  	; DOSCODE:A1C2h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 34715                                  
 34716                                  arena_free_process:
 34717                                  	; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34718                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34719 000061A1 36A1[2400]                      MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head]
 34720                                  arena_free_process_start:
 34721 000061A5 BF0000                  	MOV     DI,ARENA.SIGNATURE ; 0
 34722                                  	;MOV	AX,[SS:arena_head] ; 15/04/2018  
 34723 000061A8 E83000                          CALL	check_signature         ; ES <- AX, check for valid block
 34724                                  
 34725                                  arena_free_process_loop:
 34726                                          ;retc
 34727 000061AB 723D                            JC	SHORT AFP_RETN	; Retro DOS v2.0 - 05/03/2018
 34728 000061AD 06                      	PUSH    ES
 34729 000061AE 1F                              POP     DS
 34730                                  	;cmp	[1],bx 
 34731 000061AF 391E0100                        CMP     [ARENA.OWNER],BX	; is block owned by pid?
 34732 000061B3 7504                            JNZ     SHORT arena_free_next	; no, skip to next
 34733                                  	;mov	[1],di
 34734 000061B5 893E0100                        MOV     [ARENA.OWNER],DI	; yes... free him
 34735                                  
 34736                                  arena_free_next:
 34737                                  	;cmp	byte [di],5Ah ;'Z'
 34738 000061B9 803D5A                          CMP     BYTE [DI],arena_signature_end
 34739                                                                          ; end of road, Jack?
 34740                                          ;retz				; never come back no more
 34741                                  	;JZ	SHORT AFP_RETN  ; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 2.11)
 34742                                  	; 14/05/2019
 34743                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34744 000061BC 7405                    	jz	short arena_chk_umbs
 34745                                          
 34746 000061BE E81300                  	CALL    arena_next              ; next item in ES/AX carry set if trash
 34747 000061C1 EBE8                            JMP     SHORT arena_free_process_loop
 34748                                  
 34749                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 34750                                  arena_chk_umbs:				; M010 - Start
 34751                                  	; 20/05/2019
 34752 000061C3 36A1[8C00]              	mov	ax,[ss:UMB_HEAD]	; ax = umb_head
 34753 000061C7 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh		; Q: is umb_head initialized
 34754 000061CA 741E                    	je	short ret_label		; N: we're done
 34755                                  	
 34756 000061CC 8CDF                    	mov	di,ds			; di = last arena
 34757 000061CE 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; Q: is last arena above umb_head
 34758 000061D0 7318                    	jae	short ret_label		; Y: we've scanned umbs also. done.
 34759 000061D2 EBD1                    	jmp	short arena_free_process_start
 34760                                  					; M010 - End
 34761                                  ;AFP_RETN:
 34762                                  ;	RETN
 34763                                  
 34764                                  ;	BREAK	<Arena Helper Routines>
 34765                                  
 34766                                  ;**	Arena_Next - Find Next item in Arena
 34767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34768                                  ;	ENTRY	DS - pointer to block head
 34769                                  ;		(di) = 0
 34770                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 34771                                  ;		'C' set iff arena damaged
 34772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34773                                  
 34774                                  arena_next:
 34775 000061D4 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS                   ; AX <- current block
 34776 000061D6 03060300                        ADD     AX,[ARENA.SIZE]		; AX <- AX + current block length
 34777 000061DA 40                              INC     AX                      ; remember that header!
 34778                                  
 34779                                  ;       fall into check_signature and return
 34780                                  ;
 34781                                  ;       CALL    check_signature         ; ES <- AX, carry set if error
 34782                                  ;       RETN
 34783                                  
 34784                                  ;**	Check_Signature - Check Memory Block Signature
 34785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34786                                  ;	ENTRY	(AX) = address of block header
 34787                                  ;		(di) = 0
 34788                                  ;	EXIT	 ES = AX
 34789                                  ;		'C' clear if signature good
 34790                                  ;		'C' set if signature bad
 34791                                  ;	USES	ES, Flags
 34792                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34793                                  
 34794                                  check_signature:        
 34795                                  
 34796 000061DB 8EC0                    	MOV     ES,AX                   ; ES <- AX
 34797                                  	;cmp	byte [es:di],4Dh ; 'M'
 34798 000061DD 26803D4D                        CMP     BYTE [ES:DI],arena_signature_normal
 34799                                                                          ; IF next signature = not_end THEN
 34800 000061E1 7407                            JZ      SHORT check_signature_ok ;   GOTO ok
 34801                                  	;cmp 	byte [es:di],5Ah ; 'Z'
 34802 000061E3 26803D5A                        CMP     BYTE [ES:DI],arena_signature_end
 34803                                                                          ; IF next signature = end then
 34804 000061E7 7401                            JZ      SHORT check_signature_ok ;   GOTO ok
 34805 000061E9 F9                              STC                             ; set error
 34806                                  ret_label: ; MSDOS 6.0
 34807                                  AFP_RETN:
 34808                                   	; Retro DOS v2.0 - 05/03/2018
 34809                                  check_signature_ok:
 34810                                  COALESCE_RETN:
 34811 000061EA C3                      	RETN
 34812                                  
 34813                                  ;**	Coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34815                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34816                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34817                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34818                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34819                                  ;
 34820                                  ;	ENTRY	(ds) = pointer to the head of a free block
 34821                                  ;		(di) = 0
 34822                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34823                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34824                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 34825                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34826                                  ;	USES	(cx)
 34827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34828                                          
 34829                                  Coalesce:
 34830                                  	;cmp	byte [di],5Ah ; 'Z'
 34831 000061EB 803D5A                  	CMP     BYTE [DI],arena_signature_end
 34832                                                                          ; IF current signature = END THEN
 34833                                          ;retz				;   GOTO ok
 34834 000061EE 74FA                            jz	short COALESCE_RETN
 34835 000061F0 E8E1FF                  	CALL    arena_next              ; ES, AX <- next block, Carry set if error
 34836                                          ;retc				; IF no error THEN GOTO check
 34837 000061F3 72F5                    	jc	short COALESCE_RETN
 34838                                  
 34839                                  coalesce_check:
 34840                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34841 000061F5 26393E0100                      CMP     [ES:ARENA.OWNER],DI
 34842                                          ;retnz				; IF next block isnt free THEN return
 34843 000061FA 75EE                            JNZ	SHORT COALESCE_RETN
 34844                                  	;mov	cx,[ES:3]
 34845 000061FC 268B0E0300              	MOV     CX,[ES:ARENA.SIZE]	; CX <- next block size
 34846 00006201 41                              INC     CX                      ; CX <- CX + 1 (for header size)
 34847                                          ;ADD	[3],CX
 34848 00006202 010E0300                	ADD     [ARENA.SIZE],CX		; current size <- current size + CX
 34849 00006206 268A0D                          MOV     CL,[ES:DI]              ; move up signature
 34850 00006209 880D                            MOV     [DI],CL
 34851 0000620B EBDE                            JMP     SHORT Coalesce		; try again
 34852                                  
 34853                                  ; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 34854                                  ; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 641Fh
 34855                                  
 34856                                  ;	BREAK  <$Alloc - allocate space in memory>
 34857                                  
 34858                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 34859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34860                                  ;**	$Alloc - Allocate Memory Space
 34861                                  ;
 34862                                  ;	$Alloc services the INT21 that allocates memory space to a program.
 34863                                  ;	Alloc returns a pointer to a free block of memory that
 34864                                  ;	has the requested size in paragraphs.
 34865                                  ;
 34866                                  ;	If the allocation strategy is HIGH_FIRST or HIGH_ONLY memory is 
 34867                                  ;	scanned from umb_head if not from arena_head. If the strategy is
 34868                                  ; 	HIGH_FIRST the scan is continued from arena_head if a block of 
 34869                                  ;	appropriate size is not found in the UMBs. If the strategy is 
 34870                                  ;	HIGH_FIRST+HIGH_ONLY only the UMBs are scanned for memory.
 34871                                  ;
 34872                                  ;	In either case if bit 0 of UmbFlag is not initialized then the scan
 34873                                  ;	starts from arena_head.
 34874                                  ;
 34875                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 34876                                  ;           MOV     BX,size
 34877                                  ;           MOV     AH,Alloc
 34878                                  ;           INT     21h
 34879                                  ;
 34880                                  ;	BUGBUG - a lot can be done to improve performance. We can set marks
 34881                                  ;	so that we start searching the arena at it's first non-trivial free
 34882                                  ;	block, we can peephole the code, etc. (We can move some subr calls
 34883                                  ;	inline, etc.) I assume that this is called rarely and that the arena
 34884                                  ;	doesn't have too many memory objects in it beyond the first free one.
 34885                                  ;	verify that this is true; if so, this can stay as is
 34886                                  ;
 34887                                  ;	ENTRY	(bx) = requested size, in bytes
 34888                                  ;		(DS) = (ES) = DOSGROUP
 34889                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if memory allocated
 34890                                  ;		  (ax:0) = address of requested memory
 34891                                  ;		'C' set if request failed
 34892                                  ;		  (AX) = error_not_enough_memory
 34893                                  ;		    (bx) = max size we could have allocated
 34894                                  ;		  (ax) = error_arena_trashed
 34895                                  ;	USES	All
 34896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34897                                  
 34898                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 34899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34900                                  ;SUBTTL $Alloc - allocate space in memory
 34901                                  ;
 34902                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 34903                                  ;           MOV     BX,size
 34904                                  ;           MOV     AH,Alloc
 34905                                  ;           INT     21h
 34906                                  ;         AX:0 is pointer to allocated memory
 34907                                  ;         BX is max size if not enough memory
 34908                                  ;
 34909                                  ;   Description:
 34910                                  ;           Alloc returns  a  pointer  to  a  free  block of
 34911                                  ;       memory that has the requested  size  in  paragraphs.
 34912                                  ;
 34913                                  ;   Error return:
 34914                                  ;           AX = error_not_enough_memory
 34915                                  ;              = error_arena_trashed
 34916                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34917                                  
 34918                                  ; DOSCODE:A28Eh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 34919                                  
 34920                                  ; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 34921                                  ; DOSCODE:A22Eh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)

 35234                                  ;	BREAK $SETBLOCK - change size of an allocated block (if possible)
 35235                                  
 35236                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 35237                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35238                                  ;**	$SETBLOCK - Change size of an Allocated Block
 35239                                  ;
 35240                                  ;	Setblock changes the size of an allocated block. First, we coalesce
 35241                                  ;	any following free space onto this block; then we try to trim the
 35242                                  ;	block down to the size requested.
 35243                                  ;
 35244                                  ;	Note that if the guy wants to grow the block but that growth fails,
 35245                                  ;	we still go ahead and coalesce any trailing free blocks onto it.
 35246                                  ;	Thus the maximum-size-possible value that we return has already
 35247                                  ;	been allocated! This is a bug, dare we fix it? BUGBUG
 35248                                  ;
 35249                                  ;	NOTE - $SETBLOCK is in bed with $ALLOC and jumps into $ALLOC to
 35250                                  ;		finish it's work. For this reason we build the allocsf
 35251                                  ;		structure on the frame, to make us compatible with $ALLOCs
 35252                                  ;		code.
 35253                                  ;
 35254                                  ;	ENTRY	(es) = segment of old block
 35255                                  ;		(bx) = newsize
 35256                                  ;		(ah) = SETBLOCK
 35257                                  ;
 35258                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35259                                  ;		'C' set if error
 35260                                  ;		  (ax) = error_invalid_block
 35261                                  ;		       = error_arena_trashed
 35262                                  ;		       = error_not_enough_memory
 35263                                  ;		       = error_invalid_function
 35264                                  ;		  (bx) = maximum size possible, iff (ax) = error_not_enough_memory
 35265                                  ;	USES	???? BUGBUG
 35266                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35267                                  
 35268                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 35269                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35270                                  ;SUBTTL $SETBLOCK - change size of an allocated block (if possible)
 35271                                  ;
 35272                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 35273                                  ;           MOV     ES,block
 35274                                  ;           MOV     BX,newsize
 35275                                  ;           MOV     AH,setblock
 35276                                  ;           INT     21h
 35277                                  ;         if setblock fails for growing, BX will have the maximum
 35278                                  ;         size possible
 35279                                  ;   Error return:
 35280                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_block
 35281                                  ;              = error_arena_trashed
 35282                                  ;              = error_not_enough_memory
 35283                                  ;              = error_invalid_function
 35284                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35285                                  
 35286                                  _$SETBLOCK:        
 35287                                  	; 04/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35288                                  	;EnterCrit   critMem
 35289 00006363 E8ACAF                  	call	ECritMEM ; MSDOS 3.3 & MSDOS 6.0
 35290                                  
 35291 00006366 BF0000                  	MOV     DI,ARENA.SIGNATURE
 35292 00006369 8CC0                            MOV     AX,ES
 35293 0000636B 48                              DEC     AX
 35294 0000636C E86CFE                          CALL    check_signature
 35295 0000636F 7303                            JNC     SHORT setblock_grab
 35296                                  
 35297                                  setblock_bad:
 35298 00006371 E905FF                          JMP     alloc_trashed
 35299                                  
 35300                                  setblock_grab:
 35301 00006374 8ED8                            MOV     DS,AX
 35302 00006376 E872FE                          CALL    Coalesce
 35303 00006379 72F6                            JC      SHORT setblock_bad
 35304 0000637B 8B0E0300                        MOV     CX,[ARENA.SIZE]
 35305 0000637F 51                              PUSH    CX
 35306 00006380 39CB                            CMP     BX,CX
 35307 00006382 76A5                            JBE     SHORT alloc_get_size
 35308 00006384 E91EFF                          JMP     alloc_fail
 35309

 35380                                  ;	BREAK $AllocOper - get/set allocation mechanism
 35381                                  
 35382                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 35383                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35384                                  ;**	$AllocOper - Get/Set Allocation Mechanism
 35385                                  ;
 35386                                  ;	Assembler usage:
 35387                                  ;           MOV     AH,AllocOper
 35388                                  ;           MOV     BX,method
 35389                                  ;           MOV     AL,func
 35390                                  ;           INT     21h
 35391                                  ;
 35392                                  ;	ENTRY	
 35393                                  ;		(al) = 0
 35394                                  ;		  Get allocation Strategy in (ax)
 35395                                  ;
 35396                                  ;		(al) = 1, (bx) = method = zw0000xy
 35397                                  ;		  Set allocation strategy.
 35398                                  ;		   w  = 1  => HIGH_ONLY
 35399                                  ;		   z  = 1  => HIGH_FIRST
 35400                                  ;		   xy = 00 => FIRST_FIT
 35401                                  ;		      = 01 => BEST_FIT
 35402                                  ;		      = 10 => LAST_FIT
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;		(al) = 2
 35405                                  ;		  Get UMB link state in (al)
 35406                                  ;
 35407                                  ;		(al) = 3
 35408                                  ;		  Set UMB link state
 35409                                  ;		   (bx) = 0 => Unlink UMBs
 35410                                  ;		   (bx) = 1 => Link UMBs
 35411                                  ;
 35412                                  ;
 35413                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35414                                  ;
 35415                                  ;		 if (al) = 0
 35416                                  ;		  (ax) = existing method
 35417                                  ;		 if (al) = 1
 35418                                  ;		  Sets allocation strategy
 35419                                  ;		 if (al) = 2
 35420                                  ;		  (al) = 0 => UMBs not linked
 35421                                  ;		  (al) = 1 => UMBs linked in
 35422                                  ;		 if (al) = 3
 35423                                  ;		  Links/Unlinks the UMBs into DOS chain
 35424                                  ;
 35425                                  ;		'C' set if error
 35426                                  ;		  AX = error_invalid_function
 35427                                  ;
 35428                                  ;	Rev. M000 - added support for HIGH_FIRST in (al) = 1. 7/9/90
 35429                                  ; 	Rev. M003 - added functions (al) = 2 and (al) = 3. 7/18/90
 35430                                  ;	Rev. M009 - (al) = 3 will return 'invalid function' in ax if
 35431                                  ;		    umbhead has'nt been initialized by sysinit and 'trashed
 35432                                  ;		    arena' if an arena sig is damaged.
 35433                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35434                                  
 35435                                  ; MSDOS 2.11 (& MSDOS 3.3)
 35436                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35437                                  ;SUBTTL $AllocOper - get/set allocation mechanism
 35438                                  ;
 35439                                  ;   Assembler usage:
 35440                                  ;           MOV     AH,AllocOper
 35441                                  ;           MOV     BX,method
 35442                                  ;           MOV     AL,func
 35443                                  ;           INT     21h
 35444                                  ;
 35445                                  ;   Error return:
 35446                                  ;           AX = error_invalid_function
 35447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35448                                  
 35449                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35450                                  _$ALLOCOPER:
 35451                                  	; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35452                                  	; MSDOS 6.0

 35613                                  ; MSDOS 6.0
 35614                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35615                                  ; Procedure Name : GetLastArena		-  M003
 35616                                  ;
 35617                                  ; Inputs	 : cx = umb_head
 35618                                  ;
 35619                                  ;
 35620                                  ; Outputs	 : If UMBs are linked
 35621                                  ;			ES = umb_head
 35622                                  ;			DS = arena before umb_head
 35623                                  ;		   else
 35624                                  ;			DS = last arena
 35625                                  ;			ES = next arena. will be umb_head if NC.
 35626                                  ;
 35627                                  ;		   CY if error
 35628                                  ;
 35629                                  ; Uses		 : DS, ES, DI, BX
 35630                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35631                                  
 35632                                  ; 14/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35633                                  ; DOSCODE:A4D6h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 35634                                  
 35635                                  ; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35636                                  ; DOSCODE:A476h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 35637                                  	
 35638                                  GetLastArena:
 35639 00006447 50                      	push	ax			; save ax
 35640                                  
 35641 00006448 36A1[2400]              	mov	ax,[ss:arena_head]
 35642 0000644C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; es = arena_head
 35643 0000644E 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35644                                  
 35645 00006450 26803D5A                	cmp     byte [es:di],arena_signature_end
 35646                                  					; Q: is this the last arena
 35647 00006454 7419                    	je	short GLA_done		; Y: return last arena in ES		
 35648                                  					
 35649                                  GLA_next:
 35650 00006456 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35651 00006458 E879FD                  	call	arena_next		; ax, es -> next arena
 35652                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35653                                  	;jc	short GLA_err
 35654                                  	; 17/12/2022
 35655 0000645B 7228                    	jc	short GLA_err2
 35656                                  
 35657 0000645D 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are UMBs linked
 35658 00006463 7506                    	jnz	short GLA_chkumb	; Y: terminating condition is 
 35659                                  					;    umb_head
 35660                                  					; N: terminating condition is 05Ah
 35661                                  
 35662 00006465 26803D5A                	cmp     byte [es:di],arena_signature_end
 35663                                  					; Q: is this the last arena
 35664 00006469 EB02                    	jmp	short GLA_@f
 35665                                  GLA_chkumb:
 35666 0000646B 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx			; Q: is this umb_head
 35667                                  GLA_@f:
 35668 0000646D 75E7                    	jne	short GLA_next		; N: get next arena
 35669                                  
 35670                                  GLA_done:
 35671                                  					; M061 - Start
 35672 0000646F 36F606[8900]01          	test	byte [ss:UMBFLAG],LINKSTATE ; Q: are UMBs linked
 35673 00006475 750B                    	jnz	short GLA_ret		; Y: we're done
 35674                                  					; N: let us confirm that the next 
 35675                                  					;    arena is umb_head
 35676 00006477 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35677 00006479 E858FD                  	call	arena_next		; ax, es -> next arena
 35678                                  	;jc	short GLA_err
 35679 0000647C 7207                    	jc	short GLA_err2
 35680 0000647E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx			; Q: is this umb_head
 35681 00006480 7502                    	jne	short GLA_err		; N: error
 35682                                  					; M061 - End
 35683                                  GLA_ret:
 35684                                  	; 17/12/2022				
 35685                                  	;clc
 35686                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35687                                  	;clc
 35688 00006482 58                      	pop	ax			; M061
 35689 00006483 C3                      	retn				; M061
 35690                                  
 35691                                  GLA_err:
 35692 00006484 F9                      	stc				; M061
 35693                                  GLA_err2:
 35694 00006485 58                      	pop	ax
 35695 00006486 C3                      	retn

 35724                                  ;BREAK <ServerCall -- Server DOS call>
 35725                                  
 35726                                  ; DOSCODE:A517h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 35727                                  ; DOSCODE:A4B7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 35728                                  
 35729                                  ;hkn; TABLE	SEGMENT
 35730                                  ;Public SRVC001S,SRVC001E
 35731                                  ;SRVC001S label byte
 35732                                  
 35733                                  SRVC001S:
 35734                                  
 35735 00006487 [8B64]                  SERVERTAB:	dw	SERVER_DISP
 35736 00006489 [DD64]                  SERVERLEAVE:	dw	SERVERRETURN
 35737 0000648B 0B                      SERVER_DISP:	db	(SERVER_DISP_END-SERVER_DISP-1)/2 ; = 11
 35738 0000648C [4565]                  		dw	SRV_CALL	; 0
 35739 0000648E [DE64]                  		dw	COMMIT_ALL	; 1
 35740 00006490 [1465]                  		dw	CLOSE_NAME	; 2
 35741 00006492 [1F65]                  		dw	CLOSE_UID	; 3
 35742 00006494 [2665]                  		dw	CLOSE_UID_PID	; 4
 35743 00006496 [2D65]                  		dw	GET_LIST	; 5
 35744 00006498 [8665]                  		dw	GET_DOS_DATA	; 6
 35745 0000649A [AA65]                  		dw	SPOOL_OPER	; 7
 35746 0000649C [AA65]                  		dw	SPOOL_OPER	; 8
 35747 0000649E [AA65]                  		dw	SPOOL_OPER	; 9
 35748 000064A0 [B665]                  		dw	_$SetExtendedError  ; 10
 35749                                  
 35750                                  SERVER_DISP_END:  ;  LABEL BYTE
 35751                                  
 35752                                  ;SRVC001E label byte
 35753                                  
 35754                                  SRVC001E:
 35755                                  
 35756                                  ;hkn; TABLE	ENDS
 35757                                  
 35758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35759                                  ;
 35760                                  ; Procedure Name : $ServerCall
 35761                                  ;
 35762                                  ; Inputs:
 35763                                  ;	DS:DX -> DPL  (except calls 7,8,9)
 35764                                  ; Function:
 35765                                  ;	AL=0	Server DOS call
 35766                                  ;	AL=1	Commit All files
 35767                                  ;	AL=2	Close file by name (SHARING LOADED ONLY) DS:DX in DPL -> name
 35768                                  ;	AL=3	Close all files for DPL_UID
 35769                                  ;	AL=4	Close all files for DPL_UID/PID_PID
 35770                                  ;	AL=5	Get open file list entry
 35771                                  ;		    IN: BX File Index
 35772                                  ;			CX User Index
 35773                                  ;		    OUT:ES:DI -> Name
 35774                                  ;			BX = UID
 35775                                  ;		    CX = # locked blocks held by this UID
 35776                                  ;	AL=6	Get DOS data area
 35777                                  ;		    OUT: DS:SI -> Start
 35778                                  ;			CX size in bytes of swap if indos
 35779                                  ;			DX size in bytes of swap always
 35780                                  ;	AL=7	Get truncate flag
 35781                                  ;	AL=8	Set truncate flag
 35782                                  ;	AL=9	Close all spool files
 35783                                  ;	AL=10	SetExtendedError
 35784                                  ;
 35785                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35786                                  
 35787                                  _$ServerCall:
 35788                                  	; 13/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35789                                  	; DOSCODE:A4D2h (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)		
 35790                                  	; 10/06/2019
 35791                                  	; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35792                                  	; DOSCODE:A532h (MSDOS 6.21 MSDOS.SYS)
 35793                                  
 35794                                  	; 05/08/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 35795                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 657Bh
 35796 000064A2 3C07                    	CMP	AL,7
 35797 000064A4 7204                    	JB	short SET_STUFF
 35798 000064A6 3C09                    	CMP	AL,9
 35799 000064A8 761A                    	JBE	short NO_SET_ID		; No DPL on calls 7,8,9
 35800                                  SET_STUFF:
 35801 000064AA 89D6                    	MOV	SI,DX			; Point to DPL with DS:SI
 35802                                  	;mov	bx,[si+12h]
 35803 000064AC 8B5C12                  	MOV	BX,[SI+DPL.UID]
 35804                                  
 35805                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 35806                                  ;SR;
 35807                                  ; WIN386 updates the USER_ID itself. If WIN386 is present we skip the updating
 35808                                  ; of USER_ID
 35809                                  
 35810 000064AF 36F606[3010]01          	test	byte [SS:IsWin386],1
 35811 000064B5 7505                    	jnz	short skip_win386
 35812                                  
 35813                                  ;hkn; SS override for user_id and proc_id
 35814                                  	; 15/08/2018
 35815 000064B7 36891E[3E03]            	MOV	[SS:USER_ID],BX		; Set UID
 35816                                  
 35817                                  skip_win386:
 35818 000064BC 8B5C14                  	MOV	BX,[SI+DPL.PID]
 35819 000064BF 36891E[3C03]            	MOV	[SS:PROC_ID],BX		; Set process ID
 35820                                  NO_SET_ID:
 35821                                  	; 10/06/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35822 000064C4 2EFF36[8964]            	PUSH	word [cs:SERVERLEAVE]	; push return address
 35823 000064C9 2EFF36[8764]            	PUSH	word [cS:SERVERTAB]	; push table address
 35824 000064CE 50                      	PUSH	AX
 35825 000064CF E853AD                  	call	TableDispatch
 35826                                  
 35827                                  ;hkn; SS override
 35828                                  	;mov 	byte [SS:EXETERR_LOCUS],1
 35829 000064D2 36C606[2303]01          	MOV	byte [SS:EXTERR_LOCUS],errLOC_Unk ; Extended Error Locus
 35830                                  	;error	error_invalid_function
 35831                                  	;mov	al,1
 35832 000064D8 B001                    	MOV	AL,error_invalid_function
 35833                                  servercall_error:
 35834 000064DA E967A1                  	JMP	SYS_RET_ERR
 35835                                  
 35836                                  SERVERRETURN:
 35837 000064DD C3                      	retn
 35838                                  
 35839                                  ; Commit - iterate through the open file list and make sure that the
 35840                                  ; directory entries are correctly updated.
 35841                                  
 35842                                  	; 01/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 35843                                  COMMIT_ALL:
 35844 000064DE 31DB                    	XOR	BX,BX			;   for (i=0; ThisSFT=getSFT(i); i++)
 35845 000064E0 16                      	push	ss
 35846 000064E1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35847 000064E2 E82DAE                  	call	ECritSFT		; Gonna scan SFT cache, lock it down
 35848                                  CommitLoop:
 35849 000064E5 53                      	push	bx
 35850 000064E6 E82401                  	call	SFFromSFN
 35851 000064E9 7222                    	JC	short CommitDone
 35852 000064EB 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0
 35853                                  	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_Ref_Count],0
 35854                                  					; if (ThisSFT->refcount != 0)
 35855 000064EF 7418                    	JZ	short CommitNext
 35856                                  	;cmp	word [es:di],0FFFFh ; -1
 35857 000064F1 26833DFF                	cmp	word [ES:DI],sf_busy
 35858                                  	;CMP	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_Ref_Count],sf_busy  
 35859                                  					; BUSY SFTs have god knows what
 35860 000064F5 7412                    	JZ	short CommitNext	;   in them.
 35861                                  	; 17/12/2022
 35862 000064F7 26F6450680              	test	byte [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags+1],(sf_isnet>>8) ; 80h
 35863                                  	;TEST	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_flags],sf_isnet ; 8000h
 35864 000064FC 750B                    	JNZ	short CommitNext	;  Skip Network SFTs so the SERVER
 35865                                  					;	doesn't deadlock
 35866 000064FE 893E[9E05]              	MOV	[THISSFT],DI
 35867 00006502 8C06[A005]              	MOV	[THISSFT+2],ES
 35868 00006506 E803CB                  	call	DOS_COMMIT		;	DOSCommit ();
 35869                                  CommitNext:
 35870 00006509 5B                      	pop	bx
 35871 0000650A 43                      	INC	BX
 35872 0000650B EBD8                    	JMP	short CommitLoop
 35873                                  CommitDone:
 35874 0000650D E81DAE                  	call	LCritSFT
 35875 00006510 5B                      	pop	bx
 35876                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35877                                  Commit_Ok:
 35878 00006511 E927A1                  	jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 35879                                  	
 35880                                  
 35881                                  CLOSE_NAME:
 35882                                  
 35883                                  ;if installed
 35884                                  
 35885                                  ;hkn; SS override
 35886                                  	;call	far [ss:MFTcloN]
 35887 00006514 36FF1E[A400]            	Call	far [SS:JShare+(5*4)] ; 5 = MFTcloN
 35888                                  ;else
 35889                                  ;	Call	MFTcloN
 35890                                  ;endif
 35891                                  
 35892                                  CheckReturns:
 35893 00006519 7202                    	JC	short func_err

 35895                                  	;transfer SYS_RET_OK
 35896                                  Commit_Okj:
 35897 0000651B EBF4                    	jmp	short Commit_Ok
 35898                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 35899                                  
 35900                                  func_err:

 35902                                  	;jmp	SYS_RET_ERR
 35903 0000651D EBBB                    	jmp	short servercall_error
 35904

 35908                                  ;hkn; SS override

 35917

 35922                                  ;else

 35924                                  ;endif
 35925 0000652B EBEC                    	JMP	short CheckReturns
 35926

 35928                                  
 35929                                  ;if installed
 35930                                  ;hkn; SS override
 35931                                  	;call	far [ss:MFT_get]

 35933                                  ;else
 35934                                  ;	Call	MFT_get
 35935                                  ;endif
 35936 00006532 72E9                    	JC	short func_err
 35937 00006534 E84E9F                  	call	Get_User_Stack
 35938                                  	;mov	[si+2],bx
 35939 00006537 895C02                  	MOV	[SI+user_env.user_BX],BX
 35940                                  	;mov	[si+10],di
 35941 0000653A 897C0A                  	MOV	[SI+user_env.user_DI],DI
 35942                                  	;mov	[si+16],es
 35943 0000653D 8C4410                  	MOV	[SI+user_env.user_ES],ES
 35944                                  SetCXOK:
 35945                                  	;mov	[si+4],cx
 35946 00006540 894C04                  	MOV	[SI+user_env.user_CX],CX
 35947                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 35948                                  	;transfer SYS_RET_OK
 35949                                  Commit_Okj2:
 35950                                  	; 17/12/2022
 35951 00006543 EBCC                    	jmp	short Commit_Ok
 35952                                  	;jmp	short Commit_Okj
 35953                                  	;;jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 35954                                  
 35955                                  SRV_CALL:
 35956 00006545 58                      	POP	AX			; get rid of call to $srvcall
 35957 00006546 1E                      	push	ds
 35958 00006547 56                      	push	si
 35959 00006548 E83A9F                  	call	Get_User_Stack
 35960 0000654B 5F                      	pop	di
 35961 0000654C 07                      	pop	es
 35962                                  
 35963                                  ; DS:SI point to stack
 35964                                  ; ES:DI point to DPL
 35965                                  
 35966 0000654D E8B4AC                  	call	XCHGP
 35967                                  
 35968                                  ; DS:SI point to DPL
 35969                                  ; ES:DI point to stack
 35970                                  ;
 35971                                  ; We now copy the registers from DPL to save stack
 35972                                  
 35973 00006550 56                      	push	si
 35974 00006551 B90600                  	MOV	CX,6
 35975 00006554 F3A5                    	REP	MOVSW			; Put in AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI
 35976 00006556 47                      	INC	DI
 35977 00006557 47                      	INC	DI			; Skip user_BP
 35978 00006558 A5                      	MOVSW				; DS
 35979 00006559 A5                      	MOVSW				; ES
 35980 0000655A 5E                      	pop	si			; DS:SI -> DPL
 35981 0000655B 8B04                    	mov	ax,[SI]
 35982                                  	;MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.AX]
 35983                                  	;mov	bx,[si+2]
 35984 0000655D 8B5C02                  	MOV	BX,[SI+DPL.BX]
 35985                                  	;mov	cx,[si+4]
 35986 00006560 8B4C04                  	MOV	CX,[SI+DPL.CX]
 35987                                  	;mov	dx,[si+6]
 35988 00006563 8B5406                  	MOV	DX,[SI+DPL.DX]
 35989                                  	;mov	di,[si+10]
 35990 00006566 8B7C0A                  	MOV	DI,[SI+DPL.DI]
 35991                                  	;mov	es,[si+14]
 35992 00006569 8E440E                  	MOV	ES,[SI+DPL.ES]
 35993                                  	;push	word [si+8]
 35994 0000656C FF7408                  	PUSH	word [SI+DPL.SI]
 35995                                  	;mov	ds,[si+12]
 35996 0000656F 8E5C0C                  	MOV	DS,[SI+DPL.DS]
 35997 00006572 5E                      	POP	SI
 35998                                  
 35999                                  ;hkn; SS override for next 3
 36000 00006573 368C1E[EC05]            	MOV	[SS:SAVEDS],DS
 36001 00006578 36891E[EA05]            	MOV	[SS:SAVEBX],BX
 36002 0000657D 36C606[7205]FF          	MOV	byte [SS:FSHARING],-1	; set no redirect flag
 36003 00006583 E9019E                  	jmp	REDISP
 36004                                  
 36005                                  GET_DOS_DATA:
 36006 00006586 16                      	push	ss
 36007 00006587 07                      	pop	es
 36008 00006588 BF[2003]                	MOV     DI,SWAP_START
 36009 0000658B B9[AC0A]                	MOV     CX,SWAP_END
 36010 0000658E BA[3A03]                	MOV     DX,SWAP_ALWAYS
 36011 00006591 29F9                    	SUB     CX,DI
 36012 00006593 29FA                    	SUB     DX,DI
 36013 00006595 D1E9                    	SHR     CX,1                    ; div by 2, remainder in carry
 36014 00006597 83D100                  	ADC     CX,0                    ; div by 2 + round up
 36015 0000659A D1E1                    	SHL     CX,1                    ; round up to 2 boundary.
 36016 0000659C E8E69E                  	call	Get_User_Stack
 36017                                  	;mov	[si+14],es
 36018 0000659F 8C440E                  	MOV     [SI+user_env.user_DS],ES
 36019                                  	;mov	[si+8],di
 36020 000065A2 897C08                  	MOV     [SI+user_env.user_SI],DI
 36021                                  	;mov	[si+6],dx
 36022 000065A5 895406                  	MOV     [SI+user_env.user_DX],DX
 36023 000065A8 EB96                    	JMP	short SetCXOK
 36024                                  
 36025                                  SPOOL_OPER:
 36026                                  	;CallInstall NETSpoolOper,MultNET,37,AX,BX
 36027                                  
 36028 000065AA 50                      	push    ax
 36029 000065AB B82511                  	mov     ax,1125h
 36030 000065AE CD2F                    	int     2Fh	; Multiplex - NETWORK REDIRECTOR - REDIRECTED PRINTER MODE
 36031                                  			; STACK: WORD subfunction
 36032                                  			; Return: CF set on error, AX = error code
 36033                                  			; STACK unchanged
 36034 000065B0 5B                      	pop	bx
 36035                                  	; 17/12/2022
 36036                                  	;JC	short func_err2
 36037 000065B1 7390                    	jnc	short Commit_Okj2
 36038                                  	; 01/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 36039                                  	;;jmp	SYS_RET_OK
 36040                                  	;jmp	short Commit_Okj2
 36041                                  	
 36042                                  func_err2:
 36043 000065B3 E98EA0                  	jmp	SYS_RET_ERR

 36045                                  ;Break	<$SetExtendedError - set extended error for later retrieval>
 36046                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36047                                  ;
 36048                                  ; Procedure Name : $SetExtendedError
 36049                                  ;
 36050                                  ; $SetExtendedError takes extended error information and loads it up for the
 36051                                  ; next extended error call. This is used by interrupt-level proccessors to
 36052                                  ; mask their actions.
 36053                                  ;
 36054                                  ;   Inputs: DS:SI points to DPL which contains all registers
 36055                                  ;   Outputs: none
 36056                                  ;
 36057                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36058                                  
 36059                                  _$SetExtendedError:
 36060                                  
 36061                                  ;hkn; SS override for all variables used
 36062                                  
 36063 000065B6 8B04                    	mov	ax,[si]
 36064                                  	;MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.AX]
 36065 000065B8 36A3[2403]              	MOV	[SS:EXTERR],AX
 36066                                  	;mov	ax,[si+10]
 36067 000065BC 8B440A                  	MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.DI]
 36068 000065BF 36A3[2803]              	MOV	[SS:EXTERRPT],AX
 36069                                  	;mov	ax,[si+14]
 36070 000065C3 8B440E                  	MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.ES]
 36071 000065C6 36A3[2A03]              	MOV	[SS:EXTERRPT+2],AX
 36072                                  	;mov	ax,[si+2]
 36073 000065CA 8B4402                  	MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.BX]
 36074 000065CD 36A3[2603]              	MOV	[SS:EXTERR_ACTION],AX
 36075                                  	;mov	ax,[si+4]
 36076 000065D1 8B4404                  	MOV	AX,[SI+DPL.CX]
 36077 000065D4 368826[2303]            	MOV	[SS:EXTERR_LOCUS],AH
