 40822                                  
 40823                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40824                                  
 40825                                  Rational386Patch:
 40826                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 40827                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 40828                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 40829                                  
 40830                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 40831                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 40832                                  
 40833                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 40834                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 40835                                  
 40836                                  	push	ax
 40837                                  
 40838                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 40839                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 40840                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40841                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 40842                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40843                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 40844                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 40845                                  rp3QO_ax:
 40846                                  	pop	ax
 40847                                  rp3QuickOut:
 40848                                  	retn
 40849                                  
 40850                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 40851                                  
 40852                                  rp3Maybe:
 40853                                  	cld
 40854                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 40855                                  	push	cx
 40856                                  	push	dx
 40857                                  	push	si
 40858                                  	push	di
 40859                                  	push	es
 40860                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 40861                                  	push	bp
 40862                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 40863                                  	mov	bp,sp
 40864                                  
 40865                                  	push	cs
 40866                                  	pop	ds
 40867                                  
 40868                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 40869                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 40870                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 40871                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 40872                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 40873                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 40874                                  
 40875                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 40876                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 40877                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 40878                                  ; an 80286 system.
 40879                                  
 40880                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 40881                                  
 40882                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 40883                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 40884                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 40885                                  
 40886                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 40887                                  
 40888                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 40889                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 40890                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 40891                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40892                                  
 40893                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 40894                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 40895                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 40896                                  
 40897                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 40898                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 40899                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40900                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40901                                  
 40902                                  rp3Exit_j:
 40903                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 40904                                  
 40905                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 40906                                  
 40907                                  rpGotPatch:
 40908                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40909                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 40910                                  
 40911                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40912                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40913                                  
 40914                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 40915                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 40916                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 40917                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 40918                                  
 40919                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 40920                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40921                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 40922                                  
 40923                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 40924                                  
 40925                                  	push	di
 40926                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 40927                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 40928                                  
 40929                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 40930                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 40931                                  
 40932                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 40933                                  	inc	dx
 40934                                  rp_no_cx:
 40935                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 40936                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 40937                                  	call	GenPatch
 40938                                  
 40939                                  	pop	di				; rpFind3 offset
 40940                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?
 40941                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx2
 40942                                  
 40943                                  	mov	byte [es:di-1],90h		;   yes, no-op it
 40944                                  rp_no_cx2:
 40945                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40946                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 40947                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 40948                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code
 40949                                  
 40950                                  	push	di				; save find3 offset
 40951                                  	mov	si,rpRepl3			; copy repl3 to patch area
 40952                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5
 40953                                  	call	CopyPatch
 40954                                  
 40955                                  	pop	bx				; find3 offset
 40956                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 40957                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 40958                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40959                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 40960                                  						;   area pointer
 40961                                  
 40962                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40963                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40964                                  
 40965                                  rpBug2:
 40966                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 40967                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40968                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 40969                                  
 40970                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 40971                                  
 40972                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 40973                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 40974                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 40975                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 40976                                  
 40977                                  	mov	di,si
 40978                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 40979                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 40980                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 40981                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 40982                                  
 40983                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 40984                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 40985                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40986                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 40987                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 40988                                  	call	GenJump
 40989                                  
 40990                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 40991                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 40992                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 40993                                  						;   main-line code
 40994                                  
 40995                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 40996                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 40997                                  
 40998                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 40999                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 41000                                  
 41001                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 41002                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 41003                                  
 41004                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 41005                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 41006                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 41007                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 41008                                  	add	ax,4
 41009                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 41010                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 41011                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 41012                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 41013                                  
 41014                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 41015                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 41016                                  						; patch area
 41017                                  
 41018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41019                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 41020                                  
 41021                                  rpBug3:
 41022                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 41023                                  	call	FindBadCode
 41024                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 41025                                  
 41026                                  	;add	di,9
 41027                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 41028                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 41029                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 41030                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 41031                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 41032                                  	pop	si
 41033                                  	jnz	short rpBug4
 41034

 41036                                  
 41037                                  	mov	di,si
 41038                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3

 41040                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl6Len ; 9

 41045                                  	mov	si,rpRepl7
 41046                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl7Len ; 9
 41047                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find7b code
 41048

 41050                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 41051                                  
 41052                                  rpBug4:
 41053                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 41054                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if 
 41055                                  	cmp	word [bp],360
 41056                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 41057                                  
 41058                                  	mov	bx,rpBug4Strs			; locate find8 & find9 code
 41059                                  	call	FindBadCode

 41063

 41068                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find8 code
 41069

 41071                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 41072                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; patch find9 to jmp to
 41073                                  	call	GenJump 			;   patch area
 41074                                  
 41075                                  	mov	si,rpRepl9			; copy replacement code to
 41076                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl9Len ; 5		;   patch area--it does a RET
 41077                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no jmp back to main-line
 41078                                  
 41079                                  rp3Exit:
 41080                                  	add	sp,StackVars.size
 41081                                  	pop	bp
 41082                                  	pop	ds
 41083                                  	pop	es
 41084                                  	pop	di
 41085                                  	pop	si
 41086                                  	pop	dx
 41087                                  	pop	cx
 41088                                  	pop	bx
 41089                                  	pop	ax
 41090                                  	retn
 41091                                  
 41092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41093                                  ;
 41094                                  ; FindBadCode
 41095                                  ;
 41096                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 41097                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 41098                                  ;
 41099                                  ; Entry:
 41100                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 41101                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 41102                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 41103                                  ;
 41104                                  ; Exit:
 41105                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 41106                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 41107                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 41108                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 41109                                  ;
 41110                                  ; Used:
 41111                                  ;	CX
 41112                                  ;
 41113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41114                                  
 41115                                  ;struc SearchPair
 41116                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 41117                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 41118                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41119                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 41120                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 41121                                  ; .size:
 41122                                  ;endstruc
 41123                                  
 41124                                  FindBadCode:
 41125                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 41126                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 41127                                  
 41128                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 41129                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 41130                                  	
 41131                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 41132                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 41133                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 41134                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 41135                                  
 41136                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 41137                                  
 41138                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 41139                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 41140                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 41141                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 41142                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 41143                                  
 41144                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 41145                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 41146                                  
 41147                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 41148                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 41149                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 41150                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 41151                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 41152                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 41153                                  
 41154                                  	clc
 41155                                  	retn
 41156                                  
 41157                                  fbc_error:
 41158                                  	stc
 41159                                  	retn
 41160                                  
 41161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41162                                  ;
 41163                                  ; GenPatch
 41164                                  ;
 41165                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 41166                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 41167                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 41168                                  ; code.
 41169                                  ;
 41170                                  ; Entry:
 41171                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 41172                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 41173                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 41174                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 41175                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 41176                                  ;
 41177                                  ; Exit:
 41178                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 41179                                  ;
 41180                                  ; Used:
 41181                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 41182                                  ;
 41183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41184                                  
 41185                                  GenPatch:
 41186                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 41187                                  
 41188                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 41189                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 41190                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 41191                                  	call	GenJump
 41192                                  
 41193                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 41194                                  
 41195                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 41196                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 41197                                  
 41198                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 41199                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41200                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 41201                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 41202                                  	retn
 41203                                  
 41204                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41205                                  ;
 41206                                  ; CopyPatch
 41207                                  ;
 41208                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 41209                                  ;
 41210                                  ; Entry:
 41211                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 41212                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 41213                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 41214                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 41215                                  ;
 41216                                  ; Exit:
 41217                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 41218                                  ;
 41219                                  ; Used:
 41220                                  ;	SI, Flags
 41221                                  ;
 41222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41223                                  
 41224                                  CopyPatch:
 41225                                  	push	cx
 41226                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 41227                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 41228                                  	cld
 41229                                  	rep movsb
 41230                                  	pop	cx
 41231                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 41232                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 41233                                  	retn
 41234                                  
 41235                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41236                                  ;
 41237                                  ; GenJump
 41238                                  ;
 41239                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 41240                                  ;
 41241                                  ; Entry:
 41242                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 41243                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 41244                                  ;
 41245                                  ; Exit:
 41246                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 41247                                  ;
 41248                                  ; Used:
 41249                                  ;	AX
 41250                                  ;
 41251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41252                                  
 41253                                  GenJump:
 41254                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 41255                                  	stosb
 41256                                  
 41257                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 41258                                  	sub	ax,di
 41259                                  	sub	ax,2
 41260                                  
 41261                                  	stosw			; output offset
 41262                                  
 41263                                  	retn
 41264                                  
 41265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41266                                  ;
 41267                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 41268                                  ;
 41269                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 41270                                  ;
 41271                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 41272                                  ;
 41273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41274                                  
 41275                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 41276                                  	mov	di,200h
 41277                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 41278                                  	push	cx
 41279                                  	sub	cx,dx
 41280                                  	inc	cx
 41281                                  scsagain:
 41282                                  	push	si
 41283                                  	push	di
 41284                                  	push	cx
 41285                                  	mov	cx,dx
 41286                                  	rep	cmpsb
 41287                                  	pop	cx
 41288                                  	pop	di
 41289                                  	pop	si
 41290                                  	je	short scsfound
 41291                                  	inc	di
 41292                                  	loop	scsagain
 41293                                  scsfound:
 41294                                  	pop	cx
 41295                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 41296                                  	retn
 41297                                  	
 41298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41299                                  ;
 41300                                  ; VerifyVersion
 41301                                  ;
 41302                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 41303                                  ; from ES:2A.
 41304                                  ;
 41305                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 41306                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 41307                                  ;
 41308                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41309                                  
 41310                                  VerifyVersion:
 41311                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 41312                                  					;  in ascii
 41313                                  	mov	bl,10
 41314                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 41315                                  
 41316                                  	call	VVDigit
 41317                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41318                                  	call	VVDigit
 41319                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41320                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 41321                                  	jne	short vvexit
 41322                                  	dec	si
 41323                                  	;call	VVDigit
 41324                                  	; 18/12/2022
 41325                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 41326                                  ;vvexit:
 41327                                  	;retn
 41328                                  VVDigit:
 41329                                  	div	bl
 41330                                  	add	ah,'0'
 41331                                  	dec	si
 41332                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 41333                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 41334                                  	retn
 41335                                  
 41336                                  %endif
 41337                                  
 41338                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 41600                                  	; 28/12/2022
 41601                                  	;jmp	short ExePackPatch
 41602                                  
 41603                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 41604                                  ;
 41605                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 41606                                  ;
 41607                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 41608                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 41609                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 41610                                  ; Output		:		
 41611                                  ;
 41612                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 41613                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 41614                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 41615                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 41616                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 41617                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 41618                                  ;		 6. endif
 41619                                  ;	      7. endif
 41620                                  ;	   8. endif
 41621                                  ;	9. endif
 41622                                  ;
 41623                                  ;
 41624                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 41625                                  ;
 41626                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 41627                                  		
 41628                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41629                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 41630                                  ExePackPatch:
 41631 000074CE 53                      	push	bx
 41632 000074CF 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment
 41633 000074D1 81FBFF0F                	cmp	bx,0FFFh		; Q: is the load segment > 64K
 41634 000074D5 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N: 
 41635 000074D7 5B                      	pop	bx			; Y: no need to patch
 41636 000074D8 C3                      	retn
 41637                                  ep_cont:
 41638 000074D9 1E                      	push	ds
 41639 000074DA 06                      	push	es
 41640 000074DB 50                      	push	ax
 41641 000074DC 51                      	push	cx
 41642 000074DD 56                      	push	si
 41643 000074DE 57                      	push	di
 41644                                  	
 41645                                  		; M033 - start
 41646                                  		; exepacked programs have an IP of 12h (>=2)
 41647                                  
 41648 000074DF 83E902                  	sub	cx,2			; Q: is IP >=2 
 41649 000074E2 7303                    	jnb	short epp_1		; N: exit
 41650 000074E4 E9C500                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 41651                                  					; ax:cx now points to location of
 41652                                  					; 'RB' if this is an exepacked file.
 41653                                  		; M033 - end
 41654                                  epp_1:
 41655 000074E7 89CF                    	mov	di,cx
 41656 000074E9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 41657 000074EB 36893E[8700]            	mov	[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET],di	; save pointer to 'RB' in 
 41658                                  					; unpack_offset
 41659                                  
 41660 000074F0 26813D5242              	cmp	word [es:di],'RB' ; 4252h
 41661                                  	;ljne	ep_notpacked
 41662 000074F5 7403                    	je	short epp_2
 41663 000074F7 E9B200                  	jmp	ep_notpacked
 41664                                  epp_2:
 41665 000074FA 0E                      	push	cs
 41666 000074FB 1F                      	pop	ds			; set ds to cs
 41667                                  
 41668                                  	;add	di,6Ch
 41669 000074FC 83C76C                  	add	di,PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed 
 41670                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 41671                                  					;	   scan string. 
 41672                                  
 41673 000074FF E8B200                  	call	chk_common_str		; check for match
 41674                                  
 41675 00007502 7524                    	jnz	short ep_chkpatch2	; Q: does the patch match
 41676                                  					; N: check at patch2_offset
 41677                                  					; Y: check for rest of patch string
 41678 00007504 BE[E473]                	mov	si,scan_patch1
 41679                                  					; ds:si -> scan string 
 41680 00007507 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; restore di to point to 'RB'
 41681                                  
 41682                                  	;add	di,28h
 41683                                  	; 07/12/2022
 41684 0000750C 83C728                  	add	di,PATCH1_OFFSET	; es:di -> points to place in packed 
 41685                                  					;          file where we hope to find
 41686                                  					;	   scan string. 
 41687                                  	;mov	cx,68
 41688 0000750F B94400                  	mov	cx,size_scan_patch1
 41689                                  	;mov	bx,142
 41690 00007512 BB8E00                  	mov	bx,CHKSUM1_LEN
 41691                                  	;mov	ax,0EF4Eh
 41692 00007515 B84EEF                  	mov	ax,PATCH1_CHKSUM
 41693 00007518 E8AD00                  	call	chk_patchsum		; check if patch and chk sum compare

 41821                                  ;
 41822                                  ;	Input		: DS = DOSCODE
 41823                                  ;			; ES:DI points to string in packed file
 41824                                  ;

 41837                                  
 41838                                  					; M046 - start
 41839                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a 
 41840                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 41841                                  	;

 41845                                  	; we shall try to match the rest of the string

 41849 000075BE 26807DFF56              	cmp	byte [es:di-1],56h

 41856                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41857                                  ;
 41858                                  ;	Procedure Name	: chk_patchsum
 41859                                  ;
 41860                                  ;	Input		: DS:SI -> string we're looking for
 41861                                  ;			: ES:DI -> offset in packed file
 41862                                  ;			: CX 	= scan length
 41863                                  ;			: BX	= length of check sum
 41864                                  ;			: AX 	= value of check sum
 41865                                  ;
 41866                                  ;	Output		: if patch & check sum compare
 41867                                  ;				NC
 41868                                  ;			  else
 41869                                  ;				CY
 41870                                  ;
 41871                                  ;	Uses		: AX, BX, CX, SI
 41872                                  ;
 41873                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41874                                  
 41875                                  	; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 41876                                  chk_patchsum:
 41877 000075C8 57                      	push	di
 41878                                  
 41879 000075C9 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb			   
 41880                                  
 41881 000075CB 7518                    	jnz	short cp_fail		; Q: does the patch match
 41882                                  					; N: exit
 41883                                  					; Y:	
 41884                                  
 41885                                  		; we do a check sum starting from the location of the 
 41886                                  		; exepack signature 'RB' up to 11c/2 bytes, the end of the
 41887                                  		; unpacking code.
 41888                                  
 41889 000075CD 368B3E[8700]            	mov	di,[ss:UNPACK_OFFSET]	; di -> start of unpack code
 41890 000075D2 89D9                    	mov	cx,bx			; cx = length of check sum
 41891                                  
 41892 000075D4 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; save check sum passed to us in bx
 41893 000075D6 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 41894                                  ep_chksum:
 41895 000075D8 260305                  	add	ax,[es:di]
 41896 000075DB 83C702                  	add	di,2
 41897 000075DE E2F8                    	loop	ep_chksum
 41898                                  
 41899 000075E0 5F                      	pop	di			; restore di
 41900                                  
 41901 000075E1 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		 	; Q: does the check sum match
 41902                                  	;jne	short cp_fail		; N: exit
 41903                                  					; Y: 
 41904                                  	; 25/09/2023
 41905                                  	;clc	
 41906                                  	;retn
 41907 000075E3 74E2                    	je	short ccs_done ; cf=0
 41908                                  	
 41909                                  cp_fail:
 41910 000075E5 F9                      	stc
 41911 000075E6 C3                      	retn

 41918                                  ; M020 : BEGIN
 41919                                  ;
 41920                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41921                                  ;
 41922                                  ; procedure : RationalPatch
 41923                                  ;
 41924                                  ; A routine (in Ration DOS extender) which is invoked at hardware interrupts
 41925                                  ; clobbers CX register on 286 machines. (123 release 3 uses Rational DOS
 41926                                  ; extender). This routine identifies Buggy Rational EXEs and fixes the bug.
 41927                                  ;
 41928                                  ; THE BUG is in the following code sequence:
 41929                                  ;
 41930                                  ;8b 0e 10 00	mov	cx, ds:[10h]		; delay count
 41931                                  ;90		even				; word align
 41932                                  ;e2 fe		loop	$			; wait		CLOBBERS CX
 41933                                  ;e8 xx xx	call	set_A20			; enable A20
 41934                                  ;
 41935                                  ; This patch routine replaces the mov & the loop with a far call into a
 41936                                  ; routine in DOS data segment which is in low memory (because A20 line
 41937                                  ; is off). The routine (RatBugCode) in DOS data saves & restores CX around
 41938                                  ; a mov & loop.
 41939                                  ;
 41940                                  ; Identification of Buggy Rational EXE
 41941                                  ; ====================================
 41942                                  ;
 41943                                  ; (ALL OFFSETS ARE IN THE PROGRAM SECTION - EXCLUDING THE EXE HEADER)
 41944                                  ;
 41945                                  ; OFFSET				Contains
 41946                                  ; ------				--------
 41947                                  ; 0000h			100 times Version number in binary
 41948                                  ;			bug exists in version 3.48 thru 3.83 (both inclusive)
 41949                                  ;
 41950                                  ; 000ah			the WORDS : 0000h, 0020h, 0000h, 0040h, 0001h
 41951                                  ;
 41952                                  ; 002ah			offset where version number is stored in ASCII
 41953                                  ;				e.g. '3.48A'
 41954                                  ;
 41955                                  ; 0030h			offset of copyright string. Copyright strings either
 41956                                  ;			start with "DOS/16M Copyright...." or
 41957                                  ;			"Copyright.....". The string contains
 41958                                  ;			"Rational Systems, Inc."
 41959                                  ;
 41960                                  ; 0020h			word : Paragraph offset of the buggy code segment
 41961                                  ;				from the program image
 41962                                  ; 0016h			word : size of buggy code segment
 41963                                  ;
 41964                                  ;	Buggy code is definite to start after offset 200h in its segment
 41965                                  ;
 41966                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41967                                  
 41968                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 41969                                  ; DOSCODE:B976h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41970                                  
 41971                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 41972                                  ; DOSCODE:B654h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41973                                  
 41974                                  RScanPattern1:
 41975                                  	db	0, 0, 20h, 0, 0, 0, 40h, 0, 1, 0
 41976                                  
 41977                                  RLen1 equ $ - RScanPattern1
 41978                                  
 41979                                  RScanPattern2:
 41980                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 90h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 41981                                  
 41982                                  RLen2 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 41983                                  
 41984                                  RScanPattern3:
 41985                                  	db	8Bh, 0Eh, 10h, 00h, 0E2h, 0FEh, 0E8h
 41986                                  
 41987                                  RLen3 equ $ - RScanPattern2
 41988                                  
 41989                                  ; DOSCODE:B98Fh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 41990                                  ; DOSCODE:B66Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 41991                                  
 41992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41993                                  ;
 41994                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 41995                                  ;
 41996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41997                                  
 41998                                  RationalPatch:
 41999                                  	cld
 42000                                  	push	ax
 42001                                  	push	bx
 42002                                  	push	cx
 42003                                  	push	dx
 42004                                  	push	si
 42005                                  	push	di
 42006                                  	push	es
 42007                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 42008                                  	mov	di,0Ah			; look for pat1 at offset 0Ah
 42009                                  	push	cs
 42010                                  	pop	ds
 42011                                  	
 42012                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern1
 42013                                  	;mov	cx,10
 42014                                  	mov	cx,RLen1
 42015                                  	rep	cmpsb			; do we have the pattern ?
 42016                                  	jne	short rpexit
 42017                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]
 42018                                  	cmp	ax,348			; is it a buggy version ?
 42019                                  	jb	short rpexit
 42020                                  	cmp	ax,383			; is it a buggy version
 42021                                  	ja	short rpexit
 42022                                  
 42023                                  	call	VerifyVersion
 42024                                  	jne	short rpexit
 42025                                  
 42026                                  	mov	cx,[es:16h]		; Length of buggy code seg
 42027                                  	sub	cx,200h			; Length we search (we start
 42028                                  					;  at offset 200h)
 42029                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=buggy code segment
 42030                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern2
 42031                                  	;mov	dx,8	
 42032                                  	mov	dx,RLen2
 42033                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq with nop
 42034                                  	jz	short rpfound
 42035                                  
 42036                                  	mov	si,RScanPattern3
 42037                                  	;mov	dx,15
 42038                                  	mov	dx,RLen3
 42039                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq w/o nop
 42040                                  	jnz	short rpexit
 42041                                  
 42042                                  rpfound:
 42043                                  	
 42044                                  ;	we set up a far call into DOS data
 42045                                  ;	dx has the length of the code seq we were searching for
 42046                                  
 42047                                  	mov	al,9Ah			; far call opcode
 42048                                  	stosb
 42049                                  	mov	ax,RatBugCode
 42050                                  	stosw
 42051                                  	mov	ax,ss
 42052                                  	stosw
 42053                                  	mov	cx,dx
 42054                                  	sub	cx,6			; filler (with NOPs)
 42055                                  	mov	al,90h
 42056                                  	rep	stosb
 42057                                  rpexit:
 42058                                  	pop	ds
 42059                                  	pop	es
 42060                                  	pop	di
 42061                                  	pop	si
 42062                                  	pop	dx
 42063                                  	pop	cx
 42064                                  	pop	bx
 42065                                  	pop	ax
 42066                                  	retn
 42067                                  
 42068                                  ; M020 END
 42069                                  
 42070                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 42071                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 42072                                  
 42073                                  ; DOSCODE:B6D8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 42074                                  
 42075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42076                                  ;
 42077                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 42078                                  ;
 42079                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 42080                                  ;
 42081                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 42082                                  ;
 42083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42084                                  
 42085                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 42086                                  	; 17/12/2022
 42087                                  	mov	di,200h
 42088                                  ;ScanCodeSeq_di:
 42089                                  	push	cx
 42090                                  	sub	cx,dx
 42091                                  	inc	cx
 42092                                  	; 17/12/2022
 42093                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 42094                                  	;mov	di,200h
 42095                                  scsagain:
 42096                                  	push	si
 42097                                  	push	di
 42098                                  	push	cx
 42099                                  	mov	cx,dx
 42100                                  	rep	cmpsb
 42101                                  	pop	cx
 42102                                  	pop	di
 42103                                  	pop	si
 42104                                  	je	short scsfound
 42105                                  	inc	di
 42106                                  	loop	scsagain
 42107                                  scsfound:
 42108                                  	pop	cx
 42109                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 42110                                  	retn
 42111                                  
 42112                                  
 42113                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 42114                                  ; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 42115                                  
 42116                                  ; DOSCODE:B6F0h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 42117                                  
 42118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42119                                  ;
 42120                                  ; VerifyVersion
 42121                                  ;
 42122                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 42123                                  ; from ES:2A.
 42124                                  ;
 42125                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 42126                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 42127                                  ;
 42128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42129                                  
 42130                                  VerifyVersion:
 42131                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 42132                                  					;  in ascii
 42133                                  	mov	bl,10
 42134                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 42135                                  
 42136                                  	call	VVDigit
 42137                                  	jne	short vvexit
 42138                                  	call	VVDigit
 42139                                  	jne	short vvexit
 42140                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.' ; 2Eh
 42141                                  	jne	short vvexit
 42142                                  	dec	si
 42143                                  	;call	VVDigit
 42144                                  	; 18/12/2022
 42145                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 42146                                  ;vvexit:
 42147                                  	;retn
 42148                                  VVDigit:
 42149                                  	div	bl
 42150                                  	add	ah,'0' ; 30h
 42151                                  	dec	si
 42152                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 42153                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 42154                                  	retn
 42155                                  
 42156                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 42157                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 42158                                  
 42159                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42160                                  ;
 42161                                  ;	M068
 42162                                  ;
 42163                                  ; 	Procedure Name	: IsCopyProt
 42164                                  ;
 42165                                  ;	Inputs		: DS:100 -> start of com file just read in
 42166                                  ;
 42167                                  ;	Outputs		: sets the A20OFF_COUNT variable to 10 if 
 42168                                  ;			  the program loaded in DS:100 uses a MICROSOFT
 42169                                  ;			  copy protect scheme that relies on the A20 line
 42170                                  ;			  being turned off for it's scheme to work.
 42171                                  ;
 42172                                  ;			  Note: The int 21 function dispatcher will turn 
 42173                                  ;				a20 off, if the A20OFF_COUNT is non-zero 
 42174                                  ;				and dec the A20OFF_COUNT before	iretting 
 42175                                  ;				to the user. 
 42176                                  ;
 42177                                  ;	Uses		: ES, DI, SI, CX
 42178                                  ;
 42179                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42180                                  
 42181                                  ; 23/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 42182                                  
 42183                                  CPStartOffset	EQU	0175h
 42184                                  CPID1Offset	EQU	011Bh
 42185                                  CPID2Offset	EQU	0173h
 42186                                  CPID3Offset	EQU	0146h
 42187                                  CPID4Offset	EQU	0124h
 42188                                  ID1		EQU	05343h
 42189                                  ID2		EQU	05044h
 42190                                  ID3		EQU	0F413h
 42191                                  ID4		EQU	08000h
 42192                                  
 42193                                  ; DOSCODE:B9FAh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 42194                                  
 42195                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 42196                                  ; DOSCODE:B71Ch (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 42197                                  
 42198                                  CPScanPattern:
 42199 000075E7 89264801                	db	89h,26h,48h,01h		 ; mov [148],sp
 42200 000075EB 8C0E4C01                	db	8Ch,0Eh,4Ch,01h		 ; mov [14C],cs
 42201 000075EF C7064A010001            	db	0C7h,06h,4Ah,01h,00h,01h ; mov [14A],100h 
 42202 000075F5 8C0E1301                	db 	8Ch,0Eh,13h,01h		 ; mov [113],cs
 42203 000075F9 B82001                  	db	0B8h,20h,01h		 ; mov ax,120h
 42204 000075FC BE0001                  	db	0BEh,00h,01h		 ; mov si,100h
 42205                                  
 42206                                  CPSPlen	EQU $ - CPScanPattern
 42207                                  
 42208                                  ; DOSCODE:BA12h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 42209                                  ; DOSCODE:B734h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 42210                                  
 42211                                  IsCopyProt:
 42212 000075FF 813E1B014353            	cmp	word [CPID1Offset],ID1
 42213 00007605 752D                    	jne	short CP_done
 42214                                  
 42215 00007607 813E73014450            	cmp	word [CPID2Offset],ID2
 42216 0000760D 7525                    	jne	short CP_done
 42217                                  
 42218 0000760F 813E460113F4            	cmp	word [CPID3Offset],ID3
 42219 00007615 751D                    	jne	short CP_done
 42220                                  
 42221 00007617 813E24010080            	cmp	word [CPID4Offset],ID4
 42222 0000761D 7515                    	jne	short CP_done
 42223                                  
 42224 0000761F 0E                      	push	cs
 42225 00007620 07                      	pop	es
 42226 00007621 BF[E775]                	mov	di,CPScanPattern	; es:di -> Pattern to find
 42227                                  
 42228 00007624 BE7501                  	mov	si,CPStartOffset	; ds:si -> possible location 
 42229                                  					; of pattern

 43158                                  ;
 43159                                  ; determine whether or not an XMM driver is installed
 43160                                  ;
 43161 00007930 50                      	push	ax

 43341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43342                                  ;
 43343                                  ; Procedure Name : WhatCPUType
 43344                                  ;
 43345                                  ; Inputs	 : none
 43346                                  ;
 43347                                  ; Outputs	 : AL = 0 if CPU <  286
 43348                                  ;		      = 1 if CPU == 286
 43349                                  ;		      = 2 if CPU >= 386
 43350                                  ;
 43351                                  ; Regs. Mod.	 : AX
 43352                                  ;
 43353                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43354                                  
 43355                                  WhatCPUType:
 43356                                  	; 25/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43357                                  	;get_cpu_type	; done with a MACRO which can't be generated > once
 43358                                  
 43359                                  	;CPUTYPE.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 43360                                  
 43361                                  ; Note: this must be a macro, and not a subroutine in the BIOS since
 43362                                  ; 	it is called from both CODE and SYSINITSEG.
 43363                                  ;
 43364                                  ;------GET_CPU_TYPE-----------------------------------May, 88 by M.Williamson
 43365                                  ;  Returns: AX = 0 if 8086 or 8088
 43366                                  ;              = 1 if 80286
 43367                                  ;              = 2 if 80386
 43368                                  
 43369                                  	; 04/11/2022
 43370                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BB03h
 43371                                  
 43372                                  Get_CPU_Type:	;macro
 43373                                  	pushf
 43374                                  	push	bx			; preserve bx
 43375                                  	xor	bx,bx			; init bx to zero
 43376                                  
 43377                                  	xor	ax,ax			; 0000 into AX
 43378                                  	push	ax			; put it on the stack...
 43379                                  	popf				; ...then shove it into the flags
 43380                                  	pushf				; get it back out of the flags...
 43381                                  	pop	ax			; ...and into ax
 43382                                  	and	ax,0F000h		; mask off high four bits
 43383                                  	cmp	ax,0F000h		; was it all 1's?
 43384                                  	je	short cpu_8086		; aye; it's an 8086 or 8088
 43385                                  
 43386                                  	mov	ax,0F000h		; now try to set the high four bits..
 43387                                  	push	ax
 43388                                  	popf
 43389                                  	pushf
 43390                                  	pop	ax			; ...and see what happens
 43391                                  	and	ax,0F000h		; any high bits set ?
 43392                                  	jz	short cpu_286		; nay; it's an 80286
 43393                                  
 43394                                  cpu_386:				; bx starts as zero
 43395                                  	inc	bx			; inc twice if 386
 43396                                  cpu_286:				; just inc once if 286
 43397                                  	inc	bx
 43398                                  cpu_8086:				; don't inc at all if 086
 43399                                  	mov	ax,bx			; put CPU type value in ax
 43400                                  	pop	bx			; restore original bx
 43401                                  	popf
 43402                                  	
 43403                                  	;endm
 43404                                  
 43405                                  	; 04/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43406                                  	;retn
 43407                                  
 43408                                  	; 04/11/2022
 43409                                  	; MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS - DOSCODE:0BB27h
 43410                                  	cmp	al,1
 43411                                  	jne	short sr_done 		; we need Rational Patch only
 43412                                  					;  on 286 systems
 43413                                  	mov	word [RationalPatchPtr],RationalPatch
 43414                                  
 43415                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43416                                  %endif	; 28/12/2022
 43417                                  
 43418 000079A3 EB05                    	jmp	short sr_done

 43779                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43780                                  ;
 43781                                  ; 	Procedure Name	:	patch_in_nops
 43782                                  ;
 43783                                  ; 	Entry		: 	ES -> DOSDATA
 43784                                  ;
 43785                                  ;	Regs Mod	: 	cx, di
 43786                                  ;
 43787                                  ;	Description:
 43788                                  ;		This routine patches in 2 nops at the offsets specified in 
 43789                                  ;	patch_table. This basically enables the low mem stub to start 
 43790                                  ;	making XMS calls.
 43791                                  ;
 43792                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43793                                  
 43794                                  	; 04/11/2022
 43795                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 43796                                  	; DOSCODE:0BC50h
 43797                                  
 43798                                  patch_table:	; label	byte
 43799                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i0patch
 43800                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i20patch
 43801                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i21patch
 43802                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i25patch
 43803                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i26patch
 43804                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i27patch
 43805                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:i2fpatch
 43806                                  	;dw	offset dosdata:cpmpatch
 43807 00007A9F [7010]                  	dw	i0patch
 43808 00007AA1 [7A10]                  	dw	i20patch
 43809 00007AA3 [8410]                  	dw	i21patch
 43810 00007AA5 [8E10]                  	dw	i25patch
 43811 00007AA7 [9810]                  	dw	i26patch
 43812 00007AA9 [A210]                  	dw	i27patch
 43813 00007AAB [AC10]                  	dw	i2fpatch
 43814 00007AAD [B610]                  	dw	cpmpatch
 43815                                  
 43816                                  patch_table_size equ ($-patch_table)/2
 43817                                  
 43818                                  patch_in_nops:
 43819 00007AAF 50                      	push	ax
 43820 00007AB0 56                      	push	si
 43821 00007AB1 BE[9F7A]                	mov	si,patch_table
 43822 00007AB4 B89090                  	mov	ax,9090h ; nop, nop
 43823                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43824                                  	; cx = 0
 43825                                  	;mov	cx,8
 43826                                  	;mov	cx,patch_table_size ; 8
 43827 00007AB7 B108                    	mov	cl,patch_table_size ; 8
 43828                                  pin_loop:
 43829 00007AB9 2E8B3C                  	mov	di,[cs:si]
 43830 00007ABC AB                      	stosw
 43831                                  	;add	si,2
 43832                                  	; 17/12/2022
 43833 00007ABD 46                      	inc	si
 43834 00007ABE 46                      	inc	si
 43835 00007ABF E2F8                    	loop	pin_loop
 43836 00007AC1 5E                      	pop	si
 43837 00007AC2 58                      	pop	ax
 43838 00007AC3 C3                      	retn

 43921                                  ; and those that are relevant to the system as a whole. Under 3.0, the system
 43922                                  ; data will be gathered with the system code. The process data under 2.x will
 43923                                  ; be available for swapping and under 3.0 it will be allocated per-process.

 44024                                  ;; NOTE: INT 21H AH=52H !  (http://stanislavs.org/helppc/int_21-52.html)
 44025                                  ;;***************************************************************************
 44026                                  ;; INT 21,52 - Get Pointer to DOS "INVARS" (Undocumented)
 44027                                  ;;
 44028                                  ;;	AH = 52h
 44029                                  ;;
 44030                                  ;;	on return:
 44031                                  ;;	ES:BX = pointer to DOS "invars", a table of pointers used by DOS.
 44032                                  ;;		Known "invars" fields follow (varies with DOS version):
 44033                                  ;;
 44034                                  ;;	Offset Size		 Description
 44035                                  ;;
 44036                                  ;;	 -12   word   sharing retry count (DOS 3.1-3.3)
 44037                                  ;;	 -10   word   sharing retry delay  (DOS 3.1-3.3)
 44038                                  ;;	  -8   dword  pointer to current disk buffer (DOS 3.x)
 44039                                  ;;	  -4   word   pointer in DOS code segment of unread CON input;
 44040                                  ;;		      0 indicates no unread input (DOS 3.x)
 44041                                  ;;	  -2   word   segment of first Memory Control Block (MCB)
 44042                                  ;;	  00   dword  pointer to first DRIVE PARAMETER TABLE (A:) in chain
 44043                                  ;;	  04   dword  pointer to DOS System File Table (SFT)
 44044                                  ;;	  08   dword  pointer to $CLOCK device driver
 44045                                  ;;	  0C   dword  pointer to CON device driver
 44046                                  ;;	  10   byte   number of logical drives in system
 44047                                  ;;	  11   word   maximum bytes/block of any block device
 44048                                  ;;	  13   dword  pointer to DOS cache buffer header
 44049                                  ;;	  17 18bytes  NUL device header, first 4 bytes of device header
 44050                                  ;;		      point to the next device in device chain
 44051                                  ;;
 44052                                  ;;***************************************************************************

 44183                                  			; M068: which A20 is off
 44184                                  DOS_FLAG:
 44185 00000086 00                      	db	0	; see DOSSYM.INC for Bit 
 44186                                  			; definitions
 44187                                  UNPACK_OFFSET:
 44188 00000087 0000                    	dw	0	; saves pointer to the start
 44189                                  			; of unpack code in exepatch.
 44190                                  			; asm.
 44191                                  UMBFLAG:
 44192 00000089 00                      	db	0 	; M003: bit 0 indicates the 
 44193                                  			; M003: link state of the UMBs
 44194                                  			; M003: whether linked or not 
 44195                                  			; M003: to the DOS arena chain
 44196                                  SAVE_AX:
 44197 0000008A 0000                    	dw	0	; M000: temp varibale to store ax
 44198                                  			; M000: in msproc.asm
 44199                                  UMB_HEAD:
 44200 0000008C FFFF                    	dw	-1	; M000: this is initialized to  
 44201                                  			; M000: the first umb arena by 
 44202                                  			; M000: BIOS sysinit.
 44203                                  START_ARENA:
 44204 0000008E 0100                    	dw	1	; M000: this is the first arena 
 44205                                  			; M000: from which DOS will 
 44206                                  			; M000: start its scan for alloc.
 44207                                  
 44208                                  ; End of SYSINITVar block
 44209                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
